title: Virtual STR Operations Manager
description:

Efficiency and Optimization:

Requirements:

• Ability to work independently and think proactively.

What We Offer:

• Opportunities to grow with the business.
• A collaborative and supportive work environment.
• Competitive pay based on experience.

How to Apply:
Please send your resume and a brief cover letter explaining why you are the ideal candidate for this role to [your email address]. Use the subject line "Virtual Property Manager Application – [Your Name]."

title: PLC Ladder Logic Developer
description:
We are seeking an experienced PLC Ladder Logic Developer, IDEC PLC FC6a, WindLDR  to assist in designing, developing, and implementing control logic for an advanced water treatment system. The ideal candidate will have expertise in creating ladder logic programs for starting pumps, controlling valve sequences, and integrating process instrumentation. My 

Project Overview
The project involves the control and automation of a nanofiltration water treatment system with various operational modes, including service, backwash, and cleaning modes. Key components include:

Digital and Analog Signals:

Digital inputs/outputs for tank levels, pump commands, and valve statuses.
Analog signals for pressure transmitters and flow meters.
Control Requirements:

Start/stop pumps.
Open/close valves with timers.
Scale analog inputs (4-20 mA) to engineering units (e.g., PSI).
Implement PID control for pump speed regulation.
Handle alarms for high/low pressure conditions.
Execute sequences for operational modes (e.g., pre-service flush, service, backwash, clean-in-place).
Logic Design:

Valve sequencing and timing.
Manual override for pumps and valves.
Integration of flow meter pulse counting and scaling.
Tag List Overview
Address Tag Name Comment
I0000 DI_TankLow Low tank level indicator
I0001 DI_StartService Start command from operator
Q0005 DO_NanoPumpStart Command to start Nano Feed pump
Q0006 DO_AV01 Control for AV-01 (open/close)
D0000 AI_PT01 NF Inlet Pressure (4-20mA, 0-200 PSI)
D5000 Setpoint Desired flow rate (e.g., 100 GPM)
D5003 PIDOutput PID control output for pump speed adjustment
Scope of Work
Develop ladder logic programs based on provided process control documentation.
Configure the system for multiple operational modes:
Pre-Service Flush Mode: Sequential valve and pump operation for flushing.
Service Mode: Flow control using PID.
Backwash Mode: Reverse flow for cleaning filters.
Clean-In-Place (CIP) Mode: Circulate cleaning chemicals.
Scale analog inputs from 4-20 mA to engineering units (PSI).
Create alarm logic for high/low pressure conditions with reset functionality.
Implement manual override logic for pumps and valves.
Ensure proper timing for valve operations (15 seconds).
Required Skills and Experience
Proven experience in developing ladder logic for pumps and valves.
Expertise in working with PLCs and process control systems.
Strong understanding of analog scaling and PID control.
Familiarity with alarm handling and manual override implementation.
Ability to follow detailed control documentation and deliver structured, well-documented code.
Experience with Modbus communication is a plus.
Project Deliverables
Fully tested ladder logic program for the specified control system.
Documentation of the logic, including comments and operational flowcharts.
Assistance with commissioning and debugging if needed.

title: ZoHo Implementation Specialist
description:
About Us
Cascade IT Services is a Managed Service Provider (MSP) dedicated to delivering innovative IT solutions to our clients. We are embarking on a comprehensive project to streamline our internal operations using ZoHo’s suite of tools. Additionally, we aim to support our clients with their ZoHo migrations, providing them with tailored solutions that meet their business needs.

Job Summary
We are looking for a skilled ZoHo specialist to design, implement, and integrate ZoHo applications across our organization while also assisting our customers with ZoHo migrations. This role involves working on a diverse range of ZoHo modules internally and offering migration and customization expertise to clients. The ideal candidate will help Cascade IT Services build a strong foundation for its own operations while enabling seamless adoption of ZoHo tools for our customers.

Key Responsibilities
Internal Integration for Cascade IT Services
ZoHo SalesIQ:

Integrate Chat GPT into SalesIQ.
Configure workflows to distinguish between sales and support inquiries.
Set up ticket generation and notifications based on availability status.
Ensure operations align with business hours and exclude US holidays.
ZoHo Project:

Create and configure a project to track internal tasks, bugs, and feature requests.
Keep the project active for future use, ensuring flexibility for ongoing work.
ZoHo Contracts & Sign:

Automate MSAs and SOWs using CRM lead conversion triggers.
Configure templates for annual updates requiring customer re-signing.
ZoHo Analytics:

Develop dashboards to track internal service delivery metrics, such as time spent on support by customer and subscription breakdowns.
Subscriptions & Billing:

Build public sign-up pages and customer portals for internal MSP services.
Configure invoicing processes with draft mode for manual review before dispatch.
ZoHo Marketing & Sales Automation:

Create segmented email lists and templates for marketing campaigns.
Set up automated follow-ups for customer engagement.
ZoHo Desk:

Configure SLAs, notification workflows, and dashboards to optimize ticket management.
Customer Portal:

Design a unified portal for customers to access agreements, invoices, support tutorials, and ZoHo Assist.
Integrate ZoHo WorkDrive for document sharing and uploads.
ZoHo Inventory:

Track MSP licenses for internal customers based on subscription type (free vs. paid).
ZoHo Books & Desk Integration:

Design workflows to reflect ticket activities on invoices with appropriate billing or as informational logs.
ZoHo & NinjaOne Integration:

Develop automated reporting and workflows to generate ZoHo Desk tickets from NinjaOne Help Request Form submissions.
ZoHo Learn:

Set up ZoHo Learn and document all implemented features in ZoHo Wiki for future reference.

Customer ZoHo Migrations
Collaborate with clients to understand their unique business needs and tailor ZoHo migrations accordingly.
Guide customers through the implementation and migration process, including data transfer and workflow customization.
Develop and document ZoHo workflows for clients to ensure smooth operations post-migration.
Provide training and support for customers to fully leverage ZoHo applications.
Serve as an ongoing resource for client questions, updates, and enhancements.

Requirements
Proven experience in ZoHo implementation, customization, and integration.
Expertise in ZoHo CRM, Desk, Projects, Books, Analytics, and other ZoHo apps.
Strong understanding of workflow automation, reporting, and integrations (e.g., NinjaOne).
Ability to manage internal and client-facing projects simultaneously.
Excellent communication skills for guiding clients and collaborating with teams.
Cost-conscious approach to ensure efficient solutions for both internal use and client migrations.

Preferred Qualifications
Experience working with Managed Service Providers (MSPs).
Familiarity with NinjaOne or similar RMM tools.
Strong documentation and training skills, particularly using ZoHo Learn or ZoHo Wiki.

What We Offer
Flexible, remote work environment.
Opportunity for long-term engagement for ongoing maintenance, feature enhancements, and client support.

Please send your resume, a brief cover letter detailing your ZoHo experience, and examples of relevant projects

Thank you for considering this opportunity. We look forward to reviewing your application and discussing this exciting project!

title: Hospice Scheduler
description:
Halcyon Home, LLC is seeking a Remote Hospice Scheduler to play a crucial role in ensuring the seamless coordination and efficiency of hospice care services.

Hospice service is a specialized type of care designed to provide comfort, dignity, and support to individuals who are facing a terminal illness, typically with a prognosis of six months or less to live. The focus of hospice care is not on curing the illness but on improving the quality of life for the patient and providing support for their families. Hospice services are delivered by a team of healthcare professionals and volunteers.

About Us:
Halcyon Home is a fast-growing, central Texas-owned home health, hospice, and home care company. We emphasize hospitality and compassion to encourage positive patient outcomes for our refined, aging clients. We were voted Best in Home Health/Hospice four years running and Best in Home Care three years running by the Senior Resource Guide. We are also one of the Great Places to Work! Come join our team! Here is our website: https://halcyonhome.com

Hospice Scheduler Job Description:

1. Scheduling Staff
Assigning nurses, aides, social workers, chaplains, and other care team members to patient visits.
Coordinating schedules to ensure coverage for patient care needs, including after-hours and weekend shifts.
Managing changes to schedules due to call-outs, emergencies, or patient needs.

2. Communicating with Care Teams
Acting as a liaison between the hospice care team and the office staff.
Informing team members of schedule changes, patient updates, and other essential details.

3. Patient and Family Coordination
Ensuring that patients and their families are informed about scheduled visits.
Responding to patient or family requests for rescheduling or additional visits.

4. Administrative Duties
Maintaining accurate records of staff schedules, patient visits, and time logs.
Tracking compliance with visit frequency and care plans as outlined in patients’ care plans.
Utilizing scheduling software or systems to streamline operations.

5. Problem-Solving
Handling unexpected changes, such as urgent patient needs or staff absences.
Prioritizing visits based on the severity of patient needs.

Key Skills for a Hospice Scheduler:
1. Strong Organizational Skills: To manage complex schedules and adapt to changes efficiently.
2. Communication Skills: To coordinate with multiple stakeholders, including patients, families, and team members.
3. Empathy and Compassion: Understanding the sensitive nature of hospice care and its impact on patients and families.
4. Problem-Solving: Ability to manage conflicts and find quick solutions for scheduling issues.
5. Tech-Savvy: Familiarity with scheduling software, healthcare systems, and basic administrative tools.

This role is critical in ensuring that patients receive timely and compassionate care while supporting the care team’s efficiency and morale.

Schedule: Monday to Friday, 8:30 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. Central Time
Experience: At least one year of experience in Hospice.

title: Executive Virtual Assistant (Organized with GREAT personality)
description:
Kindly READ the instructions before submitting.

To START your application, send your CV and a 2-minute video recording introducing yourself. Send it over to ressa.i@prolianceinc.com


We are seeking an experienced and dynamic Executive Assistant to join our team. The role of the Executive Assistant is very important as you will be responsible for managing calendars, responding to emails, organizing documents, and other administrative tasks that will help the CEO and the operation be more efficient

Requirements: 
**Solid experience as an Executive Assistant, Personal Assistant or any similar positions
**Excellent organizational and time management skills
**Can work and think independently
**Motivated, proactive and solution-oriented
**Ability to pivot in any situation and deliver results
**Great verbal and written communication skills
**Knowledgeable with different applications (Zoom, Google Calendar, etc)
**Outgoing, with great energy and positive personality


How can you help the team? 
**Email Management: Filter and prioritize your emails, respond to routine inquiries, and flag important messages for your attention.
**Calendar Management: Schedule and reschedule appointments, meetings, and travel arrangements, ensuring calendars are **well-organized and optimized.
**Travel Planning: Handle all aspects of travel planning, including booking flights, accommodations, transportation, and creating detailed itineraries.
**Meeting Preparation: Gather necessary documents, reports, and materials for meetings, ensuring you're well-prepared and can focus on the content of the meeting itself.
**Task and Project Management: Track tasks, set deadlines, and follow up on project progress, making sure nothing falls through the cracks.
**Research: Conduct research on various topics, helping you gather information quickly and efficiently for decision-making.
**Document Management: Organize and maintain your digital and physical files, making it easy for you to access important documents when needed.
**Expense Management: Track expenses, create expense reports, and ensure all financial matters are well-documented and managed.
**Personal Tasks: Some personal tasks, such as managing personal appointments, organizing home/investment-related matters, purchases, coordination, etc.
**Communication Liaison: Can serve as a point of contact between other team members or external parties, streamlining communication channels.
**Prioritization:  Identify high-priority tasks and delegate or defer less important ones, ensuring focus on what truly matters.

title: Financial Specialist/Analyst
description:
** Candidate must have worked in the Financial Industry
** Experience in FINTECH is required
**Remote in Manila, Cebu Onsite
**Onboarding January 2025

WE ARE
A well-funded and highly experienced FinTech startup composed of Wall Street and Silicon Valley veterans. Utilizing decades of experience from trading floors and global financial markets to the leading edge of artificial intelligence, we have created a new type of trading platform that opens investment opportunities to all investors, not just accredited.


YOU ARE
A skilled Financial Analyst with a deep understanding of financial processes, analytics, and the critical role of data in decision making. Your experience in auditing financial and legal documents for institutions like US banks, lenders, and real estate brokers has equipped you with a critical eye for compliance and regulatory standards. Beyond technical skills, you’re a proactive problem solver who thrives in fast-paced, high-stakes environments. Driven by curiosity and a growth mindset, you’re eager to make an impact in a startup that values innovation, agility, and excellence, and you’re ready to contribute to a mission that redefines the future of finance


THE JOB
As a Financial Analyst, you will play a pivotal role in analyzing, appraising, and auditing financial data and reports to provide insights that inform strategic decisions. You will evaluate and audit financial and legal documents, focusing on the US commercial real estate sector, to ensure accuracy and regulatory compliance. Working closely with senior finance and data analysis teams, you will help maintain the integrity of financial data and contribute to shaping our financial strategy.


RESPONSIBILITIES:

Conduct detailed financial analysis, including appraisals of commercial real estate properties, such as offices, shopping centers, multifamily, and retail.
Review, analyze, and audit financial statements and legal documents, ensuring compliance and accuracy for transactions related to US banks, lenders, and real estate brokers.
Provide insights on financial data trends and collaborate with cross-functional teams to support the development of financial forecasts and strategies.
Prepare reports and presentations, conveying complex data in a clear and actionable way to support senior management in decision-making.
Identify and interpret patterns in financial data to improve processes, optimize performance, and mitigate potential risks.
Stay up-to-date on financial regulations and trends impacting the commercial real estate sector.



REQUIREMENTS

Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Accounting, Economics, or a related field.
3+ years of experience as a Financial Analyst, preferably within the commercial real estate or banking sector.
Demonstrated experience working with US banks on appraisals for commercial real estate properties (offices, shopping centers, multifamily, retail, etc.).
Background in auditing financial and legal documents for US banks, lenders, or real estate brokers.
Proficiency in financial analysis and modeling tools, including Excel (advanced functions), and financial ERP systems like SAP or Oracle.
Experience with analytics and visualization tools such as Power BI, Tableau, and SQL for creating and interpreting data-driven financial insights.
Strong analytical skills with a high level of attention to detail.
Ability to convey complex financial concepts in a clear, concise manner to non-finance stakeholders.
Self-motivated team player with the ability to thrive in a dynamic startup environment.

PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS:
Specific experience with US multifamily (apartment-focused) commercial real estate companies, especially in reviewing financial and critical transaction documents.
Experience collaborating with data analysts to refine document accuracy after AI-driven initial reviews.

title: Database Manager (Facebook Scraper)
description:
We are seeking a skilled and tech-savvy Database Manager with prior experience or technical expertise in working with social media data scraping tools. Your role will involve conducting Facebook searches and scraping profile links from specified gameroom-related fanpages, groups, and individuals, and then organizing the data in Google Sheets for our outreach efforts.

Responsibilities:
 • Use provided gameroom names to search Facebook for people, fanpages, and groups.
 • Employ data scraping tools (such as Daraminder, Scalping, and other scraper tools) to gather Facebook profile links accurately and efficiently.
 • Organize and structure data in Google Sheets with clear labeling and separate tabs for:
 • Gameroom Fanpages
 • Gameroom People
 • Gameroom Groups
 • Ensure each sheet has the following columns: Name, Facebook URL, Status (? if lead received a text), and Response (copy/paste what the lead responded).
 • Scrape active users who have posted, liked, commented, or left reviews on specified groups and fanpages, and organize them under tabs for:
 • Reviews Given
 • Likes Left on Feed
 • Comments
 • Shares
 • Posts (in Groups)
 • Filter and remove any non-relevant or fake profiles, excluding profiles with non-American or non-Hispanic names, no posts, or other suspicious signs.

Requirements:
 • Prior experience or technical expertise with social media data scraping tools is essential.
 • Proficiency in using tools like Daraminder, Scalping, and other relevant scraper software.
 • Strong organizational skills to structure and manage data effectively in Google Sheets or Microsoft Excel.
 • Keen attention to detail to filter out fake profiles and ensure data accuracy.
 • Familiarity with Facebook search and group functionalities.

Preferred Qualifications:
 • Tech Savvy
 • Experience with social media data scraping and lead generation projects.
 • Knowledge of the Facebook ecosystem.
 • Ability to manage and work efficiently with large volumes of data.
        •   Ability to create custom recipes for web data pasing and scraping

How to Apply:
Please submit your application in telegram at @internetslots username, detailing your experience with social media/ Facebook scraping tools or providing examples of how you would do this job if you're tech savvy.

title: E-commerce Supply Chain Manager (Life Changing Opportunity)
description:
We are looking for a Data Entry Specialist & Supply Chain Manager for our dropshipping store.

Your role will primarily involve accurate data management and overseeing the supply chain to ensure smooth operations. Please include the word blue in your application so I can see that you have attention to detail.

Key Responsibilities:
Address Error Resolution:

Identify and address errors in shipping addresses promptly.
Work with the customer service team to contact customers and update order information to avoid delays.
Issue refunds if address issues are not resolved within seven days.
Inventory and Variant Management:

Monitor out-of-stock products and coordinate with suppliers to check stock status.
Request similar product alternatives and communicate options to customers.
Update product listings on Facebook or Google and remove unavailable items from the store.
Order Fulfillment & Supplier Communication:

Conduct daily reviews of unfulfilled orders and communicate with suppliers to ensure timely processing.
Follow up on delayed orders, emphasizing urgency to prevent customer disputes.
Maintain regular communication with the customer service agency and fulfillment agents to resolve order issues.
Quality Control & Scaling:

Request quality checks from suppliers, especially when scaling up.
Monitor product quality and address issues proactively to maintain high standards.
Strategize price reduction requests based on sales volume and negotiate better prices with suppliers.
Dispute and Refund Management:

Handle refunds for orders with unresolved address issues or unavailable product variants.
Manage disputes for returned or refused orders, implementing a policy to minimize financial losses.
Document all communications and actions taken to track order issues effectively.
Price Reduction & Cost Savings:

Request price reductions from suppliers as sales volumes increase.
Track cost savings and document achievements, receiving a 10% royalty on all savings made.
Team Coordination:

Collaborate with the customer service team to manage customer inquiries and order issues.
Ensure smooth communication between all teams to minimize disputes and maintain high customer satisfaction.

Requirements:
Experience: Prior experience in supply chain management, e-commerce, or dropshipping is required.
Attention to Detail: Strong ability to manage and track multiple tasks accurately and efficiently.
Problem-Solving Skills: Quick thinker with a proactive approach to resolving supply chain challenges.
Communication: Excellent written and verbal communication skills to effectively interact with suppliers and team members.
Organization: Highly organized, able to prioritize tasks and manage daily responsibilities efficiently.
Tech-Savvy: Proficient in using tools like Shopify, Facebook Ads Manager, and Google Sheets.
Benefits:
Long-Term Position: We are looking for someone committed to growing with us for at least six months, with a testing period of 1-2 months.
Performance-Based Incentives: Earn a 10% royalty on all cost savings achieved through successful price negotiations and supplier management.

In your motivation additionally mention what you studied in college/university.

title: LF: Amazon Product Research and Listing Specialist (FBA and FBM)
description:
Job Title: Amazon Product Research and Listing Specialist

Company Overview:
American Wholesaler is a dynamic e-commerce business dedicated to delivering high-quality products to customers through online platforms. As we continue to expand our presence on Amazon, we are seeking a motivated and detail-oriented individual to join our team as an Amazon Product Research and Listing Specialist.

Job Overview:
As an Amazon Product Research and Listing Specialist, you will play a crucial role in driving the success of our Amazon marketplace operations. You will be responsible for conducting comprehensive product research, optimizing product listings, and implementing strategies to enhance visibility, conversion rates, and overall sales performance.

Key Responsibilities:

Product Research:

- Conduct thorough market research to identify trending products, niche opportunities, and potential competitors on Amazon.
Analyze sales trends, customer reviews, and keyword search volumes to inform product selection and decision-making.
Utilize tools such as Jungle Scout, Helium 10, and AMZScout to gather data and insights for product research.
Listing Optimization:

- Create compelling and informative product listings that highlight key features, benefits, and unique selling points.
Optimize product titles, bullet points, descriptions, and backend keywords to improve search visibility and ranking.
Ensure listings adhere to Amazon's guidelines and best practices for enhanced discoverability and conversion.
Keyword Research and SEO:

- Conduct keyword research to identify relevant and high-converting search terms for inclusion in product listings.
Implement SEO strategies to improve organic search rankings and drive traffic to product pages.
Monitor and adjust keyword strategies based on performance metrics and algorithm updates.
Competitor Analysis:

- Monitor competitor activity and pricing strategies to identify opportunities for competitive advantage.
Benchmark product listings against competitors to identify areas for improvement and differentiation.
Stay abreast of industry trends, market dynamics, and changes in Amazon's algorithm to inform strategy.
Performance Tracking and Reporting:

- Monitor key performance metrics, including sales, conversion rates, and traffic, to evaluate the effectiveness of product listings.
Generate regular reports and analytics to track progress, identify trends, and make data-driven recommendations for optimization.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement strategies for continuous improvement and growth.

Qualifications:

- At least 6 months of experience with FBA product research.
- Proficiency in using tools such as:
- Keepa
- Azinsight
- SAS
- Catalog scraping tool

- Experience with both FBA and FBM wholesale sourcing and manual lead-finding methods.
- Ability to identify suitable brands and distributors.
- Adaptability to criteria and guidelines provided.
- Ability to work effectively under pressure and meet tight deadlines.


For all interested applicants, kindly send us your updated Resume and Viber number.
Send it to chad.malapaya@prostaffph.com

title: General Admin Virtual Assistant

Job Opportunity: General Admin Virtual Assistant at QuC Media
Are you passionate and eager to join an agency where your growth and impact truly matter? ????

Staying up-to-date with the latest technologies and industry best practices.

Opportunities for professional growth and skill development.

Exposure to cutting-edge technologies and projects.
A supportive team of experts in their respective fields.
Room for career advancements and leadership positions for high performers.

Excellent problem-solving, communication, and teamwork skills. 
Impeccable English
Detail-oriented
Self-motivated problem solver
Good at following instructions
Self-managed and disciplined

How to Apply:

Join us in creating cutting-edge web experiences that make a difference. Be a part of the Doublewood team and help us build the future of technology.

title: Senior Amazon Advertising Account Manager and Marketing Strategist
description:
Job Overview
Are you a detail-oriented professional with a knack for making sound judgments and the determination to see tasks through to completion? Do you excel at analyzing data, identifying trends, and implementing strategies that drive exceptional results? If you have a passion for ensuring client success through strategic insight and relentless execution, we want to hear from you!

At Amazon Wizards, we simplify Amazon growth for 7-9 figure brands using our Plug'n'Play full-service strategy and AI-powered insights. As a Customer Success Manager, you'll play a pivotal role in defining strategies, enhancing client satisfaction, and driving exceptional results. You'll collaborate closely with our team to ensure our clients not only meet but exceed their goals.

Important: Applications from candidates who do not read the job overview carefully will be ignored.

This Role Is Designed for Individuals Who:
- Seek a role where they can make a significant impact on client success.
- Are passionate about Amazon advertising and marketing.
- Thrive in roles that require both strategic thinking and hands-on execution.
- Are persistent and dedicated to seeing tasks and projects through to completion.
- Can manage multiple priorities while maintaining attention to detail.
- Are effective communicators who build strong relationships with clients.
- Are comfortable taking the initiative to solve problems and implement solutions.

Key Responsibilities
- Performance Monitoring and Analysis
- Regularly review key performance metrics
- Identify trends, anomalies, and opportunities for improvement.
- Use discernment to make data-driven decisions and adjust strategies accordingly.
- Proactively identify issues that could impact client success and implement solutions promptly.
- Collaborate with our in-house Data Analyst to create comprehensive reports summarizing performance and actionable insights.

Strategic Planning and Execution
- Develop effective Amazon marketing strategies that align with client objectives.
- Continuously seek ways to improve workflows and systems for greater efficiency.
- Document best practices and standard operating procedures.
- Create hypotheses for A/B tests and execute them with our design team.
- Improve existing marketing strategies and develop them further.

Client Relationship Management
- Serve as the primary point of contact for assigned clients, building strong, long-term relationships.
- Provide clear, insightful updates and recommendations to clients.
- Respond promptly to client inquiries, ensuring high levels of client satisfaction.

Team Collaboration
- Collaborate with team members to align on priorities and objectives.
- Work closely with the design department to maximize our clients' success on Amazon.

Required Qualifications
- Education and Experience
- Minimum of 2 years of experience in customer success, account management, or a similar role within the e-commerce or digital marketing industry.
- Proven experience with Amazon Seller Central, PPC advertising, SEO optimization, and related tools.
- Familiarity with flat files and troubleshooting on Amazon.


Skills and Attributes
- Discernment: Strong ability to evaluate data, make informed decisions, and adjust strategies accordingly.
- Tenacity: Demonstrated track record of seeing tasks and projects through to completion.
- Strategic thinking with the ability to develop effective advertising strategies that drive client success.
- Excellent analytical skills with attention to detail.
- Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills.
- Ability to work independently and manage multiple client accounts.
- Proficiency in data analysis tools and platforms.

Personal Traits
- Strategic Thinker: Able to connect data insights to strategic actions.
- Results-Driven: Motivated by achieving goals and delivering exceptional results.
- Proactive Problem Solver: Takes initiative to identify and resolve issues before they escalate.
- Dependable and Reliable: Consistently follows through on commitments.
- Collaborative: Works well within a team, supporting and motivating others when needed.
- Adaptable: Flexible in adjusting strategies based on changing circumstances.
- Thrives in a Fast-Paced Environment: Comfortable in a dynamic work setting.


Why Join Us?
- Innovative Environment: Work with cutting-edge AI technology that's leading the way in Amazon marketing.
- Impactful Role: Directly influence the growth and success of high-performing brands.
- Collaborative Culture: Join a team that values open communication, mutual support, and continuous learning.
- Professional Growth: Opportunities for advancement as we expand and scale our operations.
- Dynamic and Diverse Team: Be part of an international team that fosters creativity and innovation.
- Flexible Work: Fully remote work with flexible scheduling.

Application Instructions: To confirm that you've read the full job overview, please start your application message with the word "WizardSuccess".


This Role May Not Be the Best Fit for Individuals Who:
- Prefer roles focused solely on creative idea generation without execution.
- Do not enjoy working with data or detailed analysis.
- May struggle with following through on tasks to completion.
- Prefer to avoid direct client interaction and relationship management.
- Are uncomfortable taking on both strategic and operational responsibilities.

title: Digital and Webinar Marketing Manager
description:
Job Summary
We're seeking an experienced Social Media and Webinar Marketing Manager to develop and implement innovative online marketing strategies, promoting our brand, products/services, and webinars. The ideal candidate will excel in social media management, content creation, webinar production, and data analysis.

Key Responsibilities
Social Media Management
Develop and execute social media strategies to boost brand awareness, engagement, and lead generation.
Manage social media accounts (Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram, YouTube).
Create and curate high-quality, engaging content (graphics, videos, posts).
Monitor analytics and adjust strategies accordingly.

Webinar Marketing
Plan, promote, and execute webinars from concept to delivery.
Collaborate with internal teams to develop webinar content, agendas, and speaker selection.
Design and distribute promotional materials (email invitations, social media posts, banners).
Ensure seamless webinar execution, technical setup, and attendee experience.
Content Creation
Develop compelling blog posts, articles, and email newsletters.
Design visual elements (infographics, banners, social media graphics).
Optimize content for SEO.
 
Email Marketing
Craft and send targeted email campaigns to promote webinars, products/services.
Manage email lists, segmentation, and automation.
Analytics and Reporting
Track social media, webinar, and email marketing metrics (engagement, conversion rates).
Analyze data to inform future marketing strategies.
Provide regular performance reports.
Collaboration and Project Management
Work closely with cross-functional teams (marketing, sales, product).
Manage projects, timelines, and budgets.
Industry Trends and Best Practices
Stay updated on social media, webinar marketing, and industry trends.
Apply best practices to continuously improve marketing efforts.
Requirements
Education: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or related field.
Experience: 1+ years in social media marketing, webinar management, or digital marketing.

Skills:
Social media platforms (organic and paid advertising).
Webinar software (e.g., Zoom, GoToWebinar). 
Email marketing tools (e.g., Mailchimp, Constant Contact).
Content creation (writing, graphic design, video editing).
Analytics tools (Google Analytics, social media insights).
Project management tools (Asana)

Soft Skills:
Excellent communication, writing, and presentation skills.
Strategic thinking, creativity, and problem-solving.
Ability to work under deadlines and manage multiple projects.

Looking forward to talk to you.

description:

At Multipeak Marketing, we’re a full-service, Christian-based digital marketing agency focused on helping orthodontists, dentists, and related industries grow their online presence. Our team is dedicated to providing top-notch service while building meaningful relationships with our clients. We’re looking for someone who shares our heart for people and can bring their skills to the table in a big way.

Responsibilities:

- Create and manage high-converting Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, and Google Ads campaigns.
- Optimize ads for maximum lead generation and ROI.
- Manage Google My Business listings and maintain consistent brand messaging across multiple platforms.
- Perform A/B testing to improve ad performance.
- Create and manage GoHighLevel automation and lead nurturing.
- Monitor ad performance and make adjustments to ensure targets are met.
- Collaborate with the team to implement creative strategies that lead to successful campaigns.

Requirements:

- Proven experience running successful Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, and Google Ads campaigns.
- Strong knowledge of paid social and search ad strategies.
- Deep GoHighLevel automation experience.
- Familiarity with Google My Business management.
- Creative thinker who is passionate about generating leads and optimizing campaigns for success.
- Ability to work independently and take initiative.
- Extremely fluent in English.

What We Offer:

- A positive, kingdom-focused work environment.
- Morning Bible studies to start our days.
- Opportunities for personal and professional growth.
- Flexible remote work.

How to Apply:
Please send us an email with a video and resume explaining why you would be a perfect fit for this position at tyler@multipeakmarketing.com. Show us your passion and let us know why you want to work with us at Multipeak Marketing. If you’re someone who goes the extra mile, we want to hear from you!

title: Software Developer
description:
Software Developer

Role Overview:
We are looking for a passionate and skilled Software Developer to join our team. If you thrive on coding, problem-solving, and creating efficient systems, we’d love to hear from you!

• Write, test, and maintain software applications using modern programming languages.
• Implement new features and update existing applications to enhance functionality.

• Manage and integrate relational databases (e.g., MySQL).

• Integrate third-party systems like payment gateways or CRM tools.
• Develop and maintain APIs to enable communication between applications.

Job Overview:
We are seeking a highly skilled HRIS Lead to join our team in the Philippines. As the HRIS Lead, you will be responsible for overseeing the implementation, maintenance, and optimization of our HRIS (Human Resources Information System) to support the organization's HR functions. You will collaborate closely with HR professionals, IT teams, and stakeholders to ensure the HRIS meets the organization's needs and contributes to the overall efficiency and effectiveness of HR processes.

Role and Responsibilities:
1. Lead the implementation and configuration of the HRIS platform, ensuring alignment with organizational goals and requirements.
2. Serve as the primary point of contact for HRIS-related inquiries, issues, and escalations, providing timely resolution and support to users.
3. Develop and maintain HRIS policies, procedures, and documentation, ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements and best practices.
4. Collaborate with HR and IT teams to identify opportunities for process improvements and automation within the HRIS, streamlining workflows and enhancing user experience.
5. Conduct regular audits of HRIS data to ensure accuracy, completeness, and data integrity, implementing corrective actions as needed.
6. Provide training and support to HR staff and end-users on HRIS functionalities, features, and best practices.
7. Stay informed about emerging trends and technologies in HRIS and make recommendations for system enhancements or upgrades.
8. Lead or participate in HRIS-related projects, including system upgrades, integrations, and enhancements, from planning to implementation phases.
9. Act as a liaison between HR, IT, and external vendors to resolve technical issues, coordinate system updates, and manage vendor relationships.
10. Monitor HRIS performance and usage metrics, generating reports and analysis to inform decision-making and improve system effectiveness.

If you’re ready to take the next step in your career and be part of a supportive team, apply now and join us at Moder Solution!

title: CIVIL 3D MODELER
description:
This role is ideal for ambitious Civil 3D experts looking to specialize in U.S.-based land development. As a Civil 3D expert at Subdiviso, you will:
Plan residential subdivisions in Civil 3D, splitting and subdividing parcels in line with U.S. county/city ordinances.
Design grading and drainage systems in Civil 3D, integrating them with InfoDrainage software for stormwater network management.
Develop internal automation processes, using Python to access Civil 3D’s API and build efficiency into the workflow.
Conduct in-depth research on U.S. zoning and subdivision ordinances, studying regulatory documents to ensure compliance.
Help train the next wave of interns and entry-level modelers, leading live training sessions and developing educational resources.
What you will be doing:
1.LOT/Parcel subdivision planning and designing in civil 3d
2.Survey plat from Legal description/deed and GIS datasets of Parcel from county parcel websites. 
3.Grading design in civil 3D and storm water network management in info drain

title: IT, Customer Operations & Social Media Administrator
description:
Role Overview:

The IT, Customer Operations & Social Media Administrator plays a critical role in ensuring the seamless operation of your business by managing and integrating key software tools. You will be responsible for managing customer interactions, ensuring financial data is aligned, overseeing marketing efforts, and providing exceptional customer service. Additionally, you will handle website updates, social media, and other operational tasks to support growth and ensure everything is running efficiently. This includes creating accounts and fully customizing Salesforce, RingCentral, Jobber, QuickBooks, DocuSign, Mailchimp, and Postalytics to reflect the company’s brand. You will also be responsible for automating processes, integrating systems via tools like Zapier, and ensuring every account, template, and workflow is aligned with our branding and operational needs. In addition, you will manage customer inquiries, ensure contracts are signed and understood, handle financial processes, and use Microsoft Teams to communicate with the team and clients.

Key Responsibilities:
 1. Software Integration & Customization
You will ensure that all tools are fully integrated and customized to align with our company’s branding and operational needs:
 • Salesforce (CRM): Implement and customize Salesforce as the central hub for all customer and lead data. This includes creating a Salesforce account, configuring it to reflect our brand, and integrating it with other systems (Jobber, QuickBooks, Mailchimp, etc.). Automate lead entry using tools like CSV imports, Data Loader, Web-to-Lead forms, and third-party integrations (e.g., Zapier) to streamline data capture and workflows.
 • RingCentral (Telecom & Communication): Set up and integrate RingCentral with Salesforce to manage calls, SMS, and email communication. Ensure all customer interactions are logged automatically for easy tracking and better customer service.
 • Jobber (Field Service Management): Create a Jobber account and fully customize it for job scheduling, dispatching, invoicing, and client communications, ensuring everything aligns with our branding. Templates for quotes, invoices, and dispatching must reflect the company’s style and operational needs.
 • QuickBooks (Accounting & Financial Management): Create and configure a QuickBooks account, setting up all templates for invoicing, quotes, billing, and financial reporting to match our brand. Integrate QuickBooks with Salesforce, Jobber, and RingCentral for accurate and streamlined financial data.
 • DocuSign (Electronic Signatures): Integrate DocuSign with Salesforce to handle contracts, service agreements, and other legal documents, ensuring smooth e-signature workflows that sync with client records.
 • Mailchimp (Email Marketing): Customize and integrate Mailchimp with Salesforce for email marketing campaigns, including automated follow-ups, promotions, and customer segmentation.
 • Postalytics (Direct Mail Campaigns): Create a Postalytics account and fully customize it to our brand, including setting up templates for personalized postcards, flyers, and direct mail campaigns. Automate direct mail processes using integrations with Salesforce.
 2. Automation & Data Import:
 • Automate lead entry and data imports into Salesforce using methods like CSV file uploads, Data Loader, and third-party integrations (e.g., Zapier).
 • Set up Web-to-Lead forms for automated lead capture from the website, ensuring that leads are added directly to Salesforce without manual data entry.
 • Integrate Salesforce with Zapier to connect with external platforms and tools, allowing for seamless data flow and eliminating manual data entry.
 3. Customer Contract Management & Follow-up:
 • Ensure customers sign and understand contracts, service agreements, and legal documents using DocuSign. Follow up to ensure that all necessary signatures are obtained in a timely manner.
 • Provide clear communication to customers about contract terms, addressing any questions or concerns they may have before signing.
 • Follow up with customers to ensure they fully understand the scope of services and the terms of the agreement before project initiation.
 4. Website Management & Maintenance
 • Website Updates: Make regular updates to the company’s website, ensuring that content is fresh, accurate, and aligned with the company’s brand identity.
 • Brand Consistency: Ensure the website’s design and content reflect the brand’s voice, and make sure the user experience is optimized across all devices.
 5. Financial Management & Oversight
 • Invoicing & Payments: Ensure accurate invoicing in QuickBooks, matching job details from Jobber and syncing with Salesforce for customer records. Ensure timely payment collection and follow up on overdue invoices.
 • Reconciliation: Monitor financial data, ensuring synchronization across QuickBooks, Jobber, and Salesforce to keep track of income, expenses, payroll, and invoicing.
 • Financial Reports: Generate reports from QuickBooks to assess business financial health, and ensure the data is aligned with the company’s income and expenses.
 6. Customer Service & Task Coordination
 • Lead Management: Manage new leads in Salesforce, ensuring they are entered into the system and tracked through the sales pipeline. Automate follow-ups and ensure conversion to customers.
 • Task Coordination: Manage and assign tasks to internal team members or freelancers using tools like Trello or Asana. Track progress and ensure that all tasks are completed on time.
 • Customer Inquiries: Provide timely responses to customer inquiries via phone (RingCentral), email, or text, ensuring professional communication and resolution of any issues.
 • Client Account Management: Maintain up-to-date customer profiles in Salesforce, ensuring accurate communication and record-keeping.
 7. Social Media & Marketing Management
 • Social Media Posts: Create and schedule regular posts on social media (primarily Facebook), ensuring content is professional, brand-aligned, and engaging for both residential and commercial clients.
 • Paid Advertising: Design and manage paid social media campaigns on Facebook, ensuring the targeting and messaging aligns with the business’s goals.
 • Email Marketing: Develop and execute email marketing campaigns using Mailchimp, segmenting lists for personalized outreach to residential and commercial clients.
 • Direct Mail Campaigns: Utilize Postalytics to create and send direct mail campaigns targeting both residential and commercial clients.
 • Marketing Automation: Integrate Salesforce with Mailchimp and Postalytics to automate marketing tasks, from follow-up emails to direct mail, ensuring consistent client engagement.
 8. Administrative Support & Reporting
 • Job Scheduling: Manage job scheduling in Jobber, ensuring assignments are clear and clients are notified of job statuses.
 • Reports: Generate daily, weekly, and monthly reports for operations, finances, marketing performance, and customer service.
 • System Health Checks: Regularly monitor all integrated systems (Salesforce, Jobber, QuickBooks, etc.) to ensure they are functioning smoothly and troubleshoot issues as needed.
 9. System Monitoring & Troubleshooting
 • System Integration: Continuously monitor the integration between Salesforce, RingCentral, Jobber, QuickBooks, DocuSign, Mailchimp, and Postalytics to ensure all systems are working together seamlessly.
 • Troubleshooting: Identify issues in workflows or data syncing between tools, and resolve problems quickly to maintain smooth operations.
 10. Communication & Meetings

 • Utilize Microsoft Teams for internal meetings, calls, and updates. Ensure timely communication and regular check-ins with the team on key tasks, project updates, and system issues.
 • Attend meetings to provide progress updates and report on system integrations, customer inquiries, financial data, and marketing campaigns.

Key Skills & Qualifications:
 • Technical Skills:
 • Expertise with Salesforce, QuickBooks, Jobber, RingCentral, Mailchimp, DocuSign, and Postalytics.
 • Proven ability to create and customize accounts and templates across systems like QuickBooks, Jobber, and Postalytics to align with business needs.
 • Experience with automation tools like Zapier and Data Loader to efficiently manage data flow between platforms.
 • Experience with WordPress or other website management tools for basic updates.
 • Financial Management:
 • Proficiency in QuickBooks for invoicing, financial reporting, and payroll.
 • Ability to reconcile financial data across systems and ensure accurate billing.

title: Bilingual Virtual Personal Assistant (English & Italian) for Finance Creator
description:
Are you an organized, proactive individual with a passion for digital content and personal finance? We’re seeking a Virtual Assistant to join Smart Money, a YouTube channel dedicated to helping Italians improve their financial lives through budgeting, saving, and financial literacy. This role is ideal for someone who thrives on managing details, loves staying organized, and has an interest in supporting content that makes a real impact.

What You’ll Do:

Project Coordination & Management
Track and monitor progress on multiple projects, including YouTube channel growth, website development, and community engagement.
Coordinate with freelancers, such as video editors and designers, to keep tasks on schedule and within budget.
Maintain an organized content calendar, ensuring all deliverables meet deadlines.

Content Management & Scheduling
Handle scheduling and uploading of YouTube videos, blog posts, and newsletter issues.
Prepare content for publication, including adding descriptions, tags, and thumbnails as needed.
Maintain consistency in content publication across all platforms.

Research & Community Engagement
Conduct preliminary research on trending topics in Italian personal finance, budgeting, and saving.
Monitor comments on YouTube and social media, responding to viewer inquiries and building positive engagement with the audience.

Basic Automation & Task Streamlining
Assist in setting up and managing simple automation systems (e.g., Google Sheets, `Make) to streamline workflows.
Help track and monitor personal development goals related to Lifebook, setting up reminders, and recording progress.

General Administrative Support
Handle email inquiries, assist with outreach efforts, and organize files. (Daily tasks will be provided).
Manage task lists, providing regular updates on project status and potential areas for improvement.

Qualifications:
Previous experience as a Virtual Assistant or Project Coordinator is preferred.
Proficient with task management tools (e.g., Notion) and Google Workspace.
Basic knowledge of YouTube and social media platforms; experience with video content management is a plus.
Fluent in English and conversational or fluent Italian (understanding Italian is a bonus for managing community interactions).
Excellent organizational skills, proactive approach, and attention to detail.

What You’ll Gain:
Be part of a growing brand with a mission to empower Italians to take control of their finances.
Flexibility to work remotely with a schedule that suits you.

Opportunity to grow as the channel expands, with potential for increased responsibilities and hours.
Special Request: To ensure you’ve read the job description thoroughly, please include the word “avocado” in your application.

title: IFS ERP Developer
description:
Company Overview:

Net Value Partners is a managed services company that provides custom-tailored business solutions for private companies. We leverage opportunities presented by emerging technologies and global talent to generate value for our clients. Our holistic approach sets NetVP apart—we become an extension of our customers, enabling them to focus on their core competencies and generate long-term value.

We specifically target businesses outside the technology sector, aiming to provide a comprehensive suite of shared services as a managed service, including IT, marketing, financial analysis, strategy, automation, due diligence, and research.

About the Role:

We are seeking a skilled IFS ERP Developer to join our team and play a pivotal role in designing, developing, and maintaining customized solutions within the IFS ERP system. The ideal candidate will work closely with business stakeholders, functional teams, and IT staff to enhance system functionality, optimize processes, and support the implementation of new modules.

Key Responsibilities:
System Development:
    - Customize and extend the functionality of the IFS ERP system using IFS Development Tools (IFS Applications, IFS Aurena, and related tools).
    - Develop custom reports, scripts, and dashboards to meet business requirements.
Integration:
    - Design and implement integrations between IFS ERP and other enterprise systems using APIs and middleware solutions.
    - Ensure seamless data flow and synchronization across systems.
Technical Support & Maintenance:
    - Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues within the IFS ERP environment.
    - Maintain system performance and apply patches or upgrades as needed.
Collaboration:
    - Work closely with cross-functional teams to gather and analyze requirements.
    - Translate business needs into technical solutions and system enhancements.
Documentation:
    - Create and maintain technical documentation, including system designs, workflows, and user guides.
    - Ensure code quality and adherence to best practices in ERP development.

Qualifications:
- Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
- years of experience working with IFS ERP, including development and customization.
- Proficiency in IFS Tools (PL/SQL, IFS Developer Studio, and Crystal Reports or other reporting tools).
- Strong understanding of ERP concepts, business processes, and data structures.
- Experience with integration technologies such as REST/SOAP APIs or middleware platforms.
- Knowledge of database management systems (e.g., Oracle).

Work closely with the software development team to ensure marketing strategies are supported by the appropriate tools, CRM systems, and website updates.

Skills & Qualifications:
Required Skills:

Expertise in using GoHighLevel for sales, marketing, and CRM automation.

Strong leadership abilities and experience managing virtual teams.

Excellent communication, organizational, and problem-solving skills.

Experience in managing a remote team across multiple disciplines (sales, marketing, telemarketing).
Strong understanding of sales funnel management and customer journey optimization.
Experience with CRM systems and other sales/marketing automation platforms is a plus.
Familiarity with data analytics and performance tracking tools.

title: ***AMAZING Webflow Developer for E-Commerce Business Needed ASAP***
description:
We are an innovative marketing company headquartered in New York, known for accelerating growth for DTC brands through strategic solutions and data-driven optimizations. We are seeking a Webflow Developer with a strong eye for design and a passion for creating high-converting, user-friendly websites. If you excel at crafting visually stunning, functional websites that align with brand goals, we’d love to hear from you!

Role Overview:
As our Webflow Developer, you will play a pivotal role in designing, developing, and optimizing websites for DTC brands. You’ll collaborate with our design, marketing, and development teams to bring creative visions to life, ensuring seamless functionality and an exceptional user experience. Your expertise will help elevate our clients' web presence, driving engagement and conversion through cutting-edge Webflow solutions.

Key Responsibilities:
Design and develop responsive, high-converting websites using Webflow, ensuring seamless user experiences across devices.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including designers, marketers, and content creators, to translate creative concepts into functional Webflow sites.
Optimize websites for speed, SEO, and accessibility, aligning with industry best practices.
Implement dynamic elements such as animations, transitions, and CMS-driven content to enhance interactivity.
Conduct regular maintenance and updates to existing Webflow sites, troubleshooting issues as they arise.
Analyze website performance using tools like Google Analytics, and make data-driven improvements to increase conversion rates and engagement.
Stay updated on the latest Webflow features, web design trends, and best practices to continuously improve website quality.
Requirements:
Proven experience designing and developing websites in Webflow, with a strong portfolio showcasing responsive and visually appealing designs.
Expertise in Webflow CMS, animations, interactions, and advanced customizations.
Solid understanding of front-end development principles (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) and their application within Webflow.
Familiarity with website performance optimization, including image compression, lazy loading, and minification.
Ability to analyze user behavior and implement data-driven improvements to boost conversion rates.
Strong design sensibility, with attention to detail and a focus on user-centered design principles.
Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to meet tight deadlines while maintaining high-quality work.
Bonus Skills:
Experience with eCommerce platforms like Shopify or integration of Webflow with third-party tools.
Familiarity with tools like Figma, Adobe XD, or Sketch for wireframing and prototyping.
Knowledge of SEO best practices, Google Analytics, or Hotjar for user behavior analysis.
Experience with automation tools like Zapier for Webflow workflows.
Why Join Us?
Collaborate with a creative and talented team dedicated to achieving growth for DTC brands.
Work on exciting projects that challenge your technical and design expertise.
Flexible remote or hybrid working arrangements for an excellent work-life balance.
Competitive salary and benefits package.
Opportunity to play a key role in elevating the online presence of top eCommerce brands.
If you’re ready to craft stunning, functional Webflow websites and make a meaningful impact for DTC brands, apply today! Your time and expertise are greatly appreciated, and we look forward to hearing from you.

title: Financial M&A Business Analyst
description:
NOTE: While this is a remote position, it must be based in the Philippines. We do not offer relocation expenses if you are not in the Philippines. Thank you for your consideration.

BASIC JOB SUMMARY
We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven professional to join our team as a Financial M&A Business Analyst. In this role, you will manage high-value deals, connect buyers and sellers, and facilitate the sale of online business assets. As the primary point of contact, you will guide transactions from start to finish, ensuring seamless deal execution while delivering exceptional client experiences.

This position combines financial expertise, business acumen, and strategic consulting to support sellers in preparing financial statements, analyzing market trends, and providing insights that drive successful outcomes. With a focus on relationship management and data-driven decision-making, you will help business owners achieve their goals while fostering long-term client trust.

If you thrive in a fast-paced environment, excel at building relationships, and are motivated by closing deals, we want to hear from you!

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
• Manage client (both buy-and-sell side) expectations through regular email updates throughout the stages of the project and via occasional Zoom meetings to discuss the process, project requirements and findings, and verification sessions, as needed
• Prepare and tweak questionnaires based on business model and client requirements
• Provide a comprehensive system-based audit and document-based verification of monthly and annual financial data and identify red flags, where possible.
• Perform competitor analysis and related industry research
• Review marketing information and traffic/user data statistics (e.g., demographics, location, source) and should be able to correlate these statistics to financial performance and provide insights
• Prepare ad hoc reports or perform ad hoc tasks
• Assess and develop new models that underpin sound business decisions from a financial and operational perspective
• Provide financial insights on the business that helps the decision-making process through detailed analysis and reporting (dashboard, visualization) - Perform business analysis and translate it to detailed reports and
• presentations
• Outline problems, opportunities, and solutions for a business
• Providing creative alternatives and recommendations to reduce costs and improve financial performance
• Assembling and summarizing data to structure sophisticated reports on financial status and risks
• Other duties as assigned.

DESIRED QUALIFICATIONS
• 3+ years of proven track record as a financial business analyst
• Excellent English communication skills both written and oral
• Excellent analytical capability, attention to detail, and ability to manage multiple work-streams
• Advanced Excel and reporting skills (dashboard, visualization)
• Self-motivated, able to work independently and within a team with strong organizational, interpersonal, and collaborative skills
• Leadership and/or managerial capabilities with previous experiences
• Strong interpersonal and leadership skills
• Creative problem-solving abilities with exceptional reading, writing, and analytical skills; candidates will be asked to complete a diagnostic test to this effect
• Excellent time management skills and the ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously

CLIENT DETAILS
The Client is the #1 platform for buying and selling online businesses, with ambitious goals to significantly scale its business. Its unique AI-based matching platform and comprehensive deal-making tools position it as a market leader.

ARE YOU A FIT?
• You possess a Think, Say, Plan, Do mindset and demonstrate this in everything.
• You are solutions-oriented.
• You thrive in a fast-paced, ambitious environment.
• You are results-driven with a positive attitude and a desire to “go the extra mile.”
• You have loads of initiative and can work autonomously while collaborating across teams.
• You love helping small business owners achieve their goals.
• You want to have some fun while making a significant impact.

PAY AND BENEFITS
The client offers a creative, solution-oriented culture. The benefits package includes competitive remuneration, generous paid time off, and commission opportunities.

ABOUT ETHOS SUPPORT
Ethos Support is a recognized global business process outsourcing (BPO) organization that delivers exceptional value. We specialize in Customer Support, Tech Support, Customer Success, and Back Office Support. Known as the world's most flexible BPO, we simplify Customer Experience (CX) processes and enable faster business scalability.

We manage our clients’ support teams' training and onboarding processes, freeing up their resources and accelerating business growth. Whether starting from scratch or enhancing an existing process, partnering with Ethos Support streamlines CX operations and provides superior customer support.

We prioritize our people, fostering a supportive work environment that reduces churn and boosts performance. Our inclusive solutions and training programs equip teams with the skills to deliver outstanding service and contribute to rapid business growth. For more information, please visit our website: www.ethossupport.com.

The role is technically challenging, and it will require you to communicate with clients and vendors over the phone or via email.
Log events, problems, and their resolutions.

What we’re looking for:

Excellent communication skills – Ability to have a comfortable conversation in English without thinking formal or technical – be a friend
Excellent attention to detail and follow-through abilities (never let it go till solved)
Demonstrable experience working with Windows systems (client/server). Ideally, enough experience with a wide range of end-user and other IT areas to solve problems that others may overlook.
We are heavy users of Office 365 and Azure, so you’ll need to have solid experience and know the fundamentals or demonstrate skills in something very similar.
Experience with MSP tools such as RMM, PSA, and similar is extremely important, as not everyone can quickly learn how to use these tools.
Essentially, you must demonstrate that you can handle even the most difficult tasks by properly setting expectations and determining the solution in a reasonable amount of time.

Willingness to go the extra mile to ensure client satisfaction.

Scripting/PowerShell experience
Mac OS use and support experience
GoogleWorkpace/etc.

- Fluency in English and Mandarin, with strong written and verbal communication skills in both languages.
- Exceptional interpersonal and communication skills, with a knack for explaining complex technical concepts in an accessible manner.
- Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple tasks simultaneously.
- Proficient in using CRM and ticketing systems like Jira, Zendesk, or similar ticketing systems is preferred for tracking and managing client interactions.

Preferred Skills:
- Client-facing Experience
- Familiarity with SaaS platforms, managed service frameworks, or business intelligence tools.
- Certification in ITIL, project management, or related disciplines.
- Experience with automation tools or processes to enhance operational efficiency.

What's in it for you?
- Permanent work-from-home setup
- HMO (reimbursement for $100/month)
- Life Insurance (reimbursement for $20/month)
- Reimbursement for Dental: $20 and Vision: $4 per month

- US Holiday Pay

title: Email Campaign Manager
description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and detail-oriented Email Marketing Specialist with expert experience in Instantly.ai and Apollo.io to drive our email outreach and campaign success. This role requires a proactive individual capable of independently managing email marketing campaigns from strategy through execution, with a focus on maintaining high deliverability, generating positive responses, and optimizing overall engagement. Previous experience in the recruitment industry is a plus, as familiarity with recruiting processes will support our outreach objectives. If you are a data-driven marketer with a passion for personalization and email deliverability, we’d love to meet you!

Responsibilities:

Domain and Email Setup:
Create and manage domains and email addresses, ensuring setup optimizes deliverability and sender reputation.

Campaign Management with Instantly.ai and Apollo.io:
Design, execute, and oversee email marketing campaigns using both Instantly.ai and Apollo.io platforms, focusing on cadence, sequences, and creating compelling, personalized templates for each stage of the customer journey.

Deliverability and Response Rate Optimization:
Implement best practices to maintain high deliverability and response rates, monitoring sender reputation and proactively addressing any issues.

Audience Segmentation and Targeting:
Build and maintain detailed audience segments to ensure emails are tailored and reach the intended audience effectively.

A/B Testing and Performance Optimization:
Conduct A/B tests for subject lines, email copy, templates, send times, and audience segments to optimize engagement and conversion rates.

Compliance and Best Practices:
Ensure all email campaigns comply with applicable laws (e.g., GDPR, CAN-SPAM) and follow industry best practices to maintain a positive sender reputation.

Analytics and Reporting:
Track and report on campaign performance metrics, such as open rates, click-through rates, and conversion rates. Generate actionable insights to improve campaign effectiveness and ROI.

List Hygiene and Management:
Regularly clean and update email lists to reduce bounce rates, prevent spam complaints, and ensure data accuracy.

Content Strategy and Copywriting:
Develop engaging, value-driven email content that aligns with our brand voice, focusing on driving client engagement and creating positive response opportunities.

Integration with CRM/Marketing Platforms:
Ensure seamless integration between Instantly.ai, Apollo.io, and CRM or other marketing automation platforms to personalize and track client interactions effectively.

Stay Updated on Industry Trends:
Monitor email marketing trends, new features in Instantly.ai and Apollo.io, and industry best practices to ensure the strategy remains cutting-edge.

Qualifications:

Proven experience with Instantly.ai and Apollo.io, including domain setup, campaign management, and deliverability best practices.
Previous experience in the recruitment industry is a plus.
Strong understanding of email marketing regulations, including GDPR and CAN-SPAM compliance.
Expertise in A/B testing, segmentation, and audience targeting.
Analytical skills to interpret metrics and data, with a track record of using insights to optimize campaigns.
Exceptional written communication skills with experience in copywriting for email campaigns.
Ability to work independently, with a proactive approach to problem-solving and optimization.

title: Junior O&M Engineer (Solar industry)
description:
RESPONSIBILITIES
- Remote Monitoring & Analysis: Continuously monitor inverter performance, solar farm health, and Battery Energy Storage System (BESS) status via a designated monitoring portal.
- Data Analysis & Reporting: Download monthly reports, analyze data to identify any performance issues with the solar farm and BESS, and generate reports.
- Troubleshooting Support: Assist in identifying and diagnosing operational issues affecting the solar farm and BESS performance, escalating complex issues to senior engineers.
- Collaboration: Communicate effectively with the Melbourne office and local field teams to coordinate solutions and repairs for both the solar farm and BESS.
- Technical Expertise: Maintain a strong understanding of solar farm operations, inverter systems, basic BESS operation, and basic troubleshooting methodologies.

QUALIFICATIONS
- Available to start immediately.
- 1-2 years of experience in providing remote support for Australian renewable energy assets (preference for experience with solar farms or Battery Energy Storage Systems (BESS)).
- Robust technical foundation, ideally with an engineering background, and the ability to comprehend technical concepts and data.
- Data analytical skills with complex data sets: proficient in Excel.
- Comprehensive understanding of safety regulations and industry standards, with a focus on Australian regulations pertinent to renewable energy.
- Excellent communication skills for interacting with trade professionals and operational experience within an Operations & Maintenance (O&M) unit, including knowledge of day-to-day activities on a renewable energy site (familiarity with Australian O&M practices is advantageous).
- Ability to manage multiple tasks and projects simultaneously, as well as maintain accurate documentation of system operations and maintenance activities.

Eligibility for Remote Work
- A device (laptop/desktop) with a minimum of at least Intel Core i-5 (or AMD equivalent) with 8GB RAM
- Minimum of 30MBPS internet speed

Nice to have qualifications:
- Knowledge of control relays and SCADA systems used in solar and BESS systems.
- Experience in the operation and maintenance of large-scale solar and Battery Energy Storage Systems.
- Proficiency in monitoring and analyzing data using Python scripts and Excel spreadsheets to identify areas for improvement in solar and BESS performance.
- Understanding of networking protocols, topologies, and equipment such as routers, switches, and firewalls used in renewable energy data acquisition systems.


OTHER DETAILS
- Full-time job in an actively growing company
- Working Hours: shifting schedule, with 5 working days per week. These shifts will also include weekends.
- Competitive salary from PHP40,000 to PHP50,000 based on your previous work experience
- HMO and paid leaves after a 3-month probationary period
- Great opportunity to work with global clients and develop your career

title: Junior Underwriter
description:
About Us:
We are a driven group of people that believe we can have a significant impact on the small business finance industry. Founded on the premise that honest finance partners can help small businesses get through challenging times and resolve their cash flow problems. Our risk infrastructure is iterated constantly, and we are quick enough to make decisions. Our company benefits from market turbulence. We think outside the box.

We are currently hiring for the Underwriter position. Task will include but are not limited to underwriting all new merchant applications to ensure compliance with underwriting guidelines and risk standards. Also help in providing analysis to support business decisions, managing the financial needs of the operation, or partnering across the company to drive results, our passion is providing the analytical horsepower and funding to support our strategic plan. The analyst will also take on roles pertaining to mining the analytics of the underlying data of each consumer loan as we scale the operation.

Responsibilities:
- Assist with thorough background checks and financial analyses for new merchant applications.
- Acquire necessary documentation needed in accordance with submissions, including merchant processing statements and any correlated financials.
- Filter merchant applications for further review by a senior underwriter.
- Conduct merchant phone interviews to verify the potential future clientele and its’ business operations.
- Determine the creditworthiness of a small business and its owner(s)
- Work with sales and support staff to outline and close deals.

Qualifications:
- 1-2 years of Underwriting experience preferred
- Basic understanding of general credit policies, lending operations, credit principles, and loan research.
- Ability to handle and prioritize multiple projects at any given time, as well as associated conflict/resolution.
- Strong verbal and written communication skills.
- Capability to work effectively within a team, with unexpected pressures
- You are articulate and have excellent verbal and written communication skills
- You are self-motivated and operate effectively in a team environment
- You are a creative thinker and share our passion for success

For interested applicants, PLEASE SEND AN ACCESSIBLE LINK TO YOUR UPDATED CV/RESUME.
