title: CONSERVATION/REINSTATEMENT SPECIALIST
description:
We are seeking a highly motivated and customer-focused Virtual Reinstatement & Conservation Specialist to join our team. In this role, you will work remotely to engage with clients whose accounts or policies are in jeopardy of being canceled or have already lapsed. Your main responsibility will be to work diligently to reinstate policies and conserve business by addressing client concerns, providing tailored solutions, and fostering long-term relationships. You will act as a liaison between the company and the client to ensure the business is reinstated, renewed, and maintained.

Key Responsibilities:
Client Outreach & Engagement

-Proactively reach out to clients with lapsed or canceled accounts to discuss reinstatement options.
-Initiate and maintain regular communication with clients via phone, email, and virtual meetings.
-Understand clients' needs, identify issues that led to cancellations, and provide clear, actionable solutions.
-Reinstatement Process Management

-Work closely with internal teams to ensure the timely processing of reinstatement requests.
-Guide clients through the reinstatement process, ensuring they understand the necessary steps, documentation, and timelines.
-Ensure all policy reinstatements adhere to company guidelines and regulatory requirements.
-Problem Resolution & Customer Support

-Provide exceptional customer service by resolving issues or concerns that may have contributed to cancellations.
-Troubleshoot and address client complaints in a professional and timely manner.
-Offer additional products or services that may address client needs and help retain business.
-Retention Strategies & Conservation Efforts

-Implement conservation strategies to prevent cancellations and maintain the client base.
-Analyze account data to identify trends and proactively reach out to at-risk clients.
-Collaborate with the sales and customer support teams to identify opportunities for account retention.
-Documentation & Reporting

-Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of client interactions, reinstatement requests, and outcomes.
-Submit regular reports on reinstatement and conservation efforts, including success rates and areas for improvement.
-Ensure that all communication and documentation comply with company policies and industry regulations.
-Cross-functional Collaboration

-Work closely with the underwriting, customer service, and sales teams to ensure the best possible outcomes for the client.
-Stay informed about new products, policies, and services to offer relevant solutions to clients.

Key Skills & Qualifications:
Experience:
-Minimum of 2 years of experience in customer service, account management, or a similar role.
-Previous experience in policy reinstatement, conservation, or retention (preferably in insurance or financial services) is a plus.
Communication:
-Excellent verbal and written communication skills with the ability to build rapport and trust quickly.
-Strong listening and problem-solving skills.
-Technical Skills:
-Proficient in using CRM systems, Microsoft Office Suite (especially Excel and Word), and virtual communication tools (Zoom, Microsoft Teams, etc.).
-Ability to learn and adapt to new software or systems quickly.

title: Home-Based Trader
description:
Are you a sharp, driven Trader with a passion for crypto, forex, ETFs, MMFs, and equities? We are seeking a highly motivated individual to join our team as a Home-Based Trader—someone who can bring a unique trading style to the table. The successful candidate will be responsible for trading across various asset classes, utilizing the Wyckoff Method and other trading strategies. This role involves analyzing market trends, executing trades, managing risk, and developing comprehensive trading plans to optimize performance.While some trades may be more long-term, we welcome alternative methods that align with your expertise and strategy.

Let’s face it—this job can be boring. So, let’s make it more sexy! This is your chance to transform a traditional trading role into something dynamic and exciting as you shape your career as a trader, adding real value across multiple asset classes. You’ll also have the opportunity to develop AI automations related to the Wyckoff Method strategies and other trading methods during your downtime, amplifying your impact behind the scenes.

The Role Involves:
Transactional Trading: Execute real-time trades across asset classes like crypto, forex, equities, ETFs, and MMFs —while optimizing trades and managing risk.
Advanced Portfolio Management: Use technical analysis tools, chart patterns, and market indicators to forecast and seize trading opportunities. You’ll provide valuable insights and recommendations.
AI Automations: Develop AI automations related to Wyckoff methods and other trading strategies during your downtime to enhance trading efficiency, improve decision-making, and boost overall performance.
Performance-Based Incentives: Not just a salary job—performance-based bonuses are available based on your trading success, with continual assessment and mentorship.
Key Responsibilities:
Execute trades in various markets, leveraging strategic plans and market analysis for effective decision-making.
Provide insights on point of entry and point of exit and manage trades across multiple asset classes.
Conduct research and analyze markets using fundamental and technical analysis and wyckoff methods to provide actionable insights and forecasts.
Manage risk, optimize entry and exit strategies, and keep detailed records to improve future trading strategies.
Collaborate with team members to share insights and strategies, and contribute to the continuous improvement of trading methodologies.
Required Skills:
Certification: Bloomberg certification preferred, along with a proven track record in crypto trading, forex, or equities.
Technical Expertise: Familiarity with TradingView and proficiency in technical analysis, chart dissections, and indicators like MACD, RSI, and Volume Analysis.
Risk Management: Demonstrated ability to manage risk and execute trades based on trading plan and strategies across diverse asset classes.
Adaptability: Strong portfolio management skills and the ability to adapt to ever-changing markets.
Attention to Detail: Strong attention to detail is a must.
Continuous Improvement: A proactive attitude toward continuous learning and improvement in trading processes.
Perks:
Comprehensive training with advanced learning modules and continuous improvement opportunities.
Competitive salary with performance-based bonuses based on trading results.
Flexibility to work from home with the freedom to manage your own schedule while maintaining a strong work-life balance.
Opportunities for career advancement within the company
The Role
We are excited to invite you to join our team and grow together. This is a home-based position open to applicants from the Philippines.
This is a newly created full-time permanent role, and you will need to be available for 40+ hours per week. This position requires your full commitment and must be your one and ONLY job. You will be a very important part of the team.
At the end of each day, you will be expected to submit a brief journal detailing your daily activities. If you are a self-starter with a passion for trading and are eager to seize this exciting opportunity, we encourage you to apply today!
If this sounds like you ... please follow these instructions on how to apply.
Do NOT send us your standard cut-and-paste job application. We will not read it. Instead - Explain your relevant experience and how it makes you suited for this role.
Confirm you have a computer and internet connection for this kind of role.
The subject line of the application must contain the words  “I Am Your Home-Based Trader“
Confirm your availability to work 40 hours per week, and tell me your expected salary, and if you have other commitments...like children, study and another job, etc.

title: Customer Service Representative
description:
About Us
Bloomer Estates Vacation Rentals is a premier property management company specializing in high-quality vacation rentals in Long Beach and Westport, Washington. We are committed to creating memorable guest experiences through responsive, professional, and friendly customer service.
________________________________________
Position Summary
We are seeking a highly skilled Customer Service Representative based in the Philippines to join our team. The ideal candidate will have strong English communication skills, a proactive approach, and a detail-oriented mindset. In this dynamic and fast-paced remote work environment, you will manage guest interactions, handle administrative tasks, and ensure a seamless guest experience from booking to departure.
________________________________________
Key Responsibilities

The applicant must have reliable internet service, and should live in a large city with reliable service. 

Customer Interaction & Communication
• Manage and monitor messages across platforms, including email, Airbnb, VRBO, and RingCentral.
• Respond to guest inquiries, complaints, and requests professionally, promptly, and empathetically.
• Monitor and reply to guest reviews on platforms like Airbnb and VRBO.
• Share guest reviews with property owners and post approved reviews on the company website.
Reservation & Administrative Management
• Track guest arrivals, departures, and cleaning schedules to ensure smooth operations.
• Verify Airbnb payment requests for accuracy and timely processing.
• Send Guest Portal invites and ensure all guest details are accurately updated in the system.
Documentation & Reporting
• Maintain detailed records of customer issues for weekly leadership reviews.
• Compile guest feedback and reviews into actionable insights to improve service quality and guest satisfaction.

\ General Requirements:
• Location: Based in the Philippines, with remote work capability.
• Work Hours: Flexible, but must overlap with U.S. Pacific Time (PST) business hours.
• Language Skills: Fluent in English, with excellent verbal and written communication skills.
• Work Environment: Access to a reliable internet connection and necessary tools for remote work.
________________________________________
Key Responsibilities:
1. Customer Interaction & Communication
• Manage and track messages across various platforms (emails, Airbnb, VRBO, RingCentral).
• Respond to guest inquiries, complaints, and issues promptly, professionally, and empathetically.
• Monitor and respond to guest reviews on Airbnb, VRBO, and other platforms.
• Share guest reviews with property owners and post approved reviews on the company website.
2. Reservation & Administrative Management
• Monitor guest check-ins, arrivals, and property cleanings to ensure smooth operations and proper lock-up for properties not scheduled for cleaning.
• Review and verify Airbnb payment requests for accuracy and timeliness.
• Send Guest Portal Invites and update guest information in the management system.
3. Documentation & Reporting
• Document all customer issues in detail for weekly leadership reviews.
• Compile guest feedback and reviews to provide actionable insights for improving service and guest satisfaction.
________________________________________
Skills & Qualifications:
Essential Skills
• English Proficiency: Ability to communicate fluently and professionally in both verbal and written forms.
• Customer Service: Strong interpersonal skills with a focus on delivering excellent guest experiences.
• Detail-Oriented: Ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously with high accuracy.
• Problem-Solving: Proactive in identifying and resolving issues.
• Time Management: Ability to work independently, meet deadlines, and manage priorities in a remote environment.
Technical Proficiency
• Familiarity with platforms like Airbnb, VRBO, and communication tools such as RingCentral.
• Competency in managing online reviews and guest inquiries via multiple platforms.
• Basic knowledge of reservation systems and property management software.
Experience
• Prior experience in customer service, preferably in hospitality or vacation rental management.
• Familiarity with U.S. time zones and customer expectations is a plus.
Soft Skills
• Professional demeanor with a focus on empathy and clear communication.
• Ability to remain calm and composed under pressure or in difficult situations.
• Proactive approach to improving systems and addressing guest concerns.
________________________________________
Additional Considerations:
• Previous experience with remote work and self-management in a flexible schedule.
• Availability during peak periods, holidays, or emergencies to address guest needs.
• Alignment with Bloomer Estates Vacation Rentals' commitment to exceptional service and guest experience.

title: Executive Assistant to CEO at Monetize Media
description:
Position: Executive Assistant
Location: Remote
Employment Type: Full-time
Reports to: CEO, Aaron Watson

Monetize Media, a dynamic digital marketing agency, is searching for a high-performing Executive Assistant to support our CEO. This role is essential for someone who can navigate the fast-paced world of marketing, provide top-notch executive assistance, and ensure seamless day-to-day operations for the CEO. If you thrive under pressure, have an exceptional eye for detail, and want to grow with a forward-thinking agency, we want to hear from you!

Key Responsibilities

Executive Support:
Manage the CEO’s calendar, schedule meetings, prioritize commitments, and handle correspondence to streamline daily tasks.
Provide proactive support by anticipating the CEO’s needs, preparing resources, and ensuring timely follow-ups.
Handle Aaron’s emails and prioritize his daily tasks to keep him on top of critical responsibilities.
Organize meetings, prep materials, and manage tasks under tight deadlines.

Data-Driven Analysis:
Monitor, analyze, and report on digital marketing campaign performance, making strategic adjustments as needed.
Utilize data to create actionable insights and recommendations to improve outcomes.

Team Collaboration & Leadership:
Collaborate with team members, including designers, developers, and copywriters, to execute project tasks.
Continuously educate the team on emerging marketing trends and technologies.

Required Qualifications
Executive Assistance Experience: Proven track record as an Executive Assistant, preferably supporting senior executives in a fast-paced environment.
Marketing & Communication Skills: Excellent English communication skills, both spoken and written, with experience in managing marketing-related tasks.
Tech-Savvy: Experience with calendar management tools, project management software (Asana, Slack), and email marketing platforms.
Client Management: Ability to manage high-value client relationships, focused on client retention and satisfaction.
Automation Skills: Knowledge of tools like Zapier and experience with automation for streamlining tasks is a plus.
Self-Motivation: Able to manage priorities independently and work with minimal supervision in a fast-moving environment.

Benefits
Competitive Compensation: Salary and annual bonuses based on experience.
Professional Growth: Opportunities to attend exclusive industry masterminds and conferences.
Flexible PTO: Unlimited discretionary time off and a flexible work schedule.
Career Advancement: Internal growth opportunities and a supportive team environment.
Engagement with Impactful Clients: Work with clients dedicated to making positive change.

Application Process
If this opportunity excites you and aligns with your career aspirations, take the leap and apply! Please send your resume and a brief self-introduction video to jeffrey@monetizemedia.io. We’re eager to hear from you and explore the potential of working together.

title: Be a assistant Mananger in your own home!
description:
We are a US-based  cleaning and remodeling company looking for a full-time, home-based customer support agent to
work with our customer support & sales department.
Your daily responsibilities would include:
1. Send a daily report detailing completed and ongoing tasks.
2. Take inbound sales calls, customer requests and/or complaints and make outbound calls.
3. Respond to customer questions via phone call, email, live chat, Facebook messenger, or SMS.
4. Provide service quotes & make sure to do a follow up with the leads.
5. Book new jobs, reschedule &/or update service jobs in our booking calendar system.
6. Identify customers’ needs, clarify information, research every issue, and provide solutions and/or alternatives
We are invested in our agent’s success. You will go far if you are:
- A fast learner
- A great communicator
- Calm and collected under pressure
- Can help us optimize our current processes
- Be a self-starter
This is a full-time position. You need to have excellent English skills.
Work hours are Monday to Friday 8:00 am to 4:00 pm, Saturday 8:00 am to 2:00 pm Pacific Standard Time
$6.0/hr. to start, with raises every 6 months, and performance bonuses every 3 months
If accepted, you will be provided with training to help respond to customer queries via phone call, email, live
chat, Facebook messenger, & SMS.
How to Apply:
Send an email to info@brightwaveservices.com with the subject line: “I want to be assistant Mananger”.
Please include a link to your OnlineJobs.ph profile within the email when you apply then complete the Google
form you will receive in an email.
Note: After you send the email to apply, you will receive a response from me with a link to a Google form. Please
complete the questions in the Google form to be considered for this position. Forms that are not completed or
only partially completed will not be considered. In the form you will be asked your age. Answer 40 to prove you
are paying attention to detail.
I look forward to working with you!

title: Virtual Assistant for Tucson Medical Therapy Services and manage social meda sites
description:
Join Our Team as a Virtual Assistant (Dual Role)

We are a leading provider of home health physical, occupational, and speech therapy services in Tucson, dedicated to delivering compassionate care to our patients. We're seeking a proactive and detail-oriented Virtual Assistant to help us streamline our operations and improve our services. This is a part-time dual role, with half of your responsibilities supporting Tucson Medical Therapy Services and the other half managing our Airbnb listings and social media presence.

About the Role

As our Virtual Assistant, you will divide your time equally between managing communication and scheduling for Tucson Medical Therapy Services, and supporting our Airbnb properties and social media presence. You'll be instrumental in helping us provide exceptional care to our patients while also enhancing our Airbnb guest experience and online visibility.

Key Responsibilities

Home Health Therapy Services

Communication Coordination: Use WhatsApp to facilitate real-time communication between patients and therapists, ensuring smooth coordination of schedules and any essential duties.

Efficient Scheduling: Utilize WellSky (our Electronic Health Record system) to schedule new patient appointments and optimize the appointment calendar.

Administrative Support: Assist with chart reviews, ensure that therapist orders are completed accurately, and support various administrative tasks.

Airbnb and Social Media Management

Content Creation: Manage our social media channels (Instagram, Facebook), creating engaging posts and video content using provided clips, photos, and stock images to build our online presence. Maintain the websites for both businesses.

Airbnb Assistance: Respond to guest requests through the Airbnb messaging platform as needed.

About You

Experience & Skills: You should have experience as a Virtual Assistant, ideally with a medical background—preferably as a licensed Physical Therapist or nurse. Proficiency in EHR systems (WellSky/Kinnser preferred), Google Workspace, and spreadsheets is a must. Proficient with video editing software and using wordpress for websites. Knowledge of content creation for social media. Will want to expand to other social media sites as well.

Communication & Coordination: Strong written and verbal communication skills, with excellent organizational skills and attention to detail.

Tech-Savvy: Experience in video editing and creating social media posts is essential. You should also be familiar with Timedoctor for time tracking.

Quick Learner: Ability to understand and adapt to our processes quickly, contributing to our mission of delivering quality therapy services.

Availability: Must be able to work Arizona business hours, with some weekend availability.

Requirements

Proven experience as a Virtual Assistant in a healthcare setting

Licensed PT or nurse with medical knowledge

Strong computer literacy, including EHR systems, website maintenance and video editing

Commitment to confidentiality, discretion, and HIPAA compliance

Reliable internet connection and suitable remote work setup


How to Apply

To apply, please:

Send a voice recording of you reading this job post (applications without this will not be considered).
 
Email your resume and a cover letter, with the subject line: "I WANT TO APPLY AS A HOME HEALTH PHYSICAL THERAPY MEDICAL ASSISTANT."

Join us in making a difference in the lives of our patients and enhancing our Airbnb experience through compassionate and efficient care. We can't wait to hear from you!

title: Executive Assistant with Perfect English for Social Media Company
description:
**Job Description**

Looking for a self-starter to join a dynamic and fast-moving media company!

**Position Overview:**

We are on the hunt for a proactive and detail-oriented Virtual Assistant to join our growing team. In this role, you’ll be responsible for managing administrative tasks, implementing organizational systems, and supporting day-to-day operations. This position is part-time, with the potential for long-term growth as we expand.

**Your Role:**

Hours: The job description above only says 15, but the role is anywhere from 15-20 hours a week.

You’ll be involved in a variety of tasks, including but not limited to:

- Creating and maintaining documentation for administrative workflows.
- Handling essential administrative responsibilities.
- Helping us fulfill our clients’ requests.
- Creating written resources for our clients.
- Researching and collecting videos on various social media platforms.
- Collaborating with the team for 15 hours per week.

**What You Bring:**

We are looking for someone with the following skills and qualities:

- A track record of success in virtual assistant or administrative roles.
- Experience with project management platforms like Notion.
- Proficiency in tools within Google Workspace.
- Knowledge of social media marketing.
- Understanding of Instagram Reels, TikTok, and YouTube.
- Familiarity with managing online schedules and calendars.
- Strong written communication skills with excellent grammar and clarity.
- Exceptional organizational and time management capabilities.

**Who You Are:**

The ideal candidate is:

- A clear and concise communicator.
- Quick to adapt and eager to take initiative.
- Dependable and consistent in delivering results.
- Attentive to detail and committed to quality.
- Motivated by the opportunity to contribute to a dynamic team.

**About Us:**

At Creatorverse, we help creators and brands succeed in the digital world by offering smart solutions, practical advice, and personalized support. We are also a media company working to inspire creativity and build a strong community while teaching our audience how to grow on social media. Here is our website: https://www.creatorverse.fyi/.

Working with us means:

- Being part of a fast-paced, results-driven team.
- Receiving recognition for exceptional work through performance-based bonuses.
- Having opportunities for professional growth, including pay increases based on performance.

**How to Apply:**

Follow these steps to apply:

1. Fill out the application form: https://forms.gle/K4S45ZfKokXLL93u7
2. Send us an email: Email thomas@creatorverse.fyi with the subject line: “#VA Application has been submitted”
3. Introduce yourself: In the opening paragraph of your email, share why you’re excited about this role and why you’d be a great fit for the team.

This is an opportunity to join a team that values long-term relationships and growth. We’re excited to meet candidates who are as dedicated to success as we are.

title: Administrative Assistant for Lisa - Looking for a Unicorn!
description:
Here’s a quick video sharing why you may want to work with us! https://www.loom.com/share/571ac017b6834da6a2d6955f0e0921d1?sid=170295e9-acac-4ac9-9dd2-45cb5928b008e  

I’m Rhino Julie, and I LOVE building super teams to service our clients' needs.

If you love a challenge, love problem solving, love working with others (and also love working by yourself LOL), and it makes you happy when you overdeliver for clients, I want you on my team!

My promise to you:
*I provide a FUN working environment.
*We are constantly learning new things.
*We are a team who wants to be the best at what we do, which means you have the BEST teammates.
*I ALWAYS pay on time.
*I treat all of my team members with respect and love.

Client Overview:
*Our client, Lisa, is an amazing attorney who needs help getting the admin work off her plate! She is organized and efficient and loves making her processes better. She values her team and her work and she hopes to find her assistant who will help her business run even better.

Client Requirements:
*Must be able to work Mountain Time (US) 9am-5pm
*Must be female
*Must have administrative assistant experience
*Must have strong verbal and written communication skills
*Must have excellent organizational and time-management skills.
*Must be able to follow detailed instructions 
*Must have high attention to detail and accuracy.
*Must be super organized 
*Detail-oriented with a commitment to quality control

Software tools used by the client (it’s okay if you’re not familiar with some of these tools):
*Monday.com
*PraticePanther – case management/billing 
*Monday.com – task management, workflow management
*Calendly – calendaring/scheduling
*Google/G Suite – gmail/google business platform
*OneDrive – Document storage/management
*InTakeQ – questionnaires and secure document sharing
*SnapForms/The Form Tool – document assembly
*Zoom – video conferencing
*Docusign – e-signatures
*Handwrytten – for sending “handwritten” correspondence to clients

Responsibilities/Tasks:
Email Management and Organization
*Sort Lisa’s email inbox based on priority
*Responsiveness to emails – reply to all emails within 24 hours (one business day)
*Transcribe Voicemails (audio files sent by email)
*Sort and handle emails that are requesting meetings with Lisa (i.e. draft responses, schedule clients, etc.)
*Sort out junk email and create filters to handle newsletters, promotional emails, etc.

Calendar Management/Scheduling
*Draft Replies/Reply to emails from potential and current clients to schedule appropriate meetings with Lisa
*Draft Replies/Reply to emails from colleagues/referral partners to schedule networking meetings with Lisa
*Follow-up with potential clients/current clients to schedule meetings with Lisa
*Follow-up with colleagues/referral partners to schedule networking meetings with Lisa
*Calendar events/monthly meetings for organizations Lisa is involved with and RSVP as needed

Client Onboarding
*Ensure potential clients have submitted a Pre-Intro Call questionnaire prior to intro call with Lisa
*Ensure new clients have submitted a Questionnaire prior to initial/discovery call with Lisa
*Draft and send engagement letters for e-signature by new client
*Send retainer requests to clients to deposit retainer funds
*Input client information and create new client records in PracticePanther 
*Create matter records in PracticePanther

Client Offboarding
*Send thank you
*Send client offboarding survey
*Close matter in PracticePanther

Sales Funnel
*Utilize Monday.com sales board (already created) and email templates (already created) to engage with new prospective clients
*Utilize Monday.com sales board (already created) and email templates (already created) to follow-up with potential clients to move them through the sales process from initial inquiry to engagement

Other
*Creating and updating SOPs (standard operating procedures)

---------

If you know in your heart this job is for you, please apply on our super quick application system by clicking here: https://app.loxo.co/job/MjUwMTMtaDM2aXZ6czJ1dGY0MTV1ag== 

You only have to apply for one job through our portal, and then you can email us if you want to be considered for additional positions.

We have many positions available, so even if this one isn't a perfect fit, if you are a hard worker who loves learning and pays attention to the details, we will probably have something else available for you!

----------------

Our super cool hiring process:

*We have real people communicating with you and looking at your application!
*We PAY you to take a Paid Test for the client you're applying for to make sure you like the job and you have the skills for it. 
*At any time, you can check out the other clients we have and ask to take Paid Tests for them, as well!

Please note that there is a 1-time Profile that you will help us fill out before the Paid Test. This profile will be sent to our clients, along with your Paid Test results. We value you as a person, and we value your time. Once you're in with Rhino Squad, you're IN, and you have lots of job opportunities available to you. So we appreciate your help in preparing your details to present to our clients.

IMPORTANT: Do not book on Rhino Julie's client booking page, this causes our potential clients to be unable to book sales calls with her. We love your enthusiasm, but Rhino Julie's job is to get clients for our virtual assistants to get their dream jobs. Our recruitment team’s job is to take care of our applicants and help them match with their dream job. So, please apply here for your dream job and we will invite you for an interview if your qualifications match the job you're interested in. We cannot stress how important it is to leave her calendar open for her client calls.

title: Customer Support / Virtual Assistant For Growing Wedding Beauty Co.
description:
ABOUT

This non-graveyard Customer Support / Virtual Assistant position is with a successful and established company in the US, with a premier brand and a long-standing reputation for excellence in our industry (18+ years).

We are seeking a female customer support representative who is exceptionally detail-oriented, hard-working, organized, and proactive to join our high-growth expansion. This role offers significant growth opportunities, including the potential to become an operational partner with substantial profit-sharing bonuses, in addition to high monthly compensation and reimbursement for health benefits. You must be meticulous, a self-starter, tech-savvy, honest, and reliable. This position demands full dedication, with availability for after-hours work when necessary. You must also have a can-do attitude and a desire for long-term growth.


REQUIREMENTS – Read carefully

3+ years of full-time experience as a Customer Support agent (ideally in a fast-paced environment)
2+ years of Virtual Assistant
Availability from 6 am to 4 pm PH time (minimum). Also, available outside of working hours when necessary
Appointment setting skills
Exceptional communication skills with an emphasis on customer support
Fluent in spoken and written English with excellent phone and email communication skills
Excellent problem-solving skills
Organized and meticulous attention to detail
A self-starter, able to follow simple instructions and adapt new tools
Proficiency with Google Calendar, Docs, Sheets, Zoom, ClickUp, CRM, etc
2 most recent professional references and 2 personal references
High regard for integrity, excellence, dedication, continuous learning


BENEFITS

World-class happiness & wellness membership
Healthy and caring work environment for you to thrive
Opportunity to advance into an operational partner
Top compensation: base salary + monthly performance bonus + annual bonus
Paid Philippines holidays
Health benefits reimbursement
13th month bonus


KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

1. Customer Support:
• Serve as a main point of contact for client communications, responding to inquiries via emails, texts and/or calls as needed within 24 hours, delivering the BEST client experience. Uphold inbox ZERO daily.
• Appointment setting.
• Create invoices and proposals, managing bookings and payments. Apply appropriate workflow(s)
• Create personalized documents and tailor schedules for projects.
• Anticipating client needs and proactively reaching out when any milestones are coming due.
• Utilize HoneyBook (CRM), Google Calendar, Google Slides, Google Voice with a high level of proficiency to manage project timelines and tasks, ensuring all relevant information is seamlessly integrated in HoneyBook and Asana.
• Monitor urgent matters, be it email or text, at all times

2. Organizational Support:
• Provide comprehensive support to the CEO and team. Handle day-to-day administrative tasks.
• Manage calendars, schedule meetings, and allocate time for various appointments.
• Organize files and documents for easy access and efficiency.
• Monitor and manage project tasks, ensuring accuracy and timely execution.
• Oversee attendance and issue monthly and quarterly rewards.
• Utilize ClickUp to prioritize tasks and manage project deadlines strategically.

3. Sales & Marketing:
• Track leads in systems, maintain appropriate project stages and manage detailed checklists tailored to each project stage.
• Ensure all inquiries are responded to in a timely manner, taking charge of lead follow-up and turning leads into sales.
• Develop and manage automation to boost sales, making necessary changes to increase effectiveness.
• Design promotional newsletter, copywriting, and tracking metrics to advance campaign effectiveness.
• Handle birthday cards, research and purchase gifts for special occasions.
• Utilize platforms such as Flodesk, Paperless Post, Amazon, William Sonoma, etc.

4. Vendor Support:
• Act as a liaison, to facilitate efficient communication with vendors, answering inquiries and assisting with needs, demonstrating exceptional judgment in problem-solving to deliver the best vendor experience
• Manage referral partner bonus points with 100?curacy, issue rewards as needed.
• Create and update a partner's personal reward portal with accurate points monthly.
• Ensure vendor’s personal and professional information is up to date.

5. Project Management:

title: Property Management Coordinator
description:
We are seeking an experienced and detail-oriented Property Management Coordinator to manage critical operational tasks within our real estate team. This role involves overseeing collections and receivables, coordinating lease renewals and inspections, processing maintenance requests, managing vendor schedules, and addressing lease violations. The ideal candidate is a proactive problem-solver, highly organized, and has a strong background in property management or the residential service industry. 

Key Responsibilities: 
> Collections and Receivables: 
Ensure timely payment processing and address outstanding balances effectively. 

> Lease Management: 
Coordinate the renewal process for leases, liaising with tenants and landlords to ensure smooth transactions. 

> Inspection Scheduling: 
Organize and schedule property inspections to maintain compliance with regulations and maintenance standards. 

> Maintenance Coordination: 
Process and manage maintenance work orders to ensure prompt resolution and high-quality service. 

> Vendor Management: 
Schedule and coordinate vendor services, ensuring timely task completion and adherence to quality standards. 

> Lease Violation Follow-Up: 
Address non-compliance issues and implement necessary actions to resolve violations. 

> Record-Keeping: 
Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of activities, transactions, and communications. 

> Ad Hoc Tasks: 
Assist with additional responsibilities and projects as assigned by the client.

Requirements & Qualifications: 
> 2 – 3 years of experience in property management, the home warranty industry, or the residential service sector, with a strong background in maintenance and service request coordination. 
> Excellent organizational and time-management skills, with the ability to handle multiple tasks simultaneously and adhere to established SOPs. 
> Detail-oriented with strong accuracy in data management and documentation. 
> Proficient in using property management software (such as Appfolio) and the Microsoft Office Suite. 
> Strong communication and interpersonal skills to effectively engage with tenants, vendors, and team members. 
> Ability to work independently and collaboratively within a team environment. 
> Problem-solving mindset with the capability to proactively address challenges and find efficient solutions. 
> Knowledge of relevant regulations and best practices in property management, including Fair Housing laws, is a plus. 
> Working hours: Amenable to work Monday to Friday between 8:30 AM to 5 PM Pacific Standard Time (PST)   

Preferred Qualifications: 
> Experience managing single-family residential properties. 
> Demonstrated ability to develop and optimize workflows or standard operating procedures. 
> A proactive, adaptable attitude with a willingness to take on new challenges and responsibilities. 

Next steps:
As part of our hiring process, we kindly request you to complete a DISC personality test before your scheduled interview. This test will help us better understand your personality and ensure alignment with the requirements of the position.

Please take the test using the following link: www.123test.com/disc-personality-test/

Please submit the result of the DISC personality test and an updated copy of your RESUME to this email: beth@lawcoaching.com
Subject line: PMC
Also, kindly share your proficiency or years of experience with the following:
- Property Management
- Home Warranty Industry
- Residential Service Sector

Ensure that the resume is in PDF format.
Don't forget to provide a link to your profile on Onlinejobs.ph

title: Virtual Assistant - Sales Operations
description:
About Us
The NIL Store is at the forefront of Name, Image, and Likeness (NIL) merchandising, partnering with schools and athletes across the country. We are committed to empowering athletes through personalized merchandise and ensuring schools have a seamless, revenue-generating experience. We are expanding our team to enhance our operations, drive athlete success, and support our growing roster of schools and athletes.

Position Overview
The Junior Account Associate will play a crucial role in supporting our account managers by managing sales operations, data entry, and reporting. This role is designed for a detail-oriented individual passionate about sports, sales processes, and delivering high-quality service to schools and athletes. The ideal candidate will be organized, proactive, and have a strong ability to manage multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment.

Key Responsibilities
Sales Operations Support
- Assist account managers by handling day-to-day sales operations tasks, including data management, athlete onboarding, and product launches.

Data Verification and Website QC
- Perform quality checks on athlete information and product listings to ensure data accuracy and consistency across platforms.
- Manage the athlete database, ensuring accurate tracking of sign-ups, sport details, numbers, and artwork progress.

Mock-Up Changes:
- Coordinate any necessary adjustments to product mock-ups, ensuring timely updates and approval.

Seasonal Player Removals:
- Update the athlete database to reflect seasonal changes, removing inactive athletes and updating active rosters.
Process roster changes, including new sign-ups, transfers, and athlete departures, keeping all information up-to-date in the system.

Athlete Onboarding & Tracking
- Facilitate athlete onboarding, transferring opt-ins from Jotform/Airtable to the CSM Tracker.
- Submit and track phase builds for product launches and onboarding progress.
- Deliver “Now Live” graphics to account managers and athletes, ensuring timely communication of merchandise launches.

Data Management & Reporting
- Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of athlete information, sales metrics, and product inventories.
- Generate weekly and monthly reports on athlete activation, merchandise sales, and school performance to support account managers’ strategies.
- Manage the Exclusive Product Board, keeping it updated with new product releases and athlete-specific merchandise.
- Transfer Create-Your-Own-Merch (CYOM) Typeform submissions into digestible cards for the Graphx/Creative team.

Athlete Success & Communication
- Serve as a liaison between account managers and operations, ensuring smooth communication and prompt response to requests.
- Manage direct messages (DMs) from athletes, addressing inquiries and resolving issues promptly.
- Handle ticket requests related to roster management, number changes, athlete removals, etc.

Process Improvement
- Identify and suggest process enhancements that improve efficiency, data accuracy, and the overall onboarding experience for athletes and schools.

Benefits
- Pay: $1,100 per month
- Paid time off
- Paid training

Schedule
- 8-hour shift per day
- 40 hours a week
- Monday to Friday.
- Full-time position

Apply here: forms.gle/KPRoVzojcUbzDo598

description:
Job Compensation : Starting rate $4/hour 

Job Description:
We’re seeking a talented Website Developer with expertise in WordPress, SEO, and Figma to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in creating and managing high-performance websites, understanding both the technical and creative aspects of web development. They should be proficient in WordPress setup and customization, have a solid grasp of SEO best practices, and be adept at using Figma for design purposes. This role requires a detail-oriented individual who can work independently, solve complex problems, and stay updated with industry trends.

Responsibilities:
• Develop, customize, and maintain WordPress websites
• Optimize websites for SEO performance
• Use Figma to design website layouts and prototypes
• Ensure responsive, user-friendly designs that meet client specifications

Required Skills:

WordPress:

• Proficiency with WordPress CMS: Customizing themes, working with plugins, and using page builders (e.g., Elementor, Divi).
• HTML, CSS, and [removed] Basic coding skills to adjust website elements as needed.
• PHP: Experience with WordPress core functions and the ability to make PHP customizations.
• Database Management: Understanding of MySQL for database optimization and troubleshooting.
• Security and Maintenance: Knowledge of website security best practices, regular updates, backups, and resolving security issues.
• WooCommerce: Experience with e-commerce setup and customization within WordPress (optional but preferred).

SEO:

• On-page SEO: Competence in optimizing content, images, meta tags, and headings.
• Technical SEO: Familiarity with tools like Google Search Console, XML sitemaps, schema markup, and resolving indexing issues.
• Keyword Research: Using tools like Ahrefs, SEMrush, or Google Keyword Planner to identify relevant keywords.
• Link Building and Content Strategy: Basic understanding of link-building practices and content optimization.
• SEO Analytics: Proficiency in Google Analytics, monitoring SEO performance, and reporting on key metrics.

Figma:

• Collaboration Tools: Ability to use Figma’s collaboration and sharing features for team feedback.
• Responsive Design: Ensuring designs adapt to desktop, tablet, and mobile views.

Qualifications:
• 2+ years of experience as a WordPress Developer or similar role.
• Strong portfolio showcasing WordPress projects, SEO success stories, and Figma designs.
• Excellent communication skills and the ability to work both independently and within a team.

If you are a passionate developer with an eye for detail and a drive for excellence, we would love to hear from you!

We are looking for a versatile and detail-oriented Digital Marketing Specialist/Assistant to help manage and optimize digital marketing campaigns, client accounts, and reporting. title: HR Specialist *Superstar Only*
description:
Are you a skilled and resourceful Talent Acquisition recruiter with a proven track record in talent acquisition?

Can you effectively coordinate the full recruitment lifecycle, ensuring that every step is executed with precision, even under high-pressure conditions?

We are deeply committed to identifying top talent who possess not only the necessary skills but also well-rounded, holistic qualities. Our objective is to find individuals who bring value to the organization in every aspect, from professional expertise to cultural fit.

If you are passionate about discovering exceptional candidates and dedicated to achieving recruitment excellence, we welcome your application.

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES

A talent acquisition role typically encompasses the full-cycle recruitment and hiring process to secure qualified candidates for an organization. The primary responsibilities often include:

- Leverage job boards, social media, networking, and other recruiting tools to find and connect with potential candidates.
- Perform initial screenings, coordinate interviews, and assess candidates’ skills and alignment with the company culture.
- Create and revise job descriptions, and publish open positions on various job sites.
- Oversee job postings across multiple recruitment channels, maintaining consistent branding and messaging.
- Collaborate with the Talent Acquisition Manager to design and implement recruitment strategies that support business objectives.

JOB QUALIFICATIONS

- Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related discipline.
- Previous experience in recruitment, HR, or talent acquisition, ideally with 2-3 years in a comparable position.
- Recognized for exceptional achievements, such as attaining Latin honors (Summa Cum Laude, Magna Cum Laude, Cum Laude).
- Distinguished for outstanding accomplishments: recognized for achievements including awards such as "Top Team Leader of the Year" and "Employee of the Year," and demonstrating rapid career progression into higher roles.
- Exceptional communication and interpersonal abilities.
- Proficiency in using tools such as Asana, Slack, Outlook, and ClickUp is a plus.
- Expertise in sourcing candidates through platforms like LinkedIn, Online Jobs, Jobstreet, and Upwork.
- Ability to manage multiple recruitment projects simultaneously.
- Solid understanding and capability to oversee inclusive hiring practices.

JOB REQUIREMENTS

- Reliable Computer/Laptop
- High-Speed Internet Connection (+backup)
- Conducive Work Environment

WORKING SCHEDULE

- Full-time Employment Opportunity

BENEFITS

- Competitive Salary
- Training and Development Opportunities
- Opportunity to contribute to a rapidly expanding company dedicated to promoting holistic beauty
- Great potential for career advancement into various leadership positions

APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS

Since this is a long-term position, there will be an in-depth qualification process. If you believe you have what it takes, here's what to do next:

Please apply to this job ad with the phrase “I’m a Talent Acquisition Superstar” and answer the following questions:

1.) Why are you specifically interested in this Talent Acquisition Specialist position?
2.) How do you prioritize tasks when managing multiple assignments or deadlines?
3.) Can you describe a proud moment in your career, the actions you took to achieve it, how it showcased your strengths, and the values you learned from it that you still apply today?
4.) What are the names of your last three supervisors, mentors, or instructors, and how would they rate your performance on a scale of 1 to 10?
5.) Schedule Availability:
5.1) Are you available to work weekends?
6.) On an English Proficiency Scale (from A1-C2), how would you rate your level of English proficiency and your ability to adapt your language to the target audience?
7.) Please complete the following tests and attach the screenshots of the results in a Google Drive link (set to open access):
7.1.) Go to www.typing.com/student/typing-test/1-minute, complete the test and take a screenshot of your results. You don't need to sign in, just close any requests to sign in.
7.2.) Go to www.grammaring.com/english-grammar-test and take the test. Please take a screenshot of the final result.
7.3.) Go to www.speedtest.net/ and take a screenshot of the final result.
7.4.) Go to speed.cloudflare.com/ and take a screenshot of the final result.
8.) Please attach your updated CV in a Google Drive link (set to open access).

If you believe you meet our qualifications and requirements, we encourage you to apply now and become a valuable part of our rapidly expanding company.

Work with manager for any rush requests if needed
Call client & Help sign Initial Disclosure& Docs need to sign with pen (WITHIN 24 HOURS OF RECEIVING EXECUTED CONTRACT)
Communicating / Updating realtors re: client files when they call in daily.
Move the client file in the correct Milestone before exit client profile.
Add note to CRM daily about conversation& Documents. Updating Customer relationship system app as documents are received within 30 minutes.
Add & Attach realtor partner and referral partner in client on the correct Customer relationship Management, Loan Origination system & any other system within 1hours of receiving the file.
Creating & Obtaining verification of employment (VOE’s) for clients .Request Verification of Employment (VOE) via Fax, email and electronically through 3rd party and get the complete sign verification of employment VOE within 24 hours.
Communicating with clients to see which job is current and which is prior before sending verification of employment (VOE) if not clear.
Help client with bank access letters and calling them in to sign it
Calling Client in to sign LOAN documents. within 10 minutes of sending it and make sure client sign it within 30 minutes

Put all your appointment in calendar AND TASK REMAINDER of CRM & OUTLOOK& Any other software or platform that company uses and determine.

title: Hybrid Amazon Product Researcher and Administrative Assistant
description:
Job Description:
We are looking for a versatile and committed individual to join our team as a Hybrid Amazon Product Researcher and Administrative Assistant. This role primarily involves conducting product research for Amazon, alongside handling daily administrative tasks to support the business. The ideal candidate should possess strong web research skills, experience with Amazon-related tasks, and the ability to manage various administrative responsibilities.

Key Responsibilities:
Conduct comprehensive product research for the US market.
Utilize manual sourcing, brand sourcing, reverse sourcing, and storefront stalking techniques.
Perform product searches and reverse searches using Tactical Arbitrage.
Analyze products using tools like Keepa, SellerAmp, and RevSeller.
Monitor intellectual property alerts using IP Alert.
Expand sourcing opportunities using Tactical Expander Lite.
Maintain and manage data using Microsoft Excel, Google Sheets, and other relevant tools.
Handle daily administrative tasks as requested by the business owner.
Communicate effectively with the team and business owner via Skype, Slack, and Zoom.

Qualifications:
Some experience in product research and Amazon-related tasks.
Strong web researching skills.
Familiarity with manual sourcing, brand sourcing, reverse sourcing, and storefront stalking.
Proficiency in Tactical Arbitrage (Product Search and Reverse Search).
Experience with Keepa, SellerAmp, RevSeller, IP Alert, and Tactical Expander Lite.
Excellent communication skills (both oral and written).
Proficient in Microsoft Excel, Word, Google Docs, Google Sheets, and Google Drive.
Experience with communication tools like Skype, Slack, and Zoom.
Ability to work independently and manage time effectively.
Administrative skills to handle daily requests from the business owner.

What We Offer:
Competitive salary of PHP 50,000 per month.
40 hours of work per week.
Paid holidays and 13th-month salary.
A dynamic and supportive team environment.
Long-term commitment and career growth opportunities.

title: Junior Account Associate - Sales Operations
description:
About Us
The NIL Store is at the forefront of Name, Image, and Likeness (NIL) merchandising, partnering with schools and athletes across the country. We are committed to empowering athletes through personalized merchandise and ensuring schools have a seamless, revenue-generating experience. We are expanding our team to enhance our operations, drive athlete success, and support our growing roster of schools and athletes.

Position Overview
The Junior Account Associate will play a crucial role in supporting our account managers by managing sales operations, data entry, and reporting. This role is designed for a detail-oriented individual passionate about sports, sales processes, and delivering high-quality service to schools and athletes. The ideal candidate will be organized, proactive, and have a strong ability to manage multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment.

Key Responsibilities
Sales Operations Support
- Assist account managers by handling day-to-day sales operations tasks, including data management, athlete onboarding, and product launches.

Data Verification and Website QC
- Perform quality checks on athlete information and product listings to ensure data accuracy and consistency across platforms.
- Manage the athlete database, ensuring accurate tracking of sign-ups, sport details, numbers, and artwork progress.

Mock-Up Changes: 
- Coordinate any necessary adjustments to product mock-ups, ensuring timely updates and approval.

Seasonal Player Removals: 
- Update the athlete database to reflect seasonal changes, removing inactive athletes and updating active rosters.
Process roster changes, including new sign-ups, transfers, and athlete departures, keeping all information up-to-date in the system.

Athlete Onboarding & Tracking
- Facilitate athlete onboarding, transferring opt-ins from Jotform/Airtable to the CSM Tracker.
- Submit and track phase builds for product launches and onboarding progress.
- Deliver “Now Live” graphics to account managers and athletes, ensuring timely communication of merchandise launches.

Data Management & Reporting
- Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of athlete information, sales metrics, and product inventories.
- Generate weekly and monthly reports on athlete activation, merchandise sales, and school performance to support account managers’ strategies.
- Manage the Exclusive Product Board, keeping it updated with new product releases and athlete-specific merchandise.
- Transfer Create-Your-Own-Merch (CYOM) Typeform submissions into digestible cards for the Graphx/Creative team.

Athlete Success & Communication
- Serve as a liaison between account managers and operations, ensuring smooth communication and prompt response to requests.
- Manage direct messages (DMs) from athletes, addressing inquiries and resolving issues promptly.
- Handle ticket requests related to roster management, number changes, athlete removals, etc.

Process Improvement
- Identify and suggest process enhancements that improve efficiency, data accuracy, and the overall onboarding experience for athletes and schools.

Benefits
- Pay: $1,100 per month
- Paid time off
- Paid training

Schedule
- 8-hour shift per day
- 40 hours a week
- Monday to Friday.
- Full-time position

Apply here: https://forms.gle/KPRoVzojcUbzDo598

title: Staff Accountant - Property Management/Real Estate
description:
*Only applicants who submit a resume will be considered

Job Summary:
We are seeking a meticulous and detail-oriented Accountant to join our finance team. The
ideal candidate will be responsible for managing all aspects of the accounts payable
process, ensuring accurate and timely processing of invoices, payments, and
reconciliation of accounts. This role requires a strong understanding of accounting
principles, exceptional organizational skills, and the ability to communicate effectively with
vendors and internal stakeholders.

Responsibilities:
• Process vendor invoices accurately and efficiently, ensuring proper coding,
authorization, and documentation.
• Review and reconcile vendor statements, resolving any discrepancies in a timely
manner.
• Perform data entry between various software systems to ensure accuracy.
• Prepare and process weekly, monthly, and ad-hoc payment runs, including checks,
ACH payments, and wire transfers.
• Maintain accurate records of accounts payable transactions, including filing and
archiving of invoices and payment documentation.
• Collaborate with internal departments to resolve invoice discrepancies and address
vendor inquiries.
• Assist in month-end and year-end closing processes, including preparation of
accruals and reconciliations, including credit card reconciliation.
• Integrate monthly statements from 3rd party property managers into our accounting
software Buildium and QuickBooks Online and Desktop.
• Enter credit card transactions and code per project.
• Reconcile bank accounts.
• Prepare quarterly financial statements.
• Stay updated on relevant accounting regulations and compliance requirements
related to accounts payable functions.
• Process payroll for contractors.

Qualifications:
• Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field.
• Minimum of 3 years of experience in accounts payable or related accounting roles.
• Strong understanding of accounting principles and practices.
• Proficiency in Quickbooks Desktop and Quickbooks Online, with experience in
processing invoices and payments.
• Proficiency in Buildium property management software.
• Excellent attention to detail and accuracy, with the ability to multitask and prioritize
tasks effectively.
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to identify and resolve
issues independently.
• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate
effectively with cross-functional teams and external vendors.
• Ability to work independently with minimal supervision and meet tight deadlines.
• Proficiency in Microsoft Excel and other Office applications.

Preferred Qualifications:
• Professional certification such as CPA, CMA, or ACCA.
• Experience working in a fast-paced environment with high transaction volumes.
• Familiarity with automated accounts payable solutions and workflow automation
tools.

title: Customer Service Representative - Permanent WFH
description:
Company Overview: MedPro Disposal is a leading provider of healthcare compliance solutions tailored to meet the needs of medical waste generators nationwide. We specialize in ensuring our clients adhere to stringent regulatory standards while streamlining their waste management processes, ultimately promoting a safer and more sustainable healthcare environment.

Position Overview: We are seeking for Customer Service Representatives with experience building relationships and trust via inbound & outbound calls. If you are goal-oriented and comfortable working from home over the phone or via email and are ready to be a part of a high-growth, rapidly expanding company with unlimited growth for motivated individuals, then please apply!

Mission statement: Identify, engage, and convert healthcare organizations with multiple locations into clients by offering centralized compliance solutions that drive efficiency and cost savings. 

Compensation & Benefits:

SALARY RANGE: $450/Month + $50 monthly internet allowance
Monthly Incentives
Paid Time Off
Work Anniversary Bonus
No work with pay on US Holidays
Permanent work-from-home position
Fixed Saturday and Sunday off


Responsibilities:
1. Responding promptly to customer inquiries, communicating with customers through various channels & acknowledging and resolving customer complaints (voice/email).
2. Knowing our products inside and out so that you can answer questions; and process orders, forms, applications, and requests.
3. Keeping records of customer interactions, transactions, comments, and complaints.
4. Ensure customer satisfaction and provide professional customer support.


Qualifications:
- Bachelor’s degree in a related field or equivalent combination of education and experience
- At least 2 years of Customer Service (BPO) with VA experience
- Excellent communication and customer service skills
- Flexible – Willing to take on tasks, instructions, and/or work requests as needed
- Resilient – Can work with less supervision, adapt in a fast-paced environment, and multi-task effectively
- Professional; fast learner & who can adapt to change
- Strong interpersonal and team collaboration skills
- Proficiency with Microsoft Office, Outlook, Excel and other related software


Basic Technical Requirements:
- Your own laptop/desktop PC with the following minimum specs: i5 5th gen and above/AMD equivalent; 8GB RAM; Mozilla or Chrome installed; Windows 10 upwards.
- A consistent and stable internet connection of at least 20Mbps
- With back-up computer, internet connection and power supply
- Noise-canceling headset/headphones
-A quiet and dedicated workspace at home


HOW TO APPLY: Interested and Qualified Candidates may send the following to jnoriega@medprodisposal.com

1. An updated and comprehensive resume

2. Screenshot of the candidate's internet speed using speedtest.net

3. Provide a screenshot or detailed information regarding your laptop specifications

4. Record a 1–2-minute video introducing yourself and explaining why you are interested in the job. The video should be recorded using Loom, and the link should be shared with us for easy access


*****We will reach out to all qualified candidates for pre-screening interviews within 24-48 hours.*****

title: Administrative Virtual Assistant
description:
Job Title: Administrative Virtual Assistant
Work hours: 40 hours (Full-time)
Timezone: Central or Eastern European Time (GMT +2)
Initial work schedule: Mondays-Friday 7 am to 4 pm (1 hour lunch break)
Rate: $4-5 per hour DOE

Application Process:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdIv37vz7tH1y-wy5rWMwXQwc0DTIuDozQH5lkwX9eapIkvMQ/viewform 

Job Overview:
We seek a proactive and detail-oriented Administrative Virtual Assistant (Admin VA) to support our Sales Managers and Sales Representatives by organizing and streamlining essential administrative tasks. Key responsibilities include tracking performance metrics, managing reputation on social media, handling customer inquiries, and providing administrative relief to the sales team. The ideal candidate is skilled in data tracking, CRM (GoHighLevel), and digital communication, ensuring efficient workflows and team support. This role reports directly to the Sales Managers, working closely with them to enhance sales team productivity and client satisfaction.

Responsibilities:
1. Sales Rep Administrative Support: Organize and manage administrative tasks for Sales Representatives, ensuring all necessary resources are available to help them focus on sales.
2. Performance Tracking and Data Management: Use Google Sheets to track and analyze performance metrics, keeping data organized and up-to-date for easy team evaluation.
3. CRM Management: Use GoHighLevel to manage client information, interactions, and sales data, ensuring accurate and accessible records within the CRM system. Create automation workflows and landing pages including integrations in GHL.
4. Operational Administration: Oversee general administrative tasks to support daily operations and maintain efficient workflows across the team.
5. Social Media Reputation Management: Manage comments on Facebook and Instagram, promptly addressing inquiries to maintain a positive brand image and enhance client satisfaction.
6. Email Correspondence: Respond to customer inquiries professionally and efficiently, providing clear, helpful, and timely responses.

Qualifications:
- Proficiency in Google Sheets for organizing, tracking, and reporting performance data.
- Experience with GoHighLevel CRM to manage client information and sales interactions effectively, including building automation workflows.
- Strong organizational skills and attention to detail for managing daily administrative tasks and ensuring operational flow.
- Experience in Facebook/Instagram comment management and reputation handling to address client feedback and inquiries professionally.
- Effective written communication skills to handle email inquiries, ensuring clear and professional responses.

If you are an experienced Admin VA with a passion for engagement, sales support, lead generation, and innovative technologies, we encourage you to apply. Join us in exploring sustainable practices to drive our business forward.

description:

Rig Fab is a trusted leader in the industry, dedicated to supporting the Navy supply chain, heavy industrial construction, aerospace, infrastructure, and beyond. Our expertise includes supplier development, ISO certifications, welding programs, and industry-leading quality management. Rig Fab takes pride in empowering professionals through innovation, exceptional service, and a commitment to excellence.

Position Overview
The Accountant & Analyst will play a critical role in supporting the financial operations of Rig Fab, focusing on expense management, revenue and cost tracking, process improvement, and financial reporting. This role requires a proactive, detail-oriented professional capable of analyzing financial trends, developing efficient processes, and ensuring accuracy in financial documentation. The Financial Analyst will report to [Insert Reporting Manager/Department].

Key Responsibilities

Develop and manage processes to log, categorize, and track reimbursable expenses with accuracy.
Identify and troubleshoot discrepancies in expense reports.
Utilize tools such as Microsoft Excel, Zoho Expense, QuickBooks, and Power BI for efficient reporting.
Create and maintain financial tracking systems to monitor revenue and costs.
Reconcile complex financial reports and deliver them within tight deadlines while ensuring accuracy.
Provide actionable insights through data visualization tools like Power BI.
Design and implement systems to track team wins and losses with clear, actionable metrics.
Analyze financial trends to inform strategic decision-making and operational improvements.
Develop and document standard operating procedures (SOPs) for financial processes.
Continuously review and improve financial processes to enhance efficiency and compliance.
Ensure timely invoicing and manage accounts receivable to optimize cash flow.
Establish follow-up protocols for overdue payments and manage escalations as needed.
Prepare comprehensive monthly and weekly financial reports.
Ensure all financial reporting adheres to organizational requirements and deadlines.
Develop automated solutions to streamline reporting processes.
Required Skills and Qualifications

Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Accounting, Business Administration, or a related field preferred.
Minimum of 3 years of experience in financial analysis or a similar role.
Proficiency in financial tools and software, including Microsoft Excel, Zoho Expense, QuickBooks, and Power BI.
Strong analytical skills with the ability to reconcile complex financial data.
Experience in process development, SOP documentation, and financial operations improvement.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
Ability to manage competing deadlines effectively and maintain high levels of accuracy.
Preferred Qualifications

Experience with automation tools like Power Query or similar.
Familiarity with cash flow management and accounts receivable protocols.
Proven track record of designing financial tracking and reporting systems.
Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)

100?curacy in weekly expense logging and categorization.
95% on-time collection rate for invoices.
Timely submission of financial reports with

title: BACK-OFFICE AGENT
description:
We seek a detail-oriented and client-focused Back-Office Agent who is an expert in Email and Calendar handling to support our team and clients in managing email accounts and calendar systems. The ideal candidate will have strong technical skills, excellent communication abilities, and a proactive attitude to ensure smooth and efficient day-to-day scheduling and email correspondence operations. A part-time position with room for full-time.  

Key Responsibilities: 
 
Email Management: 
= Monitor and manage incoming email requests, filter spam, and ensure that important communications are prioritized. 
= Respond to and resolve clients' queries related to email access, settings, and configuration issues. 
= Provide guidance on best practices for email organization, folder management, and archiving. 
= Assist clients with setting up email forwarding, signatures, and vacation replies. 

Calendar Management: 
= Support users with creating, modifying, and scheduling calendar events (e.g., in Google Calendar, Microsoft Outlook, etc.). 
= Help users manage multiple calendars, sync events, and ensure proper event notifications. 
= Coordinate meeting invites, and room bookings, and facilitate scheduling conflict resolution. 
= Assist with recurring event setup and ensure reminders are configured as per user preferences. 
= Assist with integrating third-party calendar tools or applications with existing systems. 

Troubleshooting and Support: 
= Investigate and resolve any technical issues related to email and calendar synchronization or performance. 
= Provide troubleshooting steps for users experiencing issues with email delivery, calendar notifications, or synchronization 
    with devices. 
= Work closely with the IT department or external vendors to escalate and resolve more complex technical issues. 

User Training and Documentation: 
= Offer guidance and training to staff or clients on effective use of email and calendar tools. 
= Create and update user manuals, knowledge base articles, and FAQs for common email and calendar-related issues. 

General Administrative Support: 
= Provide general administrative support as needed, including assisting with managing contacts, task lists, and reminders. 
= Assist with scheduling and coordinating team meetings, conference calls, and virtual events. 

Qualifications 
 Experience: 
    = Previous experience in a support or administrative role with a focus on email and calendar management. 
    = Familiarity with common email platforms (e.g., Microsoft Outlook, Gmail) and calendar management tools (e.g., Google 
        Calendar, Microsoft Outlook Calendar). 
    = Experience with troubleshooting software and providing user support is a plus. 

Skills: 
    = Strong communication skills, both written and verbal. 
    = Excellent attention to detail and organizational skills. 
    = Ability to multitask and manage competing priorities. 
    = Strong problem-solving abilities and resourcefulness. 
    = Ability to work independently and as part of a team. 
   = Proficiency with Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) and Google Workspace (Docs, Sheets, Gmail, Calendar, etc.). 

Preferred Skills: 
= Basic knowledge of email security best practices, including spam filtering and email encryption. 
= Familiarity with virtual meeting platforms (e.g., Zoom, Microsoft Teams) for scheduling and coordination. 
= Experience with ticketing systems for issue tracking (e.g., Zendesk, ServiceNow). 


Note: In the subject line, include the number of years of your work-related experience.

description:

JOB TITLE: Office Coordinator (with Notion Experience)

ABOUT US:
As a leading VA staffing agency, we specialize in training and providing virtual assistance to home care agencies across the United States. Our services range from recruitment, scheduling, intake coordination, and social media content management, to bookkeeping. Manage executive calendars, scheduling meetings, and coordinating travel arrangements.

title: Real Estate Data Analyst
description:
Real Estate Data Analyst
Company: Southern Acres Land Co
Location: Remote
Hours: 9:00 AM – 6:00 PM EST

Southern Acres is a real estate investment company focused on purchasing vacant land at a discount and exploring residential development in North and South Carolina. We’re looking for a Real Estate Data Analyst to evaluate land opportunities by analyzing data, zoning, utilities, and land use potential, and working with our development and acquisitions team to identify valuable land for our projects.

You’ll build and maintain a target land list, research zoning and restrictions using tools like LandVision and GIS, and manage data using Excel. We seek a candidate with strong Excel skills, data management experience, and a willingness to learn real estate tools like LandVision, Land ID, and GIS.

This is a fully remote, full-time role with compensation between $650.00 and $1000.00 per month, negotiable based on experience, and room for growth within the company.

To apply, email your resume to jobs@southern-acres.com with a 2-3 minute video answering:
1. How have you used Excel in previous roles?
2. Do you have real estate experience or knowledge?
3. What’s your favorite food?

Note: Applications without a video will not be considered.
