Bonus Qualifications (Not Required):

title: Digital Marketing and Client Acquisition Specialist
description:
Job Title: Digital Marketing and Client Acquisition Specialist
Job Type: Full-Time
Location: Philippines, Remote, M-F 10:30AM-7PM IST
Restriction: This opportunity is for candidates residing in the Philippines
Compensation: $1,350 Monthly DOE


THE DIGITAL MARKETING RECRUITERS
Digital Marketing Recruiters has been in the digital marketing and recruitment space for over 25 years. We work with highly skilled marketing, digital marketing, and sales professionals and match them with our clients from diverse industries across the United States. Our selection process incorporates comprehensive resume screening, shortlisting, conducting video-recorded interviews and providing client information, administering written assessments (if required by the client), arranging client interviews, and facilitating job offers and placements.


THE ROLE
The client is looking for a customer acquisition-focused Digital Marketing and Client Acquisition Specialist to join their team. In this role, you will be responsible for acquiring new clients by targeting two key personas: founders of MSMEs/SMEs seeking redesign services and marketing teams in need of Webflow expertise. Your job will be to craft and execute data-driven marketing strategies that generate leads and drive conversions across digital channels. If you’re skilled in performance marketing and love leveraging AI tools for growth, this is the role for you.


KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
*Develop and execute customer acquisition strategies targeting MSME/SME founders and marketing teams focused on Webflow services.
*Manage multi-channel marketing campaigns (SEO, paid search, social media, and email) to drive qualified leads and conversions.
*Leverage AI tools to enhance marketing performance, streamline operations, and scale campaign effectiveness.
*Collaborate with content, design, and sales teams to create engaging marketing materials and align campaigns with business goals.
*Continuously analyze campaign performance to refine strategies, improve ROI, and identify growth opportunities.
*Establish partnerships with relevant influencers and service providers to expand reach and drive additional acquisition channels.
*Stay up-to-date on industry trends to keep marketing strategies fresh, innovative, and effective.
*Run Retargeting Campaigns: Develop and manage retargeting campaigns for website visitors and organic content audiences to re-engage potential customers and drive conversions through personalized ads across social media and search.


QUALIFICATIONS
*3-5 years of experience in growth marketing, with a proven focus on customer acquisition.
*Proficient in using AI-powered tools (e.g., ChatGPT, Jasper, MidJourney) to automate and optimize performance marketing campaigns.
*Hands-on experience with marketing automation platforms (e.g., HubSpot, Marketo) to build and track lead nurturing workflows.
*Expertise in Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, and other performance measurement tools for tracking and reporting on campaign effectiveness.
*Experience with A/B testing, conversion rate optimization (CRO), and data analysis for continuous improvement.
*Familiarity with CRM systems and customer data platforms for targeted marketing campaigns.
*Strong understanding of Webflow and digital services ecosystems is a plus.
*Experience working with MSMEs, SMEs, or B2B clients.
*Excellent communication, project management, and collaboration skills.

title: Paid Ads Manager
description:
CLICK HERE TO APPLY: emazinggroup.applytojob.com/apply/1hHqAfsWer/Paid-Media-Manager?source=OLJEMAZING

Paid Media Manager:

Join our team as a Paid Media Manager and lead paid advertising campaigns across platforms like Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, Google, YouTube, and more! You’ll create, optimize, and manage campaigns to drive traffic and revenue, analyze performance, and stay ahead of trends to maximize results. This is a remote, full-time position that offers flexibility, creativity, and the opportunity to grow in a fast-paced, entrepreneurial environment. If you’re ready to make an impact and grow with us, we’d love to hear from you!

What You’ll Do:

•Manage and optimize campaigns on platforms like Meta, TikTok, Google, and others! You'll set budgets, and target audiences, and adjust ads to drive engagement and revenue.

•Analyze performance data across channels, turning insights into action and strategy! Utilize multi-touch attribution to understand what drives success and refine our approach.

•Spot emerging trends, submit creative requests, and collaborate with the team to deliver fresh, on-brand ad content.

•Oversee tracking setup, catalog feeds, and pixel implementations to ensure smooth campaign performance and accurate data.

What You’ll Need to Succeed:

•At least 5 Years of Hands-On Experience: Proven expertise in digital ads and e-commerce campaigns across multiple platforms, with experience working with US-based brands.

•Analytical Skills & Tool Mastery: Expertise in Google Analytics, Data Studio, and Excel—transforming data into actionable insights to optimize performance.

•Digital Marketing Savvy: Solid knowledge of DTC (direct-to-consumer) strategies and platforms like Shopify+, and a strong grasp of e-commerce best practices.

•Go-Getter Mindset: You thrive in fast-paced environments, communicate with ease, and handle multiple projects independently.

•Strong Communication Skills: Ability to create clear documentation, present findings to senior management, and collaborate effectively with stakeholders.

•Strategic Thinking: Ability to develop and execute long-term growth strategies for paid media across various platforms.

•Problem-Solving and Adaptability: Strong troubleshooting skills—whether it's campaign performance or technical implementation, you can adapt strategies to improve results.

•Excellent Time Management: You can juggle multiple campaigns and deadlines, particularly in a remote working environment, while maintaining high standards of work.

Nice-to-Haves:

•Comfortable with Multi-Touch Attribution (MTA) platforms? We love candidates who can confidently track and analyze performance across all channels.
•Data-driven decision-maker? If you're experienced with incrementality testing and MMM modeling at scale, we’re excited to hear how you apply it!
•If you’ve managed a budget over PHP 25 million, you're the perfect fit!
•Familiarity with the fashion industry or DTC marketing is a big plus!
•Able to write captivating ad copy tailored to each platform.
•Open to working key campaigns beyond standard hours, including weekends, as needed.

The Perks:

•Competitive Salary: 100k - 200k PHP
•PTO & Holiday Pay
•Quarterly Bonuses
•Health Insurance
•Deep Product Discounts
•Company Parties and Lunches
•Career Growth & Development
•Fully Remote Role

Why Join The Emazing Group?

Since 2010, The Emazing Group has been the comprehensive e-commerce solution for passion-driven consumer lifestyle brands. With unique and innovative brands such as iHeartRaves and INTO THE AM, The Emazing Group has successfully created and scaled market-leading companies, empowering a lifestyle of self-expression one individual at a time.

To learn more about us, visit our company website: emazinggroup.com/

The Emazing Group is an equal opportunity employer. Learn more on our Careers Page:
emazinggroup.applytojob.com/apply/

title: QA Tester – Mobile Applications
description:
Job Title: QA Tester – Mobile Applications
Fully Remote, Part Time (10 hours a week), Long Term

About Us
We are a Canadian based technology company, and we are looking to fill our QA Tester position.

Role Overview
We are looking for a meticulous and detail-oriented QA Tester to ensure the quality and performance of our mobile applications. In this role, you'll be responsible for identifying and troubleshooting bugs, performing comprehensive tests, and working closely with developers to deliver top-notch user experiences.

Key Responsibilities
* Design, develop, and execute test cases for mobile applications on Android and iOS platforms.
* Identify, document, and track bugs or issues, providing clear and detailed feedback to developers.
* Conduct functional, usability, performance, and regression testing.
* Collaborate with developers, designers, and product managers to understand project requirements and user expectations.
* Analyze test results to pinpoint application improvements.
* Stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in mobile QA practices and tools.

Qualifications
Must-Have:
* Proven experience as a QA Tester, preferably in mobile application testing.
* Proficiency with testing tools and frameworks like Appium, TestFlight, or similar.
* Strong understanding of Android and iOS platforms.
* Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
* Ability to write clear and concise bug reports.
* Effective communication skills and a team-player attitude.
Preferred:
* Familiarity with Agile methodologies and project management tools like Jira or Trello.
* Experience with automation testing tools for mobile applications.
* Basic understanding of programming languages (e.g., Java, Swift) is a plus.

What We Offer
* Flexible working hours and full remote work.
* Talented team
* Professional growth and development opportunities.

How to Apply
- Submit your resume, cover letter, and any relevant portfolio or project samples to yestores@useradd.com, along with the following:
-- Desired Salary in Php/month
-- Onlinejobs.ph/LinkedIn Profile
- Include “QA Tester – Mobile Applications” in the subject line of your application, with the following:


- We are excited to find someone who shares our commitment to delivering excellence.

title: Customer Support *Superstars Only*
description:
Do you love putting a smile on people's faces or hearing "you just made my day"?

Love connecting with our customers and fans of a holistic beauty creator with 2 million+ followers?

Do you want to be part of a fast-growing company and collaborate with the brightest, most talented minds?

Then this might be your dream job.

Before you read on, this is NOT a typical customer support job where you just copy paste standard responses or choose a canned response from the help desk software...if that's what you are looking for then you should stop reading right now, because this job is NOT for you.

We are looking for a Customer Service Specialist to help create an amazing customer experience that turns customers into raving fans.

From the Upgrade to see actual infont a person clicks "Follow" or joins our community, the customer needs to feel like she has a special friend who is there to help and support her along the way....and that's exactly your job as a Customer Service Specialist.

As our Customer Service Specialist, you’re the essence of an extraordinary customer service. You love people and love to enrich their lives through dialogue about our products as well. Having a detailed knowledge, you’re not just serving information, but are also making recommendations and play an advisory role.

You are the heart of our reputation, and ensure feedback flows to all teams in order to improve and innovate our services. And you spark customers with new ways to make their experience continuously better.

We are aiming to be the gold standard for customer support in the beauty industry. Customer support is extremely important to us, and we only hire the warmest and the most positive, genuine and dedicated people to represent our company.

ABOUT US
• We're a fast-growing holistic beauty company that is looking for the brightest, most talented minds to work from home. More details will be shared during the interview, but you’ll have the opportunity to work with one of the fastest-growing holistic beauty creators, boasting over 2,000,000 followers.

QUALIFICATIONS
• Distinguished for outstanding accomplishments, including receiving awards like "Top Team Leader of the Year", "Employee of the Year", and demonstrating swift career progression into higher roles.
• Minimum of 2 years of experience in customer service. Most of the support will be conducted via email and chat. However, proficiency in phone support is a plus.
• Recognized for exceptional achievements, such as attaining Latin Honors (Summa Cum Laude, Magna Cum Laude, Cum Laude).
• Excellent communication skills, both oral and written. As an email support representative, you will likely interact with US clients whose first language is English. Your level of English needs to be on the level that an English native speaker thinks they are talking to another native speaker. Adherence to a specific writing style (a mix between friendly/semi-casual and formal; depending on the occasion), flawless grammar, and punctuation standards is highly required.
• Enabling an empathy-driven approach by providing exceptional customer service and fostering positive relationships with customers through email communication.
• Fast and accurate typing skills to respond to emails promptly, great attention to detail and reliability are essential qualities for success in this role.
• Highly organized with the ability to efficiently manage multiple tasks and meet deadlines.
• Adeptness at working in a fast-paced environment where others rely on you to deliver is essential. It is expected that you have an innovative mind and are a self-starter.


JOB RESPONSIBILITIES INCLUDE
• Customer Care: Provide excellent customer service through various channels, including email, chat, social media and phone. Address customer inquiries, concerns, and requests with empathy and professionalism.
• Product Knowledge: Develop an in-depth understanding of our holistic beauty programs, their benefits, and the exercises in it.
• Problem Resolution: Troubleshoot and resolve customer complaints and issues promptly and effectively, ensuring customer satisfaction.
• Educational Support: Provide product recommendations, usage guidance, and holistic beauty advice to customers.
• Feedback Collection: Collect and document customer feedback and suggestions to help improve products and services.
• Organizational Skills: Maintain organized records of customer interactions and orders, ensuring accurate and up-to-date customer profiles.
• Cross-functional Collaboration: Collaborate with other departments, such as marketing and product development, to relay customer insights and feedback.
• Process Enhancement: Document the process and create/adapt SOPs to improve the system.

REQUIREMENTS FOR EFFECTIVE REMOTE WORK
• Reliable Computer/Laptop
• High-Speed Internet Connection (+backup)
• Conducive Work Environment

WORKING SCHEDULE
• Full-time Employment Opportunity

BENEFITS
• Competitive Salary
• Training and Development Opportunities
• Opportunity to contribute to a rapidly expanding company dedicated to promoting holistic beauty
• Great potential for career advancement into various leadership positions

APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS
Since this is a long-term position, there will be an in-depth qualification process. If you believe you have what it takes, here's what to do next:

Please apply to this job ad with the phrase “I’m a Customer Service Superstar” and answer the following questions:

1.) Why are you specifically interested in this position?
2.) Can you provide an example of a challenging customer situation you've successfully resolved in the past?
3.) What are the names of your last three supervisors, and how would they rate you on a scale of 1-10? (you may need to arrange calls/email contact with them)
4.) Schedule Availability:
4.1.) What are your preferred work hours? (in PHT)
4.2.) Are you available to work weekends?
5.) On an English Proficiency Scale (from A1-C2), how would you rate your level of English proficiency and your ability to adjust your language to the target audience?
6.) Take the following tests and attach the 4 screenshots of the results in a Google Drive link (set to open access).
6.1.) Go to Upgrade to see actual info/student/typing-test/1-minute, complete the test and take a screenshot of your results. You don't need to sign in, just close any requests to sign in.
6.2.) Go to Upgrade to see actual info/english-grammar-test and take the test. Please take a screenshot of the final result.
6.3.) Go to Upgrade to see actual info/ and take a screenshot of the final result.
6.4.) Go to Upgrade to see actual info/ and take a screenshot of the final result.
7.) Attach your CV in a Google Drive link (set to open access).

We are expanding and looking for talented individuals to join our team. If you feel you meet our qualifications and requirements, we strongly encourage you to apply. Please follow the provided instructions to ensure your application is considered.

title: Executive Assistant *Superstar Only*
description:
Are you highly organized and detail-oriented with a proven track record as an executive assistant?

Can you effectively manage responsibilities, ensuring no tasks are overlooked even in high-pressure situations?

We're seeking someone capable of handling complex tasks seamlessly, demonstrating proactive problem-solving skills and a commitment to continuous improvement.

If you're driven by delivering excellence and eager to take on new challenges, we encourage you to apply.

ABOUT US
· We're a fast-growing holistic beauty company that is looking for the brightest, most talented minds to work from home. More details will be shared during the interview, but you’ll have the opportunity to work with one of the fastest-growing holistic beauty creators, boasting over 2,000,000 followers.

JOB QUALIFICATIONS:
An executive assistant requires a diverse set of qualities beyond being detail-oriented to excel in their role. Here are the qualifications for the executive assistant role:

• Demonstrated outstanding achievements, such as earning Latin Honors (Summa Cum Laude, Magna Cum Laude, Cum Laude), receiving various excellence awards (e.g., "Agent of the Year", “Employee of the Year”), and showcasing rapid career advancement in previous roles.

• Excellent communication skills, both oral and written, characterized by professionalism in tone and manner, clarity in conveying messages, and active listening.

• Strong attention to detail, ensuring accuracy and precision in all aspects of work.

• Successful track record of managing projects.

• Demonstrated excellent decision-making abilities, exhibiting sound judgment and discernment in various situations.

• Adaptability to changing environments, with a flexible approach to handle unforeseen circumstances and adjust plans accordingly.

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES INCLUDE:
Here are the primary duties of an Executive Assistant:

• Support Services: Provide comprehensive administrative support to the executive, including managing calendars, scheduling appointments, and coordinating meetings and events.
• Information Management: Handle correspondence, emails, and phone calls on behalf of the executive, screening, and prioritizing messages as necessary.

• Project Support: Assist with project management tasks, such as tracking project timelines, milestones, and deliverables. Coordinate project-related activities and communications among team members.
• Confidentiality Management: Maintain strict confidentiality and discretion when handling sensitive information, documents, and communications. Safeguard confidential data and ensure compliance with privacy policies and regulations.
• Problem-Solving: Identify and resolve administrative issues and challenges as they arise, exercising sound judgment and problem-solving skills. Anticipate potential problems and take proactive steps to mitigate risks.

5.2.) Are you available to work weekends?

title: Supply chain manager (experienced) Life changing oppurtinity
description:
Experience: Prior experience in supply chain management & e-commerce is a must.
We are looking for a Supply Chain Manager for our dropshipping store.

Your role will primarily involve accurate data management and overseeing the supply chain to ensure smooth operations. Please include the word blue in your application so I can see that you have attention to detail.

Key Responsibilities:
Address Error Resolution:

Identify and address errors in shipping addresses promptly.
Work with the customer service team to contact customers and update order information to avoid delays.
Issue refunds if address issues are not resolved within seven days.
Inventory and Variant Management:

Monitor out-of-stock products and coordinate with suppliers to check stock status.
Request similar product alternatives and communicate options to customers.
Update product listings on Facebook or Google and remove unavailable items from the store.
Order Fulfillment & Supplier Communication:

Conduct daily reviews of unfulfilled orders and communicate with suppliers to ensure timely processing.
Follow up on delayed orders, emphasizing urgency to prevent customer disputes.
Maintain regular communication with the customer service agency and fulfillment agents to resolve order issues.
Quality Control & Scaling:

Request quality checks from suppliers, especially when scaling up.
Monitor product quality and address issues proactively to maintain high standards.
Strategize price reduction requests based on sales volume and negotiate better prices with suppliers.
Dispute and Refund Management:

Handle refunds for orders with unresolved address issues or unavailable product variants.
Manage disputes for returned or refused orders, implementing a policy to minimize financial losses.
Document all communications and actions taken to track order issues effectively.
Price Reduction & Cost Savings:

Request price reductions from suppliers as sales volumes increase.
Track cost savings and document achievements, receiving a 10% royalty on all savings made.
Team Coordination:

Collaborate with the customer service team to manage customer inquiries and order issues.
Ensure smooth communication between all teams to minimize disputes and maintain high customer satisfaction.

Requirements:
Attention to Detail: Strong ability to manage and track multiple tasks accurately and efficiently.
Problem-Solving Skills: Quick thinker with a proactive approach to resolving supply chain challenges.
Communication: Excellent written and verbal communication skills to effectively interact with suppliers and team members.
Organization: Highly organized, able to prioritize tasks and manage daily responsibilities efficiently.
Tech-Savvy: Proficient in using tools like Shopify, Facebook Ads Manager, and Google Sheets.
Benefits:
Long-Term Position: We are looking for someone committed to growing with us for at least six months, with a testing period of 1-2 months.
Performance-Based Incentives: Earn a 10% royalty on all cost savings achieved through successful price negotiations and supplier management.

In your motivation additionally mention what you studied in college/university.

13th month bonus

title: Audio AI Developer – Crafting the Future of Vocal Training

You’ll be at the forefront of building an AI-driven engine that helps people improve their singing and understand their vocal performance like never before.

What You’ll Do
- Develop an audio analysis engine that extracts and refines key metrics (e.g., pitch accuracy, vocal range, agility).

- Work closely with the team to ensure seamless integration with the EchoVQ platform.
- Translate complex audio data into simple, actionable feedback for users.

Who You Are
- A developer with experience in audio processing, AI, or both.
- Skilled in tools and libraries like librosa, PyTorch, TensorFlow, or similar.
- Proficient in backend development (Python, Node.js, or Java preferred).
- Familiar with deep learning for audio tasks (e.g., spectrogram analysis).
- Able to work independently and collaborate remotely with a global team.
- Passionate about solving technical challenges and building innovative solutions.

What’s in It for You?
- Work on a project that’s set to revolutionise vocal education, with opportunities for growth and creative input.
- Flexible working hours so you can manage your time effectively.
- Competitive salary for the right candidate.
- A chance to collaborate with a passionate and supportive team that values innovation.

Job Type
- Full-time or part-time (remote).

How to Apply
- Send your CV, portfolio, or links to relevant projects through this Onlinejobs platform. Let us know why you’re excited to work on EchoVQ! Feel free to include examples if you’ve worked on audio or AI-related projects.

title: Guest Coordinator role for a fast growing UK property business
description:
Guest Coordinator role for a fast growing UK property business

Job Posting for Guest Coordinator (Out-of-Hours / Weekends)
Position: Guest Coordinator (Remote)
Hours: 40 per week
Weekend Cover: 10am - 6pm UK time
Midweek Cover: 1pm - 9pm UK time
Days Off: Tuesday & Wednesday or Wednesday and Thursday. 
Training Schedule: First two weeks, aligning hours with current guest coordinator for optimal training experience (Mon-Fri).
Company details: Seven Space (based in Norwich,UK)

About Us:
We are a serviced accommodation business based in Norwich, UK offering high-quality accommodations for short-term stays. As part of our tight-knit and supportive team, you’ll play an essential role in ensuring guest satisfaction and operational efficiency. We prioritize a supportive and flexible work environment where each team member is encouraged to grow and contribute directly to not only our success but their own career growth aspirations. 

Role Overview:
We’re looking for a highly organized, proactive Guest Coordinator to manage guest communications, support with check-ins, and assist with operational needs during our out-of-hours and weekends. This role includes handling calls from guests, though it’s not a typical BPO or call center environment with call quotas. We treat our team members like real people, not robots! Calls usually involve guest inquiries or check-in details and sometimes handling check-in issues.  Handling these calls is part of the responsibility to ensure smooth guest experiences. Think of this role as like a virtual hotel receptionist. Most messages come in via our online platform and will be handled via email. 

Key Responsibilities:
Manage guest communications via Guesty (the market leader PMS), including reservations and check-in inquiries
Address guest issues with empathy, prioritizing their satisfaction. 
Respond to calls as needed to assist guests. (This role typically involves handling guest complaints, answering inquiries about check-in details, and resolving any issues that arise during check-in or throughout their stay. Some days may involve just a few calls (around 3), other days none, and occasionally more than five. However, we are a growing business so this will eventually increase. Unlike a typical BPO setting, this position does not have call quotas or strict average handle time (AHT) requirements. The focus is simply on supporting guests as needed, and you’ll be able to answer calls directly through an app on your phone.)
Track cash reservations, process payments, and manage guest reviews on Airbnb and Booking.com. Full training given. 
Coordinate with the Operations Manager and cleaners to resolve guest issues promptly
Maintain property information in management platforms (Guesty, Asana), ensuring accuracy
Upload new properties and update SOPs as required
Support the Director or Manager with urgent admin tasks if necessary

Tools & Skills Required:
Experience in the short term rental industry (preferred but not required), customer service, or any related guest management roles.
Proficiency in Guesty, Asana, Google Workspace, Breezeway, PriceLabs, and Booking platforms (Airbnb & Booking.com) is a plus (but not required)
Strong English communication skills
Ability to handle high-priority requests calmly and effectively

Pay and Benefits:
Hourly Rate: PHP 250, with the potential for rapid increases based on performance.
Hours: Full-time, 40 hours per week, with a 1-hour lunch/dinner break.
Training Provided: Paid.
Payment: Weekly, via Wise.
Additional Benefits:
Holiday and bonus day schemes.
Performance-based cash bonuses (to be introduced for all staff in January).
13th Month Pay (pro-rata, attendance-based).

Application Process:
If you're an exceptional VA with the skills and knowledge we're looking for, we'd love for you to apply. ????

Fill out the application form linked below.
The form will ask for your basic information, work experience, and technical setup.
If you are successful at the initial application stage, you'll then also record a short video introduction of yourself and complete a few exercises to showcase your skills.

Fill out the application form linked below. 

Click here to get started:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSedND3FcW5-Qei8mK4oUKh3Q7RQSO5ZGBSP5ZkVV6bwwOZpxA/viewform?usp=sf_link

Please note, we ONLY accept applications through this application process. PLEASE DO NOT use the website’s message board as we don’t monitor this. If you have technical difficulties completing the application form, please email us at: info@seven-space.co.uk and CC cent@seven-space.co.uk. 

We will respond to all applicants within 10 days thereafter. We would appreciate it if you do not email us to confirm receipt or send your CV. We will request your CV and references from you if you progress to the interview stage. I look forward to hearing from you.

Click here to get started:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSedND3FcW5-Qei8mK4oUKh3Q7RQSO5ZGBSP5ZkVV6bwwOZpxA/viewform?usp=sf_link

title: Magento 2 Web Developer
description:
Please read this fully. The bottom of the listing tells you who to email to apply. Thanks!

We are looking to recruit 2 x Full Stack Web Developers to re-build our Magento 2 store including one senior tech lead and further to this to help build several API connections, mobile Apps and further micro-sites for niche product ranges.

We work with Adobe Commerce (Magento 2).

What will your day look like?

As a senior lead you will have responsibility for our tech stack, therefore when something isn’t working.

At the beginning, you will manage one or two mid-level developers who you should work closely with, upskilling and assigning tasks to them as well as completing your own more complex development tasks.

You should also be very hands-on and you should be full of ideas on ways to improve our website and ultimately our revenue/conversion rates.

The types of tasks which are we looking to complete are:

- Support the current website, ensuring that the site is fully updated for security reasons, fixing any bugs and developing new features
- Re-build the front-end of our Magento website in the Hyva Theme (www.hyva.io/)
- Develop a Mobile App, connected to our magento store for IoS and Android or potentially we are open to a PWA store setup build in a PWA theme, if you advise this is the correct approach.
- Build Api connections to our accounting solutions and any other relevant internally used systems who have open API availability
- Create new modules/features subject to business practices to increase our conversion rates
- Help build several microsites and landing pages to assist in the businesses sales efforts, growing company revenue.

Our Team

Our team currently consists of 14 staff members. Nine of whom are UK based and five are currently home workers in the Philippines employed directly by our company.

The current team totally consists of admin staff, graphics, copywriters, email marketing, warehouse staff and our sales team.

However, within the next 3-5 months, this Philippines team will grow by another 11 people handling various positions, from Management, SEO, Content, Marketing and VA's.

Ultimately MY end goal is that you feel part of our team and part of our companies culture, you might be working from the other side of the world, but we also want you to feel like you work for us.

What Experience Do I Need?

- Front End Development
- Back end Development
- GIT
- Java, including JQuery, vue.js 
- NextJS
- You should have at least 5 years experience in Magento 2 Development (Adobe
Commerce)
- PHP 
- My SQL
- PWA (would like, but understand its new tech)

Benefits of working for us?

- Home Based Role
- 13th Month Bonus paid annually
- Permanent work - you can rely on us for your salary, we retain top quality talent!
- Paid vacation days
- Paid sick days

How to apply?

Please send a email to chris@simplelighting.co.uk

Include:

- your resume
-  provide examples of 3 magento sites you have built, including a explanation of what you done and what work you take credit for.
- provide your Skype ID for easy communications 

Thanks for your time reading this post.
Regards
Chris

title: Technical IT Support Specialist with IFS ERP experience
description:
Join Our Team at Net Value Partners:  Technical IT Support Specialist

Company Overview:

Net Value Partners is a managed services company that provides custom-tailored business solutions for private companies. We leverage opportunities presented by emerging technologies and global talent to generate value for our clients. Our holistic approach sets NetVP apart—we become an extension of our customers, enabling them to focus on their core competencies and generate long-term value.

We specifically target businesses outside the technology sector, aiming to provide a comprehensive suite of shared services as a managed service, including IT, marketing, financial analysis, strategy, automation, due diligence, and research.

About the Role

We are seeking a Technical IT Support Specialist with experience in IFS ERP to join our dynamic IT team. This role involves providing end-to-end technical support, ensuring the optimal performance of our IFS ERP system, and addressing day-to-day IT challenges. The ideal candidate will be proactive, solution-oriented, and possess a solid understanding of ERP systems and IT infrastructure.

---

Key Responsibilities

ERP Support:
    - Provide technical support and troubleshooting for the IFS ERP system, including issue identification, analysis, and resolution.
    - Assist in the configuration, customization, and maintenance of the IFS ERP system.
    - Work closely with functional teams to ensure seamless integration of the ERP system with business processes.
Technical Support:
    - Respond to IT support tickets and provide hands-on assistance for hardware, software, and network-related issues.
    - Install, configure, and maintain IT equipment, including computers, printers, and mobile devices.
    - Ensure data integrity, backup, and recovery processes are adhered to.
System Enhancements:
    - Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and analyze business requirements for system improvements.
    - Participate in system upgrades, patches, and testing to ensure minimal disruption to operations.
    - Document technical processes and create user manuals for training purposes.
Collaboration & Communication:
    - Serve as the point of contact for IFS ERP-related inquiries and liaise with external vendors as needed.
    - Train end-users on ERP functionalities and new system features.
    - Support cross-departmental IT projects and ensure timely delivery of technical solutions.

---

Qualifications & Skills

Required Experience:
    - Proven experience in a Technical IT Support role.
    - Hands-on expertise with **IFS ERP system** (implementation, configuration, or support).
    - Strong understanding of IT infrastructure, including networks, servers, and operating systems.
Technical Skills:
    - Proficiency in SQL and report generation tools (e.g., Crystal Reports).
    - Familiarity with cloud-based solutions and virtualization technologies.
    - Knowledge of cybersecurity best practices.
Soft Skills:
    - Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
    - Strong communication and interpersonal abilities.
    - Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

---

Education & Certifications

- Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
- Relevant certifications such as IFS ERP Specialist, ITIL, CompTIA, or Microsoft certifications are a plus.

What We Offer:

- Competitive salary and benefits package.
- Opportunities for professional growth and development.
- Collaborative and innovative work environment.
-

How to Apply:

- Email Subject Line: "NetVP, I'm READY to offer solutions."
- Application Materials: Please send your resume, cover letter, and any relevant certifications or portfolio items you wish we should consider during the review process.
- Selection Process: Initial application review, technical assessments, video message, and final interviews with our leadership team.

---

If you are passionate about technology and eager to make a meaningful impact in a collaborative environment, we want to hear from you! Join Net Value Partners and help us drive value for our clients through innovative IT solutions.

title: Sr. System Administrator (MSP Experience)
description:
Full Job description
Job duties:

Experienced Systems Administrator & Infrastructure Engineer who will join the operations function.
Provide close liaison with project manager to ensure the smooth transition of new applications, systems and initiatives into the production environment
Manage production and maintenance of integration system documentation
Ensure delivery of tasks in a timely manner and report progress to line management and project teams
Review and recommend options to improve the effectiveness of infrastructure patching through automation. Provide escalation support for all Windows, Exchange and messaging, VMware and Citrix infrastructure in an enterprise Active Directory environment when undergoing patch and service pack updates.
Act as a visible point of contact for the Wintel Infrastructure (O/S and hardware)
Resolve and conduct root cause analysis of system performance / failure issues
Establish and maintain best practices, processes and procedures to underpin the operations of the business
Manage configuration, installation and release management for patches and service packs
Conduct performance monitoring and testing
Produce documentation and change management requests
Prepare and maintain technical, process and operations documentation
Support end to end patching process for Windows operating systems and products. 
Will serve as escalation for L3 tickets.

KNOWLEDGE

A degree in Computer Science, Engineering or related disciplines.
Microsoft / VMware/ Cisco Certifications
PowerShell and VB Scripting
Knowledge of Microsoft Cloud Services o365, Azure, AWS
Switching & Routing

EXPERIENCE
Over 2 Years MSP (Managed Services Provider) Experience
Experience in working through technical challenges through acquisitions and mergers
7 years or more experience of working in a systems infrastructure role.
Experience of ITIL v3 standards or a certificate in ITIL v3 foundation skills beneficial
Ability to develop automation process using scripting languages such as PowerShell and batch.
The role requires an experienced Windows engineer with extensive experience of the core set of Microsoft Server products including O365 and AWS.
This role requires a skilled engineer with a strong delivery track record.
Financial institution experience in a trading environment is desirable but not essential.
Skills
Experience in Fortigate/Cisco/Sophos/Sonicwall Routers

The successful applicant will be one of the company's engineers on Windows related technologies and will have to demonstrate strong automation skills along with the technical experience needed to build high-performance, resilient solutions.
Technologies will include but not limited to, Windows Server, Exchange Server, O365, AWS, Active Directory, VMWare ESX, PowerShell, File and Print Services, DNS, DFS, ADFS and Windows Clustering
Working, detailed knowledge of the Ivanti Patch or Shavlik for Windows Servers product
Working, detailed knowledge of Windows operating system platforms (including Windows Server 2012/2012 R2, Windows Server 2016 and Windows Server 2019 client/workstation equivalents). Knowledge of legacy Windows operating systems an advantage.
Highly methodical and 'attention-to-detail' approach
Ability to diagnose and advise on any server issues.
Good technical understanding of IT infrastructure products, standards and configuration.
Knowledge of how to patch and test high availability systems.
Broad knowledge of IT Security and finding the best way to secure the IT infrastructure of an organisation

CERTIFICATES:

Microsoft Azure or Microsoft 365 
Cisco/Fortinet Certificates

-Comfortable with both OOP and procedural programming methodologies
-Knowledge of database design and troubleshooting
-Experience with MySQL database management
-Experience with Elementor and Genesis Framework
-Expertise in WordPress, specifically:
            -Child Themes
            -Custom Post Types
            -Advanced Custom Fields
            -Syncing DEV and PROD environments
            -Hooks/Actions/Filters
            -Debugging/Security
-Ability to convert PSD mock-ups to posts and pages
-Basic SEO knowledge
-Familiarity with responsive design and website speed optimization

Basic Requirements:
-Device Specifications: Intel i5 processor or higher with a minimum of 8GB RAM
-Equipment: Webcam, speakers, and a microphone or headphones
-Internet Speed: Minimum of 100Mbps with a backup connection for outages

Work Details:
Working Hours: Monday to Friday, 8 AM to 5 PM Pacific Standard Time | Tuesday to Saturday, 12 AM to 8 AM Manila Time
Location: Anywhere in the Philippines

Why Join Us?
-Stable employment
-Competitive salary
-Bi-monthly salary
-A-Z benefits, including bonuses and annual raises
-Work-life balance 
-Work-from-home opportunity

*** The company uses a time tracker and maintains a virtual office setup via Google Meet.

For interested applicants, kindly send your CV to jay.hr@arash.law
(Note: DO NOT SEND YOUR APPLICATION through our websites or social media platforms. FAILURE TO COMPLY WITH THIS INSTRUCTION may result in DISQUALIFICATION)

title: My Amazon Guy is looking for Python Developer (VOC Analyst)!
description:
About My Amazon Guy:
My Amazon Guy is a thriving digital marketing agency with over 500+ employees and a diverse range of clients. Our culture is dynamic, rewarding, and innovative. We are dedicated to helping our clients achieve remarkable sales growth on Amazon while ensuring their peace of mind.

For Python Developer (VOC Analyst)

We are looking for a detail-oriented and analytical Python Developer/VOC (Voice of Customer) Analyst to join our team. The ideal candidate will leverage data analysis and customer feedback to drive insights that enhance customer experiences. Proficiency in Python development and experience with AI tools and data scraping are essential for this role.

If you are passionate about understanding customer needs and have the technical skills to drive insights, we invite you to apply for this exciting opportunity!

Key Responsibilities:
-Data Collection: Gather and analyze customer feedback from various sources, including surveys, social media, and support tickets.
-Data Analysis: Utilize Python to analyze large datasets and identify trends, patterns, and actionable insights that inform business decisions.
-AI Tool Utilization: Employ AI tools to enhance data processing and gain deeper insights into customer sentiments and behaviors.
-Data Scraping: Develop and implement data scraping techniques to collect additional customer feedback and market insights from online sources.
-Reporting: Create comprehensive reports and dashboards that communicate findings and recommendations to stakeholders effectively.
-Collaboration: Work closely with product, marketing, and customer service teams to ensure customer insights are integrated into business strategies.
-Continuous Improvement: Monitor and evaluate the effectiveness of changes made based on VOC insights, and propose further enhancements as needed.

Qualifications:
-2+ years of experience as a Python Developer/VOC Analyst or in a related field, with a strong focus on data analysis and customer insights.
-Proficiency in Python for data analysis, with a solid understanding of data scraping techniques.
-Experience utilizing AI tools for data analysis and customer insights, such as natural language processing (NLP) tools.
-Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret complex data and translate it into actionable recommendations.
-Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to present findings to both technical and non-technical audiences.
-Ability to work collaboratively in a cross-functional team environment and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

What can you expect as a MAG Employee?
- 40 hours a week, 8 hours a day
- Competitive salary base
- Permanent WFH setup
- Unlimited FREE access to MAG School courses and SOP Library!
- Work schedule is in EST (Monday-Friday only)
- Opportunities for professional development and career advancement

If this sounds like the perfect job for you, then what are you waiting for? Apply now!

You may also follow up on your application by emailing us at recruiting@myamazonguy.com.

title: AI Generation Specialist
description:
We’re seeking an AI Generation Specialist to create stunning visuals using AI image generation tools. If you're familiar with Python, GitHub, ComfyUI, and have experience in Adobe Photoshop, this role is for you!

What We’re Looking For:

- Proficiency in AI image generation tools
- Knowledge of Python, GitHub, and ComfyUI
- Experience with Adobe Photoshop is a plus
- Creative mindset with a passion for visual content
- Join our team and bring your AI creativity to life! Apply now!

title: Operations & Administrative Assistant
description:
Are you a people person with a knack for problem-solving?

We're seeking a dedicated and organized individual to join our growing team as an Operations & Administrative Assistant. 

This position is responsible for providing daily administrative support to the operations department within a North American company for a speaker/trainer/coach in the executive coaching and professional development niche. 

Primary responsibilities include:
- Providing support to the operations department for on-going administrative tasks 
- Optimizing and managing membership site content
- Providing client support services across all communication channels
- Providing support to the operations department for one-time projects and tasks
- Engaging with social media comments and posts

This role is remote, but it is necessary to be online and active during Eastern Time Zone working hours Monday to Friday, Canadian statutory holidays excluded. 

Training is provided during the initial 90-day probationary period, with the expectation that by the end of the 90 day period you will be thriving and fully independent in your responsibilities with minimal oversight. 

For the right candidate, this position has the opportunity to advance and grow in your career with our company.

Key Responsibilities:
1. Administrative Support 
- Create summaries & timestamps of video recordings
- Manage and upload content to membership site
- Manage Zoom recordings and transcripts
- Assist with new and ongoing team projects
- Assist with other operational tasks as needed
- Participate in weekly team meetings
- Create chapters and optimize previous YouTube videos
- Prepare and schedule new videos for YouTube

2. Client Support Services
- Responding to customer support inquiries and messages via our email channels in a timely and professional manner
- Respond to leads, prospects, and client queries and requests via all communication channels
- Schedule calls on team members’ calendars
- Provide basic technical support for membership site
- Assist with payment reminders and coordinating with team members for updates
- Escalate complex inquiries to the right team member for response
- Assisting with tasks and activities that will support client success such as
   - Onboarding and offboarding clients
   - Manage Zoom registrations for live sessions
   - Update customer information through our CRMs
   - Assist our Sales Team with administrative tasks
- Maintain a positive and helpful attitude when interacting with our customers

3. Social Media Engagement
- Respond to social media messages and comments in a timely and professional manner
- Engage with leads and prospects on social media as part of new marketing initiatives
- Maintain a positive and helpful attitude when engaging and interacting with leads and prospects

Requirements:
- Detail-oriented with the ability to prioritize and switch between multiple tasks
- Be online and active during Eastern Time Zone working hours Mon to Fri
- Quick learner and able to adapt to new systems and processes
- Reliable, accountable, and demonstrates exceptional time management
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English
- Strong customer service skills and experience
- Proficiency with social media platforms
- Familiar with using AI tools
- Self-motivated and able to work both independently and collaboratively
- Professional attitude and presentation
- Helpful and supportive spirit
- Problem solver using data
- Ability to stay calm, focused and moving forward even under pressure
- Highly developed self-awareness
- Positive attitude and ownership mentality

What We Offer:
- Monthly Salary of US$750
- Opportunities for professional growth and career advancement
- A chance to contribute to the success of a dynamic company and change the lives of our clients across the world together
- A supportive and collaborative work environment

If you thrive in a fast-paced environment and are passionate about helping others, we encourage you to apply.

Attention to detail is crucial for this role. Please demonstrate this by including the words “Yes I’m Detail Oriented” at the start of your application, list the working hours required for this position, and state your understanding of it. Only complete applications following these instructions will be reviewed.

title: Excellent Customer Service with 6+ months experience for a growing drop shipping store
description:
Please do not apply if you do not have experience with the following:

- 6+ months experience with customer support emails for e-commerce business.
- Data entry (we use sheets to keep track of after sale issues + return requests)
- Communicating with supplier
- 6+ months experience with Shopify

A plus: 6+ months experience in handling PayPal disputes
A plus: Can handle 20-25 emails an hour

I am looking for somebody who is responsible to handle all emails according to the webshops policy. You have to be able to handle stress well.

NEVER COPY PASTE TEMPLATES. I am looking for a customer supper with quality of service.

We use a return request sheet where we write doen all the return requests with the reason of this request. We track data on how many refunds have been made etc.

We use an after sale issue sheet where we write down all after sale issues. We communicate this with the supplier and update the customers accordingly on a daily bases.

I have email templates available but in rare cases you will have to write your own.

I need somebody trustworthy, who loves to work and is available for long term.

Working hours: everyday 2-4 hours. Depending on how many emails there are. Right now, there are a lot of "where is my order" emails because Canada Post is on a strike which is causing 200+ orders to be intercepted. When emails because too much we will hire another person to work 2 days. You will be managing this person.

We start with a training (unpaid) 2 days just 2 hours, we will go over the workflow and over the emails + templates
Following a 2 week trial. After you should be able to handle emails yourself. I will always be here to answer any questions.

title: Workflow & Automations Expert
description:
Position: Virtual Assistant
Location: Remote
Employment Type: Full-Time
Company: Ignition Systems
Reports To: Anthony

Job Overview:
Ignition Systems, a leading company in automating and streamlining accounting and financial services, is looking for a detail-oriented Virtual Assistant to join our team. This role requires a high degree of organization and a flair for technology, as you will manage digital workflows, integrate APIs, and support daily operations. You will work directly under Anthony, handling tasks ranging from campaign loading to complex data management, aiming to boost our operational efficiency and productivity.

Key Responsibilities:

- Campaign Management:
  - Efficiently load and manage prospect lists for various marketing and outreach campaigns.
  - Use advanced segmentation techniques to tailor communications across email, SMS, and social media.

- Daily Reporting:
  - Prepare detailed reports on daily, weekly, and monthly metrics from multiple platforms.
  - Analyze performance data to provide actionable insights that influence strategy and decision-making.

- Data Scraping and Research:
  - Perform robust data scraping and lead generation using sophisticated tools and techniques.
  - Analyze industry trends, competitive landscapes, and market opportunities to drive business strategies.

- Calendar Management:
  - Organize and synchronize calendars, schedule meetings, and ensure all engagements are prepared for with reminders and necessary materials.

- Ad Hoc Tasks and Project Support:
  - Handle various administrative tasks, contribute to project management, and help draft SOPs to standardize operations.

- Communication and Coordination:
  - Act as a liaison among teams, clients, and stakeholders, ensuring effective communication and prompt follow-up on tasks.
  - Manage incoming inquiries and direct them appropriately within the organization.

- Process Optimization:
  - Identify and implement process improvements to enhance workflow efficiency.
  - Collaborate with the leadership team to integrate new tools and techniques in the business framework.

Qualifications:

- Experience:
  - Solid experience in virtual assistance or related roles, with exposure to high-velocity business settings.
  - Proficiency in CRM, project management tools, and marketing automation technologies.

- Skills:
  - Exceptional organizational and multitasking abilities.
  - Superior communication skills, both written and verbal.
  - Competent in Microsoft Office, Google Workspace, Slack, Trello, HubSpot, and other data management tools.
  - Skillful in data analysis and interpretation.

- Technical Skills:
  - In-depth knowledge of automation platforms such as GoHighLevel, Zapier, and n8n.io.
  - Experienced in setting up and managing integrations with various APIs for system automation.

- Personal Attributes:
  - Self-driven, with a proactive approach to problem-solving.
  - Quick to adapt to new technologies and business requirements.
  - Dedicated to maintaining confidentiality and integrity in all aspects of work.

What We Offer:

- Competitive salary and comprehensive benefits.
- Flexible, fully remote working conditions.
- An opportunity to work with a dynamic team and make significant impacts in marketing, sales, and automated AI-driven business operations.
- Extensive opportunities for professional development and career advancement within an innovative company.

Interested candidates who are ready to take on this challenging and rewarding role, enhancing their skills in a cutting-edge, technology-driven environment, are encouraged to apply. Join us at Ignition Systems and help us transform the way businesses operate!

title: Tech Lead
description:
We're seeking an experienced Tech Lead to join our team on a flexible, part-time basis in a long-term role that will grow over time.

As our technical expert, you'll handle all tech-related tasks for our business, primarily focusing on our white-label EveryFunnel platform (powered by GoHighLevel).

This is an ideal opportunity for a seasoned technical professional who enjoys project-based work and values flexibility.

About the Opportunity
- Part-time, freelance position with flexible hours
- Long-term role that will grow over time (increasing hours and rate)
- Opportunity to work with multiple client accounts

Primary Responsibilities
- Serve as our go-to technical expert for all EveryFunnel/GoHighLevel needs
- Handle technical implementations and troubleshooting as needed
- Develop custom solutions using CSS and JavaScript
- Create and optimize automation workflows
- Build and customize landing pages and funnels
- Manage technical integrations and API connections
- Provide technical support and solutions on an as-needed basis

Required Expertise

Extensive experience with GoHighLevel, specifically:
- Deep understanding of white-label configurations
- Advanced automation workflow design
- Sales funnel building and design
- Troubleshooting and problem-solving

Strong development skills:
- Advanced CSS and JavaScript proficiency
- Custom front-end development
- API integration experience
- Excellent problem-solving abilities
- Strong communication skills

Must-Have Qualities
- Proven track record working with GoHighLevel
- Ability to work flexibly and respond to tasks as they arise
- Self-motivated with strong project management skills
- Excellent time management and organization
- Reliable and responsive communication
- Comfortable working independently

Ideal Candidate Will Have
- Experience working in a freelance capacity
- History of managing multiple client accounts
- Portfolio of successful GoHighLevel implementations
- Track record of creating custom technical solutions
- Experience with white-label services

Working Relationship
- Flexible work schedule
- Project-based assignments
- Regular communication via Slack

How to Apply

Please submit:
1. Your experience specifically with GoHighLevel (include screenshots or examples)
2. Portfolio of relevant technical work (CSS/JavaScript examples)
3. Your typical availability and response times
4. Preferred working hours
5. Brief description of your freelance experience and work style
6. Must include only the word "Technical" in your job application title to show you've read the entire job description

We're looking for a reliable technical partner who can handle a range of different tech needs efficiently and effectively. 

If you're an experienced GoHighLevel expert who enjoys flexible, project-based work, we want to hear from you.

I look forward to speaking with you!

Michael

title: Excel Analyst for Accounting Firm
description:
Looking for an Excel pro who has a solid understanding of standard accounting principles and financial modeling, with 5+ years of experience working with financial models in Excel & Google Sheets. Must have an advanced understanding of shortcuts, hotkeys, formulas like sumifs / xlookup / offset / index-match / etc.. SQL/VBA is not necessary.

This role will report to the owner of the firm and work with Excel/Google Sheets primarily. Attention to detail and accuracy of work to the penny is nonnegotiable. Our clients rely on us to provide them with accurate financial data and our standard of excellence is to provide that 100% of the time.

This is a long term role with potential for promotion and annual bonuses if the fit is right.

It is a requirement to work on US EST hours and be available for messages and calls throughout the workday, so please only apply if this communication requirement is workable for you.

If you have the required skills, and you are interested in this position, please send us your resume and a short paragraph about yourself :)

Lastly, in your application please respond with the first word as "EBITDA" so we know you really read the job post.

title: Remote Customer Service Virtual Assistant | Work-from-Home Opportunity
description:
SaveTheGirls.com is seeking a dedicated and detail-oriented Customer Service Virtual Assistant to manage customer inquiries and provide exceptional support across various platforms, including email, Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, and JudgeMe. The ideal candidate will possess strong written communication skills, a solid background in customer service, and at least 1 year of experience in a work-from-home (WFH) setup. The ability to handle returns, exchanges, and shipping claims efficiently is essential. This role requires proficiency in navigating social media platforms, problem-solving to resolve order issues, and accurately processing customer requests such as address changes and wholesale orders. Experience with e-commerce systems and excellent time management are vital in ensuring timely responses and seamless support for both retail and wholesale customers. Candidates should be prepared to commit to a long-term role and must not have other commitments or employment elsewhere.

Key Responsibilities:
• Customer Communication Across Multiple Platforms: Respond promptly to customer inquiries via email, social media platforms, and JudgeMe, ensuring professional and helpful communication.
• Manage Returns and Exchanges: Process customer returns and exchanges, coordinating with internal teams to ensure smooth transactions and clear communication.
• Update Customer Information: Update customer addresses accurately to prevent delivery issues and ensure order fulfillment.
• Handle Shipping Claims for Delayed Packages: File shipping claims for delayed or damaged packages, working with carriers to resolve issues quickly.
• Order Replacement Parts for Damaged Items: Place orders for replacement parts when products are damaged, ensuring prompt delivery to the customer.
• Assist with New Order Placements: Guide customers through placing new orders, addressing any questions regarding product availability, pricing, or shipping.
• Respond to Wholesale Customer Inquiries: Provide timely responses to wholesale customer inquiries about product availability, pricing, and order status.
• Process Wholesale Orders: Enter and process wholesale orders accurately, collaborating with the sales team to ensure timely fulfillment.

Qualifications:
• Experience in a WFH Setup: At least 1 year of work-from-home experience is required.
• Customer Service Experience: Minimum of 1 year of experience handling customer inquiries, returns, exchanges, and troubleshooting order-related issues.
• Strong Written Communication Skills: Ability to respond professionally and clearly to customers across email, social media platforms, and review sites like JudgeMe.
• Familiarity with Social Media Platforms: Proficiency in using and navigating Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, and other platforms to engage with customers and address concerns.
• Problem-Solving Skills: Ability to handle complaints, initiate returns, file claims, and resolve shipping and order-related issues efficiently.
• Attention to Detail: Capability to process customer requests accurately, including address changes and wholesale orders.
• Experience with E-commerce Systems: Familiarity with processing orders, managing returns, and working with wholesale platforms or e-commerce tools.
• Time Management and Organization: Ability to manage multiple customer inquiries across various platforms promptly and effectively.
• Long-Term Commitment: Willingness to commit to a long-term role without other professional commitments.

Work Schedule:
Monday to Friday:
9:00 AM to 5:00 PM Central Time (30-minute lunch break) for the first 2 weeks, then
7:00 AM to 3:00 PM Central Time (30-minute lunch break) after 2 weeks.

Compensation:
• $5/hour during the three-month training period.
• $6/hour for the following nine months.
• Opportunity for a pay increase after one year, based on performance.

Application Process: 
To apply, send a brief message explaining how you handled a difficult situation in the past with a customer, and we will provide a link to complete the formal application and standard questionnaire.

Please include "Virtual Assistant for Customer Service" in the subject line of your application.

To improve your chances, complete the English Proficiency Assessment on your Onlinejobs.ph profile through ExamEnglish.com before applying. Selected candidates will go through questionnaires, assessments, and interviews with our team.

Save The Girls is looking forward to welcoming a new team member who shares their dedication to excellence and customer satisfaction!

title: Researcher / Data Analyst
description:
Looking for a Researcher / Data Analyst to work with our small investment firm. You must be experienced in research and data analysis. Typical task include: 

- Daily research for certain organisations
- Reviewing financial software and tools 
-  Identifying, evaluating, and executing investment opportunities that align with our investment objectives.
- Collaborate with internal stakeholders to ensure reliable data is obtained
- Analyze financial statements, market trends, and industry metrics to evaluate potential investments
- Assist investments and monitor portfolio performance
- Provide regular updates on investment performance and market trends

title: Technical Support Representative (Non-voice) for an AI Tech Chatbot Start-Up
description:
We're looking for a Full-Time Technical Support Representative (fully remote) who can help the current and new customers with tech issues they encounter. Next to communicating with our customers, you're working closely with 2 of our Customer Support Representatives from the Philippines. And 3 of our hardworking developers are located all over the world. This means you need to be capable of speaking and writing proper English. To provide the best Tech Support, we feel that you must be a master in our software; this means your job will also consist of software testing with the development team. Whenever the developers release a new feature, it will be your job to break it. This will help you understand the new feature and its limits, which can help when it comes to dealing with customers.

We'd love to see at least 3-5 years of experience (the more, the better) in Tech Support. The ideal candidate has knowledge of commonly used concepts, practices, and procedures for providing customer support for a tech-based company. The candidate must rely on instructions and pre-established guidelines to perform the job functions. Primary job functions do not typically require exercising independent judgment. The candidate typically reports to a supervisor or manager. The target is to ensure excellent customer service standards and maintain high customer satisfaction.

Some Tech Support Representative responsibilities and duties:

- Helping Customers solve their Tech-Related issues
- Helping Customer Support with understanding Tech-Related issues
- Working closely with Developers to test current and new features
- Come up with documentation ideas that can help customers troubleshoot and perform self-help
- Perform random VA tasks
- In your application, before you introduce yourself, please begin by writing a few sentences about your favorite beverage.

Examples of Tech Support Representative skills we'd like to see:

- Delivery service to end-users via chat and email
- You should be able to speak and write fluently in English.
- Amenable to work on a client-based schedule and weekends
- BPO experience is an advantage.
- Excellent problem-solving skills.
- Experience handling software and systems
- Able to jump right in and start working
- Curious and always looking to discover new ways to improve processes
- Quality over Quantity
- Keen to detail
- Proactive in checking tools/integrations/automation to prevent them from breaking
- Decisive and can act as the “Brain” in the business when making decisions
- Not afraid to raise new ideas to improve processes
- Someone with previous experience in technical support is a PLUS
- Can understand how systems work as a whole and how each task fits into the picture
- Able to work on shifting and/or rotating schedules (we have 24x7 operations)
- Evaluate and analyze the issues faced by end-users and provide appropriate troubleshooting and resolution steps
- Responsible for performing determination, resolving and closing the problem
- Able to route to the appropriate level of support if not possible to solve.
- Responding promptly to customer inquiries.
- Ability to communicate possible Tech Issues to Tech Support or the Development team.
- Acknowledging and resolving customer complaints.
- Open and maintain customer accounts by recording account information
- Resolve product or service problems by clarifying the customer's complaint
- Determining the cause of the problem
- Selecting and explaining the best solution to solve the problem
- Expediting correction or adjustment
- Following up to ensure resolution
- Recommend our products, collect customer information, and analyze customer needs
- Prepare product or service reports by collecting and analyzing customer information
- Contribute to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed
- Manage large amounts of incoming tickets and chats
- Ability to recognize and generate sales leads
- Identify and assess customers’ needs to achieve satisfaction
- Provide accurate, valid, and complete information by using the right methods/tools
- Handle complaints
- Provide appropriate solutions and alternatives within the time limits and follow up to ensure resolution
- Keep records of customer interactions, process customer accounts, and file documents
- Follow communication procedures, guidelines, and policies
- Go the extra mile to engage customers
- Resolve customer complaints via Messenger, Service Desk, email, or Screen Share
- Answer questions about warranties or terms of sale
- Suggest solutions when a product malfunctions
- Work with the entire team to ensure proper customer service is being delivered
- Resolve customer complaints via Messenger, Service Desk, email, or social media

A Plus:

- Proven tech support experience
- Track record of over-achieving quota
- Strong contact-handling skills and active listening
- Familiar with CRM systems and practices
- Customer orientation and ability to adapt/respond to different types of characters
- Excellent communication and presentation skills
- Ability to multitask, prioritize, and manage time effectively
- Adaptable in terms of working hours (US EST Time-zone preferred)

Customer service representative top skills & proficiencies:

- Customer Service
- Product Knowledge
- Quality Focused
- Documentation Skills
- Listening Skills
- Resolving Conflict
- Multitask
- Patience
- Positive Attitude
- Attention to Detail
- People-Oriented
- Analysis
- Problem Solving
- Organizational Skills
- Adaptability
- Ability to Work Under Pressure
- Computer Skills
- Accountability

Some tools you will work with:

- Social Media
- Messenger
- Google Sheets
- Slack
- JIRA Service Desk
- JIRA Knowledgebase
- Click-Up
- Facebook Pages
- Facebook Groups
- Zoom for Calls and Team Calls

You'll be working closely with a growing team of 10 people, including 2 hard-working people from the Philippines. I'm looking forward to seeing your application. We do a 45-minute team call on Wednesday to discuss planning and strategy and just hang out.

Your contact will be Bernadette, Head of Support. Please include a 2-minute self-introduction voice recording link as well as your resume link!

title: Client Acquisition Specialist
description:
As a Client Acquisition Specialist, you will be at the forefront of delivering top-tier customer support across various channels, driving client acquisition, retention, and satisfaction. You will engage with clients directly to foster relationships, showcase our product’s unique features, and contribute to our growth through upselling and strategic retention initiatives.

Position: Customer Support/Client Acquisition Executive (Full-time)
Company: REsimpli (resimpli.com/)
Starting Rate: $7
Schedule: Monday to Friday, 9 AM - 5 PM EST

Key Responsibilities:
*Client Growth and Retention: Leverage your sales and client acquisition expertise to proactively identify growth opportunities, suggest upsells, and implement client retention strategies to enhance customer loyalty.
*Provide Exceptional Customer Support: Handle client inquiries and support requests via live chat, email, and other channels, ensuring a seamless and positive customer experience throughout the interaction.
*Conduct Software Demos: Deliver engaging and informative product demos to showcase our software’s unique features, driving client interest and adoption.
*Data Management and Analysis: Use Excel and other data analysis tools to track and analyze customer data, supporting informed decision-making and continuous improvement in service quality.
*CRM Management: Track, log, and manage customer interactions within our CRM system, maintaining detailed, up-to-date records to facilitate streamlined client follow-ups and resolutions.
*Collaboration with Tech Team: Work closely with our technical team to resolve complex client issues, and relay valuable client feedback to drive product development and improve the customer experience.

Qualifications:
*Proven experience in client acquisition, sales, or customer support roles.

*Proficiency in CRM systems and Excel for effective customer data management and analysis.

title: Executive Assistant with Marketing Experience (Remote)
description:
We are Expert Publishing, a performance advertising agency focused on generating ROI for our clients. We are looking for a motivated and detail-oriented Executive Assistant to join our team part-time (20 to 27 hours per week) with the potential to grow into a full-time position.

What You’ll Do:

 • Organize and manage content from clients for editing by team members (video editors, copywriters, graphic 
                designers).
 • Assist in determining which content is best suited for platforms like Facebook and TikTok based on factors like content 
                length, pacing, and how well it fits each platform’s style.
 • Track ad performance data from platforms like Facebook and TikTok. No need to manage the ads themselves— 
                launching ads and recording data will be your primary responsibility. We have systems in place to handle things like 
                turning ads off or adjusting budgets.
 • Assist in managing webinars for info product clients, recording data such as show-up rates, conversion rates, and 
                more.
 • Communicate with clients, handling admin requests and ensuring their needs are met.
 • Create SOPs (Standard Operating Procedures) for recurring tasks to document processes.
 • Perform various ad hoc tasks as needed.
 • Be proactive in solving problems and taking initiative without waiting for instructions.

Requirements:

 • Experience in the marketing space, specifically with managing content for ad campaigns.
 • Ability to assess content for different platforms (Facebook vs. TikTok) based on key platform characteristics (e.g., short 
                attention spans for TikTok).
 • Strong English communication skills, both written and verbal.
 • Ability to handle client communication and admin requests.
 • Familiarity with tracking and reporting ad performance data.
 • Proficiency in creating and following SOPs.
 • Self-starter with strong organizational skills and attention to detail.
        • While a strong foundation of admin assistance is required, if you encounter unfamiliar tasks, training will be provided 
                where needed to help you excel.
 • Must be available to work 9 a.m. – 5 p.m. Eastern Standard Time (EST), though this is a part-time role (20 to 27 hours 
                per week).


How to Apply 
**Applications that do not follow the instructions below will not be considered**

If you’re someone who can take initiative, work well in a team, and thrive in a fast-paced environment, we want to hear from you. To apply, please send a video shorter than 60 seconds, explaining why you are a great fit for this Executive Assistant position, along with your resume. Be sure to highlight your relevant experience.
