title: WordPress Site Migration Support Agent
description:
Company Overview

LevelUp is a specialist agency that provides outsourcing solutions to agencies, software vendors and website owners. For over seven years, we have successfully collaborated with a variety of companies, providing valuable technical, operational and back-office support. We have a large team of skilled and passionate professionals who are committed to delivering high-quality work for our clients. Position

Overview

We are seeking a skilled WordPress Site Migration Support Agent with at least 4 years of relevant experience to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for migrating customers’ WordPress websites from one hosting platform to another; troubleshooting and resolving issues that arise as part of the migration process. You will also run the website health assessment report via the terminal, using a mostly automated script that requires some manual setup per website.

Website Migration

Oversee the entire website migration process from start to finish.
Perform both manual and automated website migrations using internal migration tools.
Migrate website files, databases, and media between different hosting providers.
Conduct post-migration testing to ensure website functionality and performance are intact.
Technical Troubleshooting & Health Assessment

Identify and resolve common WordPress issues that arise during and after migrations (e.g., theme/plugin conflicts, database errors, broken links).
Troubleshoot migration-related problems, such as file corruption, data transfer errors, or configuration mismatches.
Execute health assessment scripts via SSH terminal, customizing the script as necessary per website.
Customer Support

Assist customers via ticketing systems and live chat, providing guidance during migrations and addressing their questions or concerns.
Offer post-migration support, resolving any issues that customers encounter after the migration process.
Document and escalate more complex issues to senior team members when necessary.

Skills & Experience

4+ years of hands-on experience with WordPress, either as a developer or a technical support agent, with in-depth knowledge of the WordPress ecosystem.
2-3 years of experience migrating websites and resolving migration-related issues.

WordPress Troubleshooting Knowledge
Experience troubleshooting common WordPress issues, such as broken links, missing images, theme/plugin conflicts, and database errors.
Ability to resolve front-end issues, such as broken layouts and styling caused by HTML, CSS, or JavaScript conflicts.
Solid understanding of PHP to resolve version compatibility issues, troubleshoot server errors (e.g., 500 internal server errors), and fix misconfigurations in files like .htaccess and wp-config.php.
Experience with troubleshooting WordPress database-related problems post-migration such as database connection issues and incompatibilities.
Experience with optimizing websites for speed and performance, including caching, image optimization, and minification.

Migration and Hosting Knowledge
Familiarity with common web hosting stacks, such as cPanel, NGINX, Apache, MySQL, etc
Experience performing manual and automated migrations between different hosting environments.
Ability to troubleshoot migration-related problems, such as file corruption, media transfer errors, and directory mismatches.
Knowledge of DNS settings, such as updating A records, CNAMEs, and handling DNS propagation during migrations.
Ability to configure and troubleshoot SSL certificates and resolve mixed content warnings.
Proficient in cPanel (or similar) and FTP client tools like Filezilla for managing website files.
Proficient in command-line operations (SSH), including WP-CLI.

Soft Skills

Exceptional written and verbal English communication skills.
Experience with technical/customer support or regularly interacting with clients on technical matters.
A strong team player with a supportive and friendly attitude.
Has a proactive and can-do approach to work.
Genuinely enjoys helping people solve their problems and cares about customer experience.
Passionate about continuous learning and self-improvement.

Nice to Have

Previous exposure to live chat or help desk tools like Help Scout, Freshdesk, or Zendesk.
Experience building WordPress websites from scratch, including designing custom themes and developing custom plugins.
Knowledge of security best practices in WordPress, including setting up firewalls, hardening server settings, and managing backups.
Fast typing speed (around 70-80 WPM).

Schedule

Full-time, 8-hour shifts (40 hours/week).
Monday to Friday, 10pm - 6am (Philippines Standard Time)

What we Offer

A Collaborative and Innovative Work Environment
Fully Remote Work Setup
Equipment provided


APPLY HERE: https://tinyurl.com/WPMigOLJ

Job Type: Full-time
Pay: Php50,000.00 - Php60,000.00 per month

Benefits:

Paid training
Work from home

title: SEO Support Channel Specialist
description:
Job Title: SEO Support Channel Specialist

Job Type: Full-Time

Location: Philippines, Remote, M-F, US Time

Restriction: This opportunity is for candidates residing in the Philippines

Compensation: $1,646.67 to $2,000.26 Monthly + Benefits


THE DIGITAL MARKETING RECRUITERS
Digital Marketing Recruiters has been in the digital marketing and recruitment space for over 25 years. We work with highly skilled marketing, digital marketing, and sales professionals and match them with our clients from diverse industries across the United States. Our selection process incorporates comprehensive resume screening, shortlisting, conducting video-recorded interviews and providing client information, administering written assessments (if required by the client), arranging client interviews, and facilitating job offers and placements.


THE CLIENT
The client’s Mission, Vision, and Values.


MISSION
Accelerate growth for innovative businesses through revenue-first marketing strategies.

*Accelerate Growth - Pushing businesses, individuals, and entrepreneurs that want to grow faster.
*Innovative Businesses - Businesses, individuals, and entrepreneurs that want to lead in their industry.
*Revenue-First Marketing Strategies - Measure success based on the client’s ability to drive revenue and increase profitability.


VISION
*Legacy and Impact - 1,000 Revenue Barriers Surpassed
*Culture and Team - 1,000 PPF Goals Achieved
*Financial Outcome - $35MM in Revenue at 20?ITDA


VALUES
*Belief
-Proactive - Create change rather than reacting to it. Anticipate future opportunities and act to address them in advance.
-Disciplined - Stay committed to the tasks and goals, not straying despite difficulties or temptations.

*Operational Effectiveness
-Candid - Communicate directly and transparently without being overly concerned with diplomacy or avoiding offense.
-Empathetic - Strive to understand and share the feelings of others, with their perspectives as the lens for interaction.

*Leadership
-Accountable - Hold responsible for the outcomes of decisions and accept the consequences of actions.
-Results-Oriented - Start with the end in mind. Prioritize efforts that lead to measurable outcomes, emphasizing productivity rather than busyness.


THE ROLE
The SEO Support Channel Specialist is responsible for the execution of organic search strategies for individual clients of the agency. As a front-line team member, they actively engage in search optimization on a daily basis to drive the necessary performance results for their clients. Their attendance and participation in internal sprint meetings and strategy sessions supports the Lead Channel Specialist in crafting ideal client work plans. The SEO Support Channel Specialist also prioritizes the most critical tasks, finding efficiencies through automation and delegation to deliver their best work.


THE IDEAL CANDIDATE
After dabbling in digital marketing, you’ve decided to go all-in. Maybe you’ve built a couple websites for your friends or family business. You get super excited about solving technical problems - everyone says you’re tech-savvy. You think like an engineer, love learning, and aren’t afraid to be wrong.


PERFORMANCE OBJECTIVES
*Execute the agency’s playbook for the particular client industry.
*Ensure account execution follows company First Principles methodology.
*Analyze performance data for monthly and quarterly reporting.
*Execute SEO tasks within the weekly sprint planning framework.
*Make updates to websites through CMS’ or direct code injection.
*Work with design and editing partners to ensure marketing campaigns are using the most compelling content creative.
*Execute regular technical SEO health checks for web properties to ensure site compliance.
*Implement and confirm conversion tracking to support reporting and measurement needs.
*Attend internal virtual client meetings for context and clarity of tasks.
*Execute audits of client and prospect accounts using the provided framework to harvest opportunities for growth.
*Work with generative AI to develop search-friendly content for client websites.
*Execute research to support marketing initiatives and direction.


CAPABILITIES AND KEY COMPETENCIES
*Knack for “figuring it out” when taking on new tasks or processes.

title: Real Estate Administrator (Maintenance Coordinator)
description:
Nautical Staffing is looking for a Maintenance Coordinator who will work for our Illinois-based client in the property management and investment industry.

The Maintenance Coordinator handles all requests from tenants, employees, or management for maintenance service within a unit or property. They coordinate with assigned maintenance technicians or vendors to complete service and follow-up with tenants or management the work was completed satisfactory. The maintenance coordinator drives the communication between the tenant, management, and vendors and must provide outstanding customer service in a manner that reflects the company’s policies and procedures.

Tenant Relations
• Handles daily maintenance requests via phone calls, texts, e-mails from residents and employees for unit and property issues.
• Follows-up with tenants via phone, texts, e-mails on completion of work orders.
• Provides timely, attentive, upbeat service to residents, and making sure their needs are met or explained in a manner that reflects positively on the company or business.

Facilities Management
• Enters work order requests driven by residents, employees, and management.
• Communicates with maintenance technicians daily on work order completions.
• Send emails and/or make phone calls to clients (vendors, tenants) regarding various matters.
• Purchases materials and services as requested by work order or management.
• Schedules turn of apartment, clean-up to market ready.
• Regularly inspect property to ensure it is in good working order; common areas are clean and well maintained, and the building meets requirements.
• Ensuring quality control standards are consistently met. Keeping track of supply and material inventories.

Other Duties
• Ensure compliance with the company policy, as well as federal and local regulations.
• Encouraged to attend meetings and/or connect with other employees to share best practices.
• Assist with maintenance special projects as needed as directed by property manager or management.

Qualifications:
• Must have prior experience in maintenance coordination for a US-based property management company
• Superior customer service and relationship management skills are required
• Excellent communication, organizational, and time management skills are required
• Proficiency in MS Office apps is required
• Experience working with Yardi is highly preferred
• Must be willing to work full-time during US Central business hours

Instructions:
• Please send the link to your updated CV
• 1 paragraph about your experience in maintenance coordination
• Use the subject "PPS - Maintenance Coordinator"

title: Order Management Lead - Remote Based
description:
APPLY HERE: bit.ly/4ckHyva (Applications not submitted via this form will not be reviewed.)

Job Description

We're seeking a highly capable and proactive Operations Lead to join our dynamic team at HiEnd Accents. This role is critical in ensuring seamless order management and operational excellence across our organization. The ideal candidate will be a problem-solver with strong leadership skills and a track record of driving operational efficiency.

What You’ll Do

- Oversee and optimize the entire order management process, from intake to fulfillment, including:
    - Bringing in customer orders from various sources (portals, EDI, emails, faxes)
    - Confirming and making changes to orders in the ERP system
    - Releasing orders/backorders for shipping and organizing for easy picking
    - Creating delivery slips, invoicing shipped orders, and managing EDI documents
    - Uploading shipping and invoicing information to customer portals

- Lead and mentor the Order Management team, driving accountability and ensuring KPIs and SLAs are consistently met or exceeded.

- Manage key accounts with complex requirements, ensuring high customer satisfaction through:
    - Responding to inquiries with same-day service
    - Handling payment issues and order-related problems
    - Providing information on inventory availability and product inquiries
    - Phone outreach

- Proactively identify and resolve operational issues, developing and implementing solutions to prevent recurrence.

- Drive continuous improvement by:
    - Analyzing operational data to identify trends and opportunities
    - Collaborating cross-functionally to implement strategic changes
    - Contributing to special projects aimed at improving performance and scalability

- Spearhead process documentation (SOP) creation, encompassing both refinement of existing procedures and development of new ones.

- Develop and maintain strong relationships with key stakeholders, including customers, vendors, and internal teams.

- Maintain accurate documentation of all actions, conversations, and issues using designated tools (e.g., Front and Airtable).

- Communicate effectively with the Warehouse team for shipment alignment.

- Perform other duties as assigned.

Who You Are

- A seasoned professional with 5+ years of experience in operations management, preferably in e-commerce or retail
- An experienced team manager
- Bachelor's degree in Business, Operations Management, or a related field
- Must have recent night shift (PH time) experience and willing to report to work during CST hours
- Proven track record of contributing to team success and driving operational excellence
- Expert in order management systems, EDI, and inventory management
- Strong analytical skills with the ability to translate data into actionable insights
- Excellent problem-solving skills with a solutions-oriented mindset
- Outstanding communication and interpersonal skills
- Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple priorities
- Proficient in MS Office suite, with advanced Excel skills
- Experience with ERP systems and process automation tools
- Experience with SAP is not a requirement but definitely a plus

Why HiEnd Accents?

Our small size and fast-paced culture reward people who act and think like owners. If you're someone who has a growth mentality, strives for exceptionalism, are a committed professional and a straight shooter, you'll fit in with our culture and go far with our company.

About HiEnd Accents

HiEnd Accents designs and creates everyday luxury bedding and linens, sheeting, decorative pillows and other home textiles. Founded in 2005 and based in Dallas, Texas, our mission is to elevate our customers' lives via beautifully designed home textiles that deliver quality and value. Our customers love our exceptional designs that span a diverse range of styles and our commitment to offering everyday luxury at accessible prices. We proudly serve a broad clientele, including department stores, furniture stores, boutique hotels, interior designers and retail customers. HiEnd Accents is based in Irving, Texas. Learn more about our brands at [www.hiendaccents.com/](http://www.hiendaccents.com/) and [www.paseoroad.com](http://www.paseoroad.com/).

title: EXECUTIVE ASSISTANT (SOCIAL MEDIA MANAGER)
description:
We are AIRASSISTANT.io, an award-winning virtual assistant agency that is passionate about helping our clients grow their businesses and processes to new heights using social media automation and sales funnels! We help professional women from the Philippines by training them to be master Executive Assistants to our clients through Social Media Management, Sales Funnel Creation, Executive Assistant Task/Calendar Management, Digital Marketing, as well as Sales & Lead Generation (yea, all that and a bag of chips ????).

Become a certified AirAssistant for FREE, then get guaranteed part-time or full-time job placement with one of our vetted clients within 30 days of certification - with opportunity for raises and full time employment. Before you read any farther - this role is not for the lazy person, freeloader, inexperienced or incompetent. You’ll probably get fired as soon as you start, so save yourself the embarrassment. If you are a detail-oriented, OVERCOMMUNICATING go-getter who loves the idea of helping change lives through entrepreneurship, then read on…

Details below:

EXPERIENCE:
1+ years of experience in Social Media Marketing, Sales Funnels, Shopify, or Digital Marketing: We're looking for a professional woman who is passionate about helping changemakers simplify their lives by setting up systems that will allow them to operate their businesses with more ease and less overwhelm. You have experience with sales funnel and CRM software
1+ years of experience advertising on platforms like Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, within a Marketing team consisting of Paid Acquisition, Organic Marketing, Customer Retention, & Product Marketing: We’re looking for an emerging leader who has the potential to head a team in the future that will report directly to you. Having leadership experience is a MAJOR plus
1+ years of experience as a Virtual Assistant or Executive Assistant with track record of company success.: You've done it all from managing schedules to email & calendar management. You have a meticulous eye for detail where Prioritization and Organization are your love language
Creating SOPs (Standard Operating Procedures): You’ll ensure each business function has detailed documentation for repeatable and scalable growth if it isn't already in place. If you see gaps, you take the initiative to fill them and produce results without anyone knowing there was an issue (yea, we did say all that and a bag of chips :-)
Experience working at a digital/online product/platform: You’re familiar with online courses, digital products & platforms and popular tools in the business space ranging from landing page builders and email service providers to CRMs, and course hosting platforms aren’t foreign to you (We teach tools like Shopify, Convertkit, Kajabi, Teachable, Learnworlds, Calendly, etc)

ABOUT YOU:
“You down with SOP? Yeah you know me!”—You’re an advocate for SOPs (Standard Operating Procedures) to make our systems repeatable & scalable.
Your love language is processes & predictable, meteoric growth. We never question company progress towards the quarterly and yearly goals because you keep real-time metrics for all projects.
You’re aware of new software and can look at current systems and identify how to automate tasks a company has been doing manually for months.
You’re addicted to digital processes & automation in the world of social media because you love building connections in the digital space and you’ve seen how powerful it can be in business growth
You’re driven by metrics & tracking. You know that you can’t improve something unless you measure it, so you develop ways to measure performance so your company is always predictably improving.
Timeliness and deadlines are your jam. When we have a team call at 10:00am, you show up at 9:55am. When the deadline is Tuesday at 5:30pm, you have it done Monday before you clock out.
You overcommunicate clearly and confidently. If you agree/disagree with something, you communicate that without hesitation or overthinking. You’re no stranger to asking why we do things a certain way to ensure we’re intentional with our resources. You send regular updates without having to be asked, and always make sure to treat the company you work for as if it was your own brainchild.
You’re a leader and team player. Ego? What ego? If something needs to be done, you dive in to make sure all critical tasks are accounted and cared for.

*because we care about detail-oriented applicants, mention the secret word “PINEAPPLE” in your application so we know you read this in its entirety*

If you’re nodding your head “Yes” to the above, proceed below to apply.

PERKS:
We're committed to setting you up for success as a certified Air Assistant that is equipped to take on any role your employer assigns you to. Upon acceptance as a candidate, you get exclusive access to trainings that will certify your skills in:

Task & Calendar Management
Launch/Sales Strategy Planning
Sales Funnel Tech Setup (For E-Commerce or Service Based Businesses)
Social Media Management
Digital Media Marketing (Including Email and SMS Marketing)
Lead Generation
After one week of training and assessment, you're officially a certified Air Assistant, which means we work to guarantee a part-time remote job with a woman-owned business dedicated to long term success of her company's team and clients/customers. Before signing an employee agreement under our umbrella, you get to meet them in a virtual Executive Assistant Mixer to make sure there is a connection between brand and AA.

Apply and we'll be in touch soon to invite you to next steps in the application/candidate process! Again - don't apply unless you are ready to hit the ground running with your current digital marketing/automation experience


Part time work hours (minimum 25 hours per week required)

title: (5 points+) Facebook Ads and Go High Level
description:
Job Description:
We are looking for a skilled and experienced Facebook Ads Specialist who is proficient in using GoHighLevel. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of digital marketing strategies, excellent communication skills, and a proven track record of managing successful Facebook ad campaigns.

Key Responsibilities:

Develop, implement, and manage Facebook ad campaigns that align with business goals.
Use GoHighLevel to automate marketing processes, manage leads, and optimize customer journeys.
Analyze campaign performance data to provide insights and recommendations for improvements.
Create and manage ad budgets, ensuring cost-effective allocation of resources.
Collaborate with the content creation team to develop engaging ad creatives.
Conduct A/B testing to determine the most effective ad strategies.
Monitor and report on campaign performance, including key metrics and ROI.
Stay updated with the latest trends and best practices in digital marketing and Facebook advertising.

Requirements:
Experience: Minimum of 2 years of hands-on experience with Facebook Ads and GoHighLevel.
Language: Fluent in English, both written and verbal.

Skills:
Strong understanding of Facebook Ads Manager and its features.
Proficiency in using GoHighLevel for marketing automation and lead management.
Analytical skills to interpret campaign data and make data-driven decisions.
Creative thinking to develop compelling ad creatives and strategies.
Ability to manage multiple campaigns simultaneously and meet deadlines.
Excellent communication skills to collaborate effectively with the team.

title: Data Analysts and Geeks Wanted
description:
Hey Data Geeks!

We’re a spices company selling on Amazon US, and we’re cooking up something big! We're rapidly scaling up our product catalog and need your brainpower to spice up our advertising game.

We’re swimming in data—huge datasets about customers who clicked on our ads based on:

 1. Keywords
 2. Ad placements
 3. Time of day
 4. Price points
 5. Bid amounts

And more! We’re experimenting with designs as variables, and need inquisitive, detail-oriented minds to dive in, find patterns, and help us build automations to skyrocket our growth. If you're someone who loves, lives and swears by data, this role is for you.

Are you:

 • A data enthusiast who loves digging into large datasets?
 • Curious about how tiny tweaks can make a big impact?
 • Ready to solve complex advertising puzzles?

If so, we want to hear from you!

How to Apply:

Just apply to this role and include the word "SPICE" in your title. This will let us know that you've indeed read this job post thoroughly. Make sure to add your resume in the application and a message that explains why you think you would be a good fit for this role.

Help us spice up the world—one data point at a time!

title: Environmental Reports Analyst I
description:
Job Summary
Environmental Reports Analyst I is the first level in the Reports Department. Individuals in this position are proficient in producing reports, retrieving historical data, maintaining databases, communicating (verbal & written), performing basic administrative tasks, and understanding scientific methods, terminology, and units of measuring as it relates to producing reports for various Environmental Health & Safety (EHS) reports. 

Essential Duties and Responsibilities: 
The essential functions include, but are not limited to the following: 
-Standard report production – Focused on building sciences (asbestos, lead & mold).
-Report and project tracking.
-Internal department training, communication, and office administration tasks. 

Report Production:
-Utilize multiple programs to find and cross-check information. These programs may include, but are not limited to, Microsoft Office Suite, Microsoft Planner, Microsoft Teams, and EnviroShare.
-Create and label floor plans utilizing design software.
-Read, extract and understand data from laboratory reports.
-Use report templates to create accurate deliverables that may consist of a written summary, tables, floor plans, photo pages, and/or laboratory reports. Able to apply results from reports to standard recommendations. 
-Combine templates depending on the project (e.g., sewage and mold). 
Ensure all documents are properly formatted and consistent in wording and data throughout reports.
-Comfortably initiate communication with field staff, project managers, and others involved in the project at hand.
-Able to complete reports (from project assignment to client delivery) by resolving unforeseen issues during report compilation. Notify the supervisor of issues.
-Update work orders and other related project forms/documents, when needed.
-Adapt reports to client’s requests.
-Amend previous reports with new data.
-Complete standard reports with 90?curacy and within the expected duration 90% of the time, with little to no assistance.
-Perform other job duties, as needed. 

Environmental Health & Safety Requirements: 
-Ensure all work is performed in accordance with ISO14001 EMS, Environmental Management System.
-Intervene and take appropriate actions on any non-conformance, possible non-conformance, or concerns affecting.
-Compliance with any known legal, regulatory or company requirements,
-Must follow all SOPs and Company Safety Rules. Utilize all required environmental controls during standard operations, and non-standard/emergency conditions.
-Use Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) as required. PPE required includes chemical-resistant gloves and protective clothing, ear, head, foot, and eye protection.

Other Requirements:
-Typing speed 60+ WPM.
-Must be able to work overtime, when needed. 

Please note that the working hours will be Pacific Daylight Time (PST).

title: Systems & CRM Management Specialist | $5 USD/hour, $800 USD/month | UK Hours
description:
We provide:
Collaborative Environment: Collaborate with the CEO of the business dedicated to streamlining automotive operations. 
Opportunity for Growth: Contribute to the growth of a thriving automotive business and develop your skills in operations management, system building, and delegation, with the opportunity to manage your own team in the future. 
Competitive Compensation: Receive competitive pay and enjoy the benefits of working remotely. 

We're seeking a dedicated Remote Automotive Operations Coordinator to join our dynamic team. In this role, you'll play a pivotal part in streamlining our automotive business by building systems, creating SOPs, and delegating tasks to ensure efficient operations. 

Role Vision:
Enjoy the flexibility of working remotely while contributing to the growth of a thriving automotive business. Gain valuable experience in operations management and develop your skills in system building and delegation.

Potential Tasks:
-System Building: Develop and implement efficient systems to optimize business processes. 
-SOP and Manual Creation: Create clear standard operating procedures and manuals for team members to follow. 
-Task Creation: Break down projects into manageable tasks and assign them to team members. 
-Delegation: Effectively delegate tasks to team members based on their skills and workload. 
-Data Management: Maintain accurate records and data for analysis and reporting. 
-Problem-Solving: Identify and resolve operational issues promptly. 

Skills and Desirables:
>CRM Systems: Experience in and understanding of CRM systems for customer relationship management. 
>Computer Literacy: Proficiency in using various computer software applications. 
>Strong English: Excellent communication and analytical skills. 
>Tech-Savvy: Ability to learn and adapt to new technologies quickly. 
>Organizational Skills: Meticulous attention to detail and ability to manage multiple tasks. 
>Problem-Solving Skills: Ability to think critically and find solutions to challenges. 

In the application form, you'll be asked a unique word: put in 'CRM' to show us you've got a keen eye for detail.

Additional Requirements
-10mbps stable internet connection with backup.
-Working computer/laptop (Minimum Requirement: Processor - Intel i5 or equivalent, RAM - 8GB).
-Minimal to no power outage in your area. 

To get to the other side, start here: https://bit.ly/automationsspecialist

title: Full Stack Python Developer
description:
Full Stack Python Developer (React/TypeScript + Python)

What We're Looking For

- Full Stack Expertise: You excel in both backend and frontend development, proficient in Python as well as React and TypeScript.
- Passion for Python: You are an expert in Python and its frameworks, with a knack for backend development.
- Frontend Mastery: You have strong experience with React and TypeScript, building intuitive and responsive user interfaces.
- Data Analytics Expertise: You have a proven track record in data analytics, able to turn data into insights.
- AI Enthusiast: You are intrigued by AI technologies and eager to apply them in practical scenarios.

Responsibilities

- Backend Development: Build and maintain robust backend systems using Python.
- Frontend Development: Create and enhance user interfaces using React and TypeScript.
- Data Handling: Design and manage data models and databases.
- Collaboration: Work alongside cross-functional teams to integrate backend services with front-end platforms.
- Code Quality: Write clean, efficient code and participate in code reviews to uphold high standards.
- Data Pipelines: Develop and optimize pipelines for efficient data analytics.
- ETL Processes: Manage the extraction, transformation, and loading of large data sets.
- Insight Generation: Utilize statistical analysis and data visualization for actionable insights.
- AI Integration: Implement machine learning algorithms and embrace data science methods.

Qualifications

- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
- 3-5 years of experience in full stack development with a focus on Python, React, and TypeScript.
- Strong knowledge of Python and its frameworks (e.g., Django, FastAPI).
- Proficiency in React and TypeScript for frontend development.
- Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, MongoDB).
- Proficiency in data modeling, ETL processes, and data warehousing.
- Familiarity with RESTful APIs and server-side logic.
- Experience with pandas.
- (Bonus) Knowledge of machine learning libraries (e.g., PyTorch) and data science methodologies.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work independently or as part of a team.
- Strong communication skills and fluency in English.


What is the Compensation Details?
This is a full-time position. The salary based on your experience.

Are you open to part-time or hourly contracts?
Yes, we do.

How much programming experience do I need to have?
This is a mid to senior position focusing on full stack development. You should have at least 3-5 years of experience in creating and sustaining data-oriented initiatives, improving our data systems' efficiency, and enhancing our backend and frontend services.

title: Senior Software Engineer - Angular 9+ / ASP NET Core / C#
description:
# About HelloNote

HelloNote is a web-based application that allows physical, occupational, and speech therapists to create defensible, legible, and comprehensive patient documentation.

Securely enter, save, and access patient data anytime, anywhere, from any web-enabled device.

We are passionate about what we do and gravitate toward individuals who share our vision and desire to challenge the conventional way of thinking. We believe wholeheartedly in a work-life balance and providing the culture needed to nurture creative minds. We strive to hire people who are not only accomplished in their respective fields, but who pursue passions in their personal time.

In this role you will:

*Contribute to a rapidly growing and robust application using the latest .NET Core technologies

*Write code that is clean, testable, and easy to maintain

*Exhibit strong initiative, leadership and accountability on all projects

*Work with a multifaceted and talented team to help innovate and define our marketplace

*Ensure our coding standards, application architecture and software engineering processes are consistent and up to date

*Brainstorm and prototype new concepts and approaches



The basic requirements for this role are:

• 5+ years experience in a full-time position in a software developer role

• Proficiency in writing well-structured, easily maintainable, well-documented code in ASP.Net Core C#, SQL Server and writing unit tests in NUnit or XUnit, Selenium, and Postman Tests

• Experience adhering to software engineering best practices for the full development life cycle, including coding standards, code reviews, source control, continuous integration, build processes, testing, and operations

• Strong knowledge of AWS or Azure

• Extensive knowledge of test-driven development (TDD) and the various quality assurance testing methodologies that encompass software engineering

• A solid foundation in computer science, with competencies in object-oriented design, database schemas, application architecture, and software design practices



Qualifications:

• Bachelor’s degree related to work

• Experience in working with the following:

o Visual Studio C#, OOP

o ASP.Net Core / ASP.Net MVC

o Angular 9+ / JavaScript / JQuery

o SQL Server

What’s in it for you?

• An exciting Full-Time position

• Competitive pay (negotiable)

• Work from home

• Work with awesome people in a dynamic and successful business

• Supportive and open-minded employer

Perform root cause analysis of incidents and work on implementing solutions to prevent future occurrences.
Collaborate with the development and DevOps teams to deploy and validate fixes or improvements in production.
Maintain documentation related to issue resolution, system architecture, and processes.
Work closely with end users and internal teams to resolve any application issues and provide support for ongoing queries.
Participate in an on-call rotation to provide 24/7 support when necessary.

**The basic requirements for this role are:**
• 3+ years of experience in production support, technical support, or a similar role
• Strong troubleshooting skills, with the ability to diagnose issues across different layers, including application, database, and infrastructure
• Experience with monitoring tools and systems like Azure App Insights, Datadog, or similar
• Familiarity with log management tools like Log Analytics
• Knowledge of SQL and the ability to query databases for troubleshooting purposes
• Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines, automated deployments, and cloud platforms like Azure
• Understanding of ITIL practices and experience in incident management

**Qualifications:**
• Bachelor’s degree in a technical field, or equivalent experience
• Strong understanding of web applications and services architecture
• Experience working with the following:
  o ASP.Net Core / MVC applications
  o SQL Server for diagnosing issues
  o Scripting knowledge (PowerShell, Bash, etc.)
  o Application performance monitoring tools

**What’s in it for you?**
• An exciting Full-Time position
• Competitive pay (negotiable)
• Work from home
• Work with awesome people in a dynamic and successful business
• Supportive and open-minded employer

title: Virtual Assistant w/ Google Sheet Expertise
description:
Junior Virtual Assistant w/ Google Sheet Expertise

Location: Remote (Hong Kong Timezone - Monday to Friday, and Half Day on Saturday)

Sign-On Bonus:
Successful candidates will receive a PHP 10,000 sign-on bonus upon completion of the application process. Terms and conditions would apply.

Job Summary

The Google Sheet Expert is responsible for harnessing the power of Google Sheets to manage, analyze, and improve various aspects of the supply chain, contributing to more efficient operations and better decision-making within the department.

We need someone with high-level attention to detail and only delivering accurate work on time. Additionally, you should be able to take a conversation and turn it into a high-quality document and instructions.

Responsibilities:

Data Management:
• Creating, maintaining, and organizing Google Sheets to manage critical supply chain data such as inventory levels, order tracking, procurement, and supplier information.
Data Analysis:
• Use advanced functions and formulas to analyze data and generate reports that provide insights into supply chain performance, such as demand forecasting, lead times, and supplier performance metrics.
Automation:
• Develop and implement scripts and macros to automate repetitive tasks and data entry, increasing efficiency and reducing errors in supply chain operations.
Collaboration:
• Collaboration within the department and across the organization by setting up shared spreadsheets and access controls, allowing team members to input and access data in real time.
Integration:
• Integrate Google Sheets with other software applications and data sources within the supply chain ecosystem.
• Ensuring seamless data flow and connectivity between different systems.
Compliance and Security:
• Implement security measures and access controls to protect sensitive supply chain data, ensuring compliance with data privacy regulations and company policies.
Process Improvement:
• Identify bottlenecks and inefficiencies in supply chain processes and propose improvements.
Reporting:
• Create customized dashboards and reports using Google Sheets' data visualization tools.
• Help the supply chain department make informed decisions based on real-time data.
• Attend daily check-ins and weekly departmental review and planning.

Qualifications:

• A minimum of one (1) year of Virtual Assistant experience, primarily focused on handling Google Sheets.
• With excellent English verbal and written communication skills.
• Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Business, Computer Science, or a related field is preferred.
• Proficiency in Google Sheets, including advanced formulas, custom macros, and pivot tables.
• Experience with Google Workspace, including Google Docs, Google Slides, and Google Drive.
• Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret and communicate complex data sets and trends.
• Strong attention to detail and ability to organize and prioritize work efficiently.
• Excellent interpersonal skills, with the ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.

Essential Requirements for Remote Work:
• Reliable Laptop or Desktop Computer.
• Stable and high-speed internet connection.
• Power source and backup internet connection in case of electricity interruptions.

***How to Apply***

Take the next step by completing our application form:
forms.clickup.com/3737068/f/3j1fc-35945/HQ578HNFWTW3B7LXDL

Note: Only successful candidates will be contacted for the next phase of the selection process. We appreciate your time and interest in joining our team.

title: Sales Dealer Development (Motorcycle Sector)
description:
Sales Dealer Development
Location: Field Work / Remote for Admin duties
Hong Kong Timezone - Monday to Friday, and Half Day on Saturday

Sign-On Bonus:
Successful candidates will receive a PHP 10,000 sign-on bonus upon completion of the application process. Terms and conditions would apply.

Job Summary

We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Sales Dealer Development to join our remote team and contribute to our growth and success. You will be responsible for developing and managing our dealer network, selling Electric Vehicles and motorcycles, consumables, and accessories.

You will play a crucial role in expanding our market presence and driving sales growth in your assigned region, the Philippines. This role requires excellent communication skills, strong sales acumen, and the ability to handle follow-ups efficiently.

Responsibilities

Dealer Network Development:
• Identify and establish relationships with potential clients and dealers to expand our distribution network.
• Develop a thorough understanding of client and dealer needs and market trends.
• Create strategies to recruit, onboard, and maintain a strong network of clients and dealers across the Philippines.
• Effectively researching prospects and generating leads.
• Contact potential clients and dealers on the phone, by email, and in person.

Sales and Account Management:
• Meet or exceed sales targets by actively selling Electric vehicles and motorcycles, consumables, and accessories to clients and dealers.
• Prepare and send quotes and proposals to dealers and clients.
• Provide excellent account management, cultivate long-term relationships, and respond to client requests and issues in a timely and professional manner.

Industry Knowledge:
• Possess a good understanding of the automotive and motorcycle industry, including market trends, competitor analysis, and consumer preferences.
• Stay up to date with industry developments and as needed, adapt sales strategies accordingly.

Collaboration:
• Work closely with the Sales and Marketing departments to develop effective sales strategies, promotional campaigns, and marketing materials.
• Provide feedback on market needs, customer preferences, and competitor activities to drive product development and marketing initiatives.

Travels:
• Travel within the Philippines to meet with clients, and dealers, and attend industry events.
• Conduct product presentations, negotiate contracts, and introduce new products to potential clients and dealers.

Sales Reporting and Analysis:
• Prepare regular sales reports, providing insights into sales performance.
• Participate in weekly Sales review and planning.
• Maintain accurate sales records, including sales reports, customer databases, and activity logs.
• Analyze sales data to identify opportunities for growth, optimize sales strategies, and improve overall sales effectiveness.

Qualifications:
• With at least one (1) year of experience as a Sales Manager within the motorcycle industry.
• Strong verbal and written communication skills.
• Strong sales and negotiation skills with a track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets.
• Excellent interpersonal skills are required to establish and maintain relationships with clients and dealers.
• Excellent phone and presentation skills.
• Ability to work independently and remotely, demonstrating self-motivation and accountability.
• Proficient in using CRM software and sales productivity tools.
• Excellent organizational and time management skills.
• Willingness to travel within the Philippines (Luzon, Visayas, or Mindanao depending on the region the candidate is located) for client meetings and industry events.

Essential Requirements for Remote Work:
• Reliable Laptop or Desktop Computer.
• Stable and high-speed internet connection.
• Power source and backup internet connection in case of electricity interruptions.

***How to Apply***

Take the next step by completing our application form:
forms.clickup.com/3737068/f/3j1fc-35945/HQ578HNFWTW3B7LXDL

Note: Only successful candidates will be contacted for the next phase of the selection process. We appreciate your time and interest in joining our team.

title: Level 2 IT Support Engineer + AU Client + benefits
description:
Apply Here: https://recruitcrm.io/apply/17318995813890066047oWl

This is a remote position.

Job Brief  

We are seeking an IT Support Specialist with Level 2 experience to join our dynamic IT team. This role will involve handling both Level 1 and Level 2 support tasks, providing comprehensive technical assistance across our server infrastructure, network systems, and end-user devices. The ideal candidate will possess a deep understanding of SOC logs, Windows Server platforms, Active Directory, Microsoft Azure, and Intune management. Your ability to troubleshoot complex issues efficiently while providing high-level customer service will be key to success in this position. This role is not only technical but also requires a personable approach to effectively communicate and solve problems for a variety of internal and external stakeholders. 

Responsibilities: 

Server and Network Support: Manage and troubleshoot issues across Windows Server environments, including Active Directory and Group Policy management. Conduct network troubleshooting and manage VMware vSphere infrastructures. 

Security and Compliance: Navigate through SOC logs to identify and respond to potential security incidents, ensuring the integrity and security of server and network operations. 

End-User Support: Provide expert troubleshooting for workstation issues, including hardware and software problems. Support Citrix desktop environments and handle routine maintenance tasks. 

Modern Workplace Management: Administer and optimise cloud-based environments using Microsoft Azure and Intune. Implement policies and procedures to enhance the security and efficiency of cloud applications and services. 

Automation and Scripting: Utilise PowerShell and other scripting languages to automate tasks and improve system processes, contributing to the overall efficiency of the IT department. 

Documentation and Reporting: Maintain accurate documentation of all IT systems, changes, and user guides. Prepare detailed reports on IT infrastructure status and incident resolutions. 

Requirements: 

Advanced IT Knowledge: Strong understanding of all Windows Server platforms, Active Directory configurations, and Group Policy management. 

Experience with SOC and VMware: Proficiency in navigating SOC logs, identifying incidents, and managing VMware vSphere environments. 

Troubleshooting Skills: Proven ability to troubleshoot complex workstation and server issues. 

Cloud and Network Expertise: Experience with Microsoft Azure, Intune, and basic network troubleshooting skills. 

Desirable: 
Knowledge of Citrix desktop environments and network troubleshooting. 
Experience in a customer-facing IT support role. 

Software: 
Proficient in Microsoft Azure, Intune, VMware vSphere, Citrix, and Windows Server environments. 
Familiar with PowerShell scripting and automation platforms. 

Education: 
A bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field is preferred. 

Relevant certifications in Windows Server, Microsoft Azure, VMware, or Citrix are highly valued. 

Personal Attributes: 
Communication: Excellent written and verbal English skills, with the ability to simplify complex technical details for non-technical stakeholders. 
Problem-Solving: Structured and strategic thinking with a pragmatic approach to solving problems. 
Teamwork: Strong team player with a cooperative and supportive attitude. 
Emotional Intelligence: Emotionally mature with the ability to receive constructive feedback positively. 

Time Zone: Australian Business Hours 
Applicant Location: Must be Filipinos living in the Philippines

title: Recruitment Client Coordinator
description:
OPEN TO FILIPINO JOBSEEKERS ONLY

WORK-FROM-HOME SETUP

SHIFT SCHEDULE: 12:00 AM - 8:00 AM PHILIPPINE TIME


As a Recruitment Account Coordinator at Outsource Recruiter, you will play a pivotal role in simplifying the hiring process for our clients by managing end-to-end recruitment. This includes conducting client intake and sales meetings, understanding their hiring needs, and ensuring that we deliver top-tier talent from the Philippines.


About the Employer:

Outsource Recruiter is a done-for-you global recruitment solution. We help businesses build a team of quality outsourced talent one hire at a time.

Our goal is simple: To simplify the process of hiring vetted, top-tier talent in the Philippines.

Save time and increase our client's chances of hiring success by having our recruitment team source and vet applicants to bring you the top 1% of outsourced experts.

Company core values:

• Simplicity - find the most simple solution
• Excellence - only turn excellent work
• Accountability - be responsible for your results
• Transparency - share your struggles, share your wins, ask for help
• Synergy - we can produce more together than individually



Responsibilities:

• Lead client intake and sales meetings to identify the client's recruitment needs.
• Facilitate the full recruitment cycle, from sourcing and screening to interviewing and placement.
• Client management which includes handling complex issues and resolving replacement requests from clients to ensure client satisfaction.
• Foster strong relationships with clients, maintaining transparency and regular communication.
• Collaborate with other team members to produce excellent results, embodying our core value of Synergy.
• Track recruitment metrics and take accountability for delivering exceptional outcomes.


Required skills and qualifications:

• 1-2 years of experience in end-to-end recruitment and account management.
• Strong communication skills for client interaction and team collaboration.
• Commitment to delivering excellent work in line with our core values.
• Ability to manage multiple recruitment projects efficiently, prioritizing simplicity in solutions.


Preferred skills and qualifications:

• Experience with applicant tracking systems (ATS) and recruitment software specifically Manatal.
• Familiarity with talent sourcing techniques, including LinkedIn and other online platforms.
• Strong negotiation and client management skills.
• Ability to adapt quickly in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
• A proactive attitude with a desire to continuously learn and improve.


Nice to have:

• Experience working in a recruitment agency.


To Apply:

1. Kindly go to this link: https://www.careers-page.com/outsource-recruiter-careers/job/QYXV44RV
2. Please note that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.
3. Anyone who does not follow the instructions above and the ones indicated on the form will not be considered.

title: Executive Assistant
description:
Type of employment: Full-time (Remote)
Budget: $5 to $7/hour
Shift Schedule: 7AM-3PM EST

We are seeking an Executive Assistant who will play a critical role in managing administrative tasks and customer support functions. This position requires strong computer skills, excellent communication, and the ability to handle daily operations independently. The Executive Assistant will manage the VIP hotline, process customer inquiries, assist with billing, and coordinate essential administrative duties.

About the Employer:
Our client is a leading dry-cleaning provider known for top-quality service and eco-friendly practices. With over 20 years of industry expertise, the owner is actively involved in daily operations, ensuring exceptional results and customer satisfaction.

Company core values:
- Exceptional Customer Service Putting client satisfaction first with unmatched service quality.
- Solution-Oriented Approach When requests arent possible, we find alternatives that work.
- Clear Communication Honest, transparent, and responsive in all client interactions.

Responsibilities:
- Provide top-notch customer support through various communication methods such as telephone, text and email
- Manage client VIP hotline Monday through Friday.  Typical hours include approx. 7AM (EST) to 10AM (EST).  These hours could change based on the business’s needs.
- Various billing responsibilities to include daily, weekly and/monthly client billing, new account setup and clearing payments.
- Update employee hours as need and process payroll on a weekly basis and run and manage payroll reports.
- Monthly tax reporting.
- Monitor social media accounts (possible updating) and respond to google reviews.
- Provide operational support as needed. 
- Create and develop Word document and spreadsheets as needed.
- Enter and setup new employees in the payroll system.
- Develop an understanding of how the business operates to ultimately provide seamless support.
- Perform other administrative duties and tasks as needed and directed by the executive.

Required skills and qualifications:
- Excellent critical thinking skills with the ability to work independently and make independent decisions when needed.
- Strong communication, collaboration and follow-up skills.
- Customer focused and friendly personality.  Must be able to interact in a pleasant manner with clients and operational staff at all times.
- Strong troubleshooting skills with an ability to methodically work through and issue to find the best resolution possible.
- Solid understanding of Windows computer systems with a strong emphasis on Microsoft Word and Excel.
.
Preferred skills and qualifications
- Familiarity with POS systems (training can be provided).
- Excel skills for tracking and reporting purposes.
- A bubbly, polite, and patient personality that engages positively with customers.

To Apply
1. Kindly go to this link: https://www.careers-page.com/outsource-recruiter-careers/job/QWVY6776
2. Please note that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.
3. Anyone who does not follow the instructions above and the ones indicated on the form will not be considered.

title: Executive Finance VA - QuickBooks required (JOB ID:DAVBEN)
description:
Job Title : Executive Finance VA - QuickBooks required
Job ID  :DAVBEN
Industry :  Property Management
Location :  Remote - PH
Hours  : Monday-Friday, 9:00 AM - 05:00 pm PST
Pay rate :  $5-$8/hour
Target Start :At least 11/11



About the Client:
The client is a versatile real estate and property management firm specializing in optimizing property investments through strategic acquisition, comprehensive management, and development. With a portfolio that spans residential, commercial, and Airbnb properties, the client takes an innovative approach to enhancing property value. They are dedicated to delivering quality service across various property sectors, focusing on maximizing returns while maintaining high standards in property upkeep and customer satisfaction.

Job Overview:
The client, a diversified holding company, is seeking an Executive Finance VA - QuickBooks with a strong focus on finance and accounting, particularly in inventory management. This role emphasizes handling inventory-heavy finance work, alongside property management support.
Key Responsibilities:
Inventory-Focused Financial Management :
Inventory Analysis and Forecasting: Generate projections based on Walmart/Amazon reports and inventory data, utilizing lead time metrics and monthly unit sales forecasts.



Cash Flow and Financial Reporting: Manage daily cash flow updates, reconcile QuickBooks accounts, and prepare P&L and balance sheets with a focus on inventory data.
Data Management: Sort and analyze large data sets in Excel, generating insights critical for inventory-based financial decisions.
Property Management Coordination:
Oversee vendor coordination and maintenance requests, ensuring efficient communication and support.
Candidate Qualifications:
Skills in Inventory-Heavy Finance:
Proficiency in inventory forecasting, cash flow reporting, and data analysis with QuickBooks and Excel.
Experience with inventory-heavy businesses, with strong organizational skills to manage and analyze stock data.
Excellent communication for vendor and client interactions via WhatsApp and email.

title: System Administrator
description:
PLEASE READ: Applicants MUST SUBMIT APPLICATION VIA THIS FORM to be considered:

https://itgenius.bamboohr.com/careers/79?source=aWQ9MjQ%3D
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Job Overview: We are looking for a System Administrator who will be forward-thinking and results-oriented to join our Engineering team. You will be in charge of the management and maintenance of our IT infrastructure. You will be responsible for ensuring that all our systems and platforms run smoothly, securely, and efficiently, thereby driving creativity and automating processes too. This role plays a vital part in ensuring that the company leverages the full potential of our applications to enhance collaboration, productivity, and communication.

Key Responsibilities:

Technology leadership:
-Liaise with senior executives on technology management strategy for the business and collaborate on technology-driven internal projects. 
-Act as a mentor and a go-to for junior engineers to seek support for technical queries they are not confident on. 
-Support marketing technology escalations that marketing team and other engineers are not able to resolve themselves (relating to front-end web development i.e. conversions, integrations, UTM tracking, website performance)

Google Workspace Administration:
-Configure and manage Google Workspace settings for user accounts, groups, and email distribution lists.
-Implement data access and sharing controls to ensure information security.
-Set up and manage email routing, filtering, and spam protection.
-Manage mobile device access and security policies for Google Workspace applications.
-Monitor user activity and enforce compliance with Google Workspace policies.

User Management and Support:
-Create, manage, and deactivate user accounts on our different platforms according to organizational policies.
-Manage user permissions and access controls across all platforms.
-Provide technical support to end-users regarding company applications, troubleshooting basic issues, and best practices.
-Manage the standard operating environment for end-users and help ensure team members are productive by choosing the right hardware and software for them.

Security and Compliance:
-Implement and maintain security best practices to protect user data and prevent unauthorized access across all platforms.
-Stay up-to-date on security features and updates.
-Configure audit logging and monitor user activity for potential security risks.
-Manage third-party app integrations with Google Workspace and assess potential security implications.
-Ensure compliance with relevant data privacy regulations.

Networking and Connectivity:
-Design, implement, and manage VPNs to ensure secure and reliable remote access for all staff.
-Monitor and maintain network infrastructure, including firewalls, routers, and switches, to ensure optimal performance.
-Troubleshoot network issues and provide solutions to ensure minimal downtime.
-Set up and manage secure network access controls for all devices and users.
-Implement networking best practices to support seamless connectivity and communication across the company.

Standard Operating Environment (SOE) Management:
-Develop and maintain a standard operating environment (SOE) for all staff, including configurations for operating systems, applications, and security settings.
-Ensure consistent deployment of software updates, patches, and security configurations across all devices.
-Manage hardware and software provisioning to ensure all staff have the necessary tools to perform their roles effectively.
-Implement automated processes for SOE management, including software installation, configuration, and updates.

Server Support, Monitoring and Optimization:
-Administer server environment hosting multiple PHP based applications on LAMP stack. Manage maintenance sessions and mentor junior engineers implementing upgrades and maintenance actions. 
-Monitor system performance and identify potential issues that could impact user experience. Lead response to outages and performance issues.
-Develop and test backup and disaster recovery protocols for this environment. 
-Analyze usage data to identify opportunities for optimizing storage quotas and user licenses.
-Implement automation tools and scripts to streamline administrative tasks within all platforms across the company.
-Create documentation and SOP documents on work performed and systems created. 

Technology Platforms to Manage:
-WHCMS (PHP-based billing system)
-Google Cloud Platform (basic API projects)
-Cloudways (semi-managed hosting platform)
-Cloudflare
-Google Analytics
-Google Tag Manager
-Google Ads (Conversions)
-WordPress (and related plugins)
-Zapier
-Asana
-Dialpad
-Hiver
-Copper CRM
-Password management

Qualifications:
-Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (preferred).
-Minimum of 5-7 years of experience in systems administration or a related senior IT support role.
-Strong understanding of networking concepts (TCP/IP, DNS, DHCP) and linux systems administration.
-Experience in setting up and managing VPNs and other secure networking solutions.
-Working knowledge of other operating systems aside from Google Workspace (e.g., Windows, Linux, macOS).
-Experience with security protocols, tools, and best practices (e.g., firewalls, antivirus, encryption) and relevant certifications (e.g., CompTIA Security+, CISSP) are preferred.
-Ideal: Experience working with Asana, WHMCS and GAM (Google Workspace scripted management).
-Ideal: Knowledge in WordPress, Divi Builder, G4 Analytics, and Tag Manager.
-Experience with scripting and automation tools (e.g., Python, Bash, PowerShell) to streamline administrative tasks.
-Experience with server administration and virtualization technologies.
-Experience in managing a Standard Operating Environment (SOE) across multiple platforms, including automated software deployment and updates.
-Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
-Strong communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate with end-users and other IT professionals.
-Ability to work independently and manage multiple priorities.


Some of our perks:
- Paid Leaves after Regularization
- Paid Holidays
- Company Conferences (All Expenses Paid)
- Team and Individual Incentives


Benefits:
- Company events
- Opportunities for promotion
- Paid training
- Promotion to permanent employee
- Work from home


Schedule:
- 8 hour shift
- Holidays
- Monday to Friday
- Weekends Off



Applicants MUST be based in the Philippines.

title: Senior Guest & Vendor Relations Manager
description:
ABOUT THE COMPANY

At FIBI Vacation Rentals, we are dedicated to maximizing both revenue and guest satisfaction. Our team values trust, integrity, courage, innovation, creativity, and a commitment to educational leadership. We specialize in identifying strategies that elevate revenue while delivering exceptional guest experiences.

Business & Growth Goals
Scale to become a business worth 100 million USD valuation

Mission
To set the professional standard for short term rental management.

Our Niche
- Identifying Ways To Improve Revenue Performance
- Providing Exceptional Guest Experiences

Core Values
- Trust & Integrity: Act with honesty, accountability, and reliability.
- Courage & Creativity: Bring innovative ideas and take calculated risks.
- Education-Driven Leadership: Share knowledge and guide the team toward continuous improvement.

Benefits of Working With Us
- Direct interaction with Company Founders, ability to have your voice heard, and opportunity to impact decision making and company direction
- Employee Stock Plan Available
- Employee Growth Plan
- Unlimited Paid Time Off
- Kid & Family Friendly Environment


JOB SUMMARY
As the Short-Term Rental Operations Manager, you will play a pivotal role in driving operational excellence, managing a high-performing team, and enhancing guest satisfaction across our properties. You will oversee daily operations, act as a point of escalation for guests and vendors, and contribute to both strategy and execution to ensure FIBI Vacation Rentals meets its mission and values.



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

General Operations
- Team Leadership: Manage our various front-line operations departments, including Guest Communication, Cleaning Coordination, Repairs & Maintenance team members. Ensure team members are appropriately trained, following standard procedures and policies effectively, and meeting productivity goals.
- Performance Management: Review team member compliance to policy and training. Ensure team members are completing all assigned tasks appropriately and timely, as well as following up as needed and identifying next steps and additional support when team members require escalated decisions.
- Employee Development: Conduct monthly performance reviews for each team member through one-on-one meetings and coaching, providing additional support or training when needed, as well as ensuring productivity and performance standards are developed and met, as well as working with Workforce Management when write-ups/discipline/termination is necessary.
- Daily Huddles: Lead daily team huddles and provide support to frontline staff by answering questions and clarifying tasks.
- Guest Relations & Conflict Resolution : Handle escalated guest issues, resolve conflicts, determine if/when refunds or compensation is provided and appropriate, and speak with supervisors to address guest situations if/when necessary.
- Vendor Management: Identify and report the need for new vendors and serve as a point of escalation for vendor-related issues, such as payment, scheduling, or performance expectations.
- Property & Software Knowledge: Stay familiar with the properties managed and the software used to streamline operations.
Strategic Planning: Participate in high-level meetings, contributing to process improvements and implementing strategic changes.

Accountability
- Communication Oversight: Ensure emails are answered and forwarded appropriately, phone lines are managed, and messages are responded to promptly.
- Task Management: Review tasks in BreezeWay and ClickUp, ensuring employees are accountable and tasks are completed on time.
- Schedule Management: Oversee shift schedules, confirm attendance, and manage follow-up on tasks and responsibilities.
- Supply & Inspection Oversight: Oversee ordering of supplies, ensuring competitive pricing and timely delivery to correct locations. Conduct spot checks on cleaner coordinators and evaluate their inspections.

Approvals
- Guest Requests: Approve special requests, refunds, and disputes based on set guidelines.
- Property Costs: Review and approve property-related costs in collaboration with the client success team.
- Vendor Approvals: Approve new vendor contracts and in-the-moment orders (e.g. additional guest amenities).
Cancellations & Accommodations: Manage cancellations and accommodations as per company guidelines.

Delegation
- Task Delegation: Assign tasks, set clear expectations, and monitor progress in BreezeWay and other systems.
- Issue Management: Review BreezeWay issues, delegate to appropriate departments, and follow up on task completion.
- Review Management: Analyze review scores, identify action items, and manage supply orders and essential R&M (Repairs and Maintenance) requests.
- Cleaner Coordinator Evaluation: Ensure tasks are being correctly identified and addressed by the cleaner coordinator.



QUALIFICATIONS & KEY TRAITS

- Problem Solving & Conflict Resolution: Ability to resolve complex issues independently and confidently.
- Adaptability: Flexible and capable of managing changing priorities in a fast-paced environment.
- Innovation & Critical Thinking: Thinks outside the box, researches solutions, and takes calculated risks.
- Communication Skills: Strong verbal and written English proficiency with attention to detail in documentation and reporting.
- American Home Knowledge: Strong understanding of American home systems, equipment, and construction standards.
- Familiarity with Airbnb Policies: Deep understanding of Airbnb's terms of service and short-term rental regulations to inform decision making across all departments.



APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS

Please follow these application instructions carefully. Applications missing any of these components or not following these instructions will not be considered.

Video Application
1. Submit a 1-MINUTE MAX video introduction.
2. Must speak in very clear English with minimal accent.
3. Start the video by saying the word “PICKLES”.

Questions to Answer in Your Video
1. What is your relevant experience? Describe how it aligns with the responsibilities of this role.
2. What’s the riskiest decision you’ve made on behalf of an employer? Explain the context, your decision-making process, and the outcome.

Resume
Along with your Video submission, please include your resume which much detail relevant prior work experience and various software knowledge related to the Short Term Rental industry.

title: Magento Developer (Magento 2, known as Adobe Commerce) Full Time
description:
Please read this fully. The bottom of the listing tells you who to email to apply. Thanks!

We are looking to recruit 2 x Full Stack Web Developers to re-build our Magento 2 store including one senior tech lead and further to this to help build several API connections, mobile Apps and further micro-sites for niche product ranges.

We work with Adobe Commerce (Magento 2).

What will your day look like?

As a senior lead you will have responsibility for our tech stack, therefore when something isn’t working.

At the beginning, you will manage one or two mid-level developers who you should work closely with, upskilling and assigning tasks to them as well as completing your own more complex development tasks.

You should also be very hands-on and you should be full of ideas on ways to improve our website and ultimately our revenue/conversion rates.

The types of tasks which are we looking to complete are:

- Support the current website, ensuring that the site is fully updated for security reasons, fixing any bugs and developing new features
- Re-build the front-end of our Magento website in the Hyva Theme (www.hyva.io/)
- Develop a Mobile App, connected to our magento store for IoS and Android or potentially we are open to a PWA store setup build in a PWA theme, if you advise this is the correct approach.
- Build Api connections to our accounting solutions and any other relevant internally used systems who have open API availability
- Create new modules/features subject to business practices to increase our conversion rates
- Help build several microsites and landing pages to assist in the businesses sales efforts, growing company revenue.

Our Team

Our team currently consists of 14 staff members. Nine of whom are UK based and five are currently home workers in the Philippines employed directly by our company.

The current team totally consists of admin staff, graphics, copywriters, email marketing, warehouse staff and our sales team.

However, within the next 3-5 months, this Philippines team will grow by another 11 people handling various positions, from Management, SEO, Content, Marketing and VA's.

Ultimately MY end goal is that you feel part of our team and part of our companies culture, you might be working from the other side of the world, but we also want you to feel like you work for us.

What Experience Do I Need?

- Front End Development
- Back end Development
- GIT
- Java, including JQuery, vue.js 
- NextJS
- You should have at least 5 years experience in Magento 2 Development (Adobe
Commerce)
- PHP 
- My SQL
- PWA (would like, but understand its new tech)

Benefits of working for us?

- Home Based Role
- 13th Month Bonus paid annually
- Permanent work - you can rely on us for your salary, we retain top quality talent!
- Paid vacation days
- Paid sick days

How to apply?

Please send a email to chris@simplelighting.co.uk

Include:

- your resume
-  provide examples of 3 magento sites you have built, including a explanation of what you done and what work you take credit for.
- provide your Skype ID for easy communications 

Thanks for your time reading this post.
Regards
Chris

title: Austin Dream Remodelling
description:
**Job Description: Dispatch and Virtual Assistant - Austin Dream Remodeling**

**Location:** Austin, Texas (Remote/Hybrid options available)

**Company Overview:**
Austin Dream Remodeling is a trusted home improvement company based in Austin, Texas. We specialize in transforming homes through quality remodeling services, delivering superior craftsmanship and excellent customer service. As we continue to grow, we are looking for a reliable, organized, and tech-savvy Dispatch and Virtual Assistant to support our operations and ensure seamless communication between our team and customers.

**Position Overview:**
The Dispatch and Virtual Assistant will play a critical role in supporting daily operations, managing schedules, and ensuring timely communication between our contractors, clients, and internal team. This hybrid position involves administrative support, customer service, and dispatching tasks to help our team provide excellent remodeling services to our clients.

**Key Responsibilities:**
- **Dispatching:** Coordinate and schedule appointments, job site visits, and contractor assignments. Ensure all tasks are properly allocated to the appropriate crew members and track their progress.
- **Customer Support:** Answer calls, emails, and messages from clients regarding service inquiries, scheduling, and progress updates. Provide exceptional customer service throughout the remodeling process.
- **Administrative Tasks:** Maintain and update records, schedules, and project statuses. Assist in managing and tracking client contracts, invoices, and payments.
- **Data Entry & File Management:** Input project details, customer information, and service requests into company systems and ensure all documentation is accurate and up-to-date.
- **Communication:** Act as a liaison between customers, contractors, and the office team, ensuring everyone is on the same page with project timelines and expectations.
- **Virtual Assistance:** Perform general virtual assistant duties including email management, appointment setting, and task prioritization. Handle other administrative duties as required.

**Skills and Qualifications:**
- Proven experience in customer service, dispatching, or virtual assistant roles, preferably in the home improvement or construction industry.
- Strong organizational skills with the ability to manage multiple tasks and prioritize effectively.
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
- Tech-savvy, with experience using dispatching software, CRM systems, and project management tools.
- Knowledge of home improvement services and terminology is a plus.
- Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.
- Strong attention to detail and problem-solving skills.

**Work Environment:**
- This position can be remote or hybrid, with occasional in-office visits required.
- Full-time or part-time availability.

**Compensation:**
- Competitive salary, commensurate with experience.
- Benefits package available for full-time employees.

**To Apply:**
Please send your resume, cover letter, and any relevant references or portfolio to [email address] with the subject line "Dispatch and Virtual Assistant Application - Austin Dream Remodeling."

---

This job description provides a comprehensive outline for a Dispatch and Virtual Assistant role at Austin Dream Remodeling, focusing on both customer service and administrative support within the home improvement industry. Adjust the specifics based on your company's unique needs and preferences!
