title: Full Stack Developer with AI/ML and Blockchain Expertise
description:
About Us:
We’re a dynamic team specializing in delivering innovative solutions across diverse client projects. From blockchain innovations to AI-driven applications, we help our clients bring their ideas to life. This specific role is for a client project focused on developing a unique AI-driven character for a crypto meme project, designed to enhance community engagement and user retention.

About the Role:
We’re looking for a Full Stack Developer with expertise in AI/ML and blockchain technologies to bring a fictional character to life through an advanced AI model. This character will interact naturally across platforms like Telegram and Twitter, embodying a distinct personality while remembering past experiences and relationships.

The role is central to creating a system that not only entertains but also boosts community participation in a highly engaging crypto-focused environment.

Key Responsibilities:
- AI Model Development & Fine-Tuning:
  - Fine-tune AI models to adopt a specific fictional character’s personality and behavior.
  - Enable memory retention for past events, relationships, and decision-making processes using provided text-based data.
  - Build functionality for the model to make context-aware decisions and interactions.

- Admin Interface Development:
  - Build an admin panel to:
    - Monitor the model’s inputs and outputs, including logs of processed data and actions.
    - Update the character’s core identity data (e.g., new events, relationships, etc).
    - Manually add events for the model to reference.
    - Approve or deny AI-generated tweets before posting.

Future Project Phases (For Awareness Only):
- Integration with an on-chain wallet via an SDK (to be determined).
- Image generation for Telegram posts and tweets using an SDK (to be determined).
- Mini-app integration within Telegram for enhanced context.
- RSS and events feed integration to enrich the character’s conversational depth.

Requirements:
- Strong experience in:
  - Full stack development with a focus on AI/ML.
  - Fine-tuning language models for personality simulation, memory, and decision-making.
  - API integration with platforms like Telegram and Twitter.
- Proficiency in programming languages like Python, JavaScript (Node.js), and frameworks such as React.
- Familiarity with tools like LangChain or similar platforms for building context-aware AI applications.
- Proven ability to design and build admin interfaces for monitoring and interaction.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Prior experience working on AI-driven bots or character-based systems.
- Understanding of blockchain concepts and crypto-based community projects.
- A creative approach to integrating AI models with social platforms.

What We Offer:
- The chance to work on a high-visibility project for a growing crypto meme community.
- Flexible, remote-friendly working conditions.
- Opportunities to collaborate on innovative AI and blockchain projects.

title: Digital Marketing Business Intelligence Analyst
description:
Job Title: Digital Marketing Business Intelligence Analyst
Job Type: Full-Time
Location: Philippines, Remote, M-F, US Time
Restriction: This opportunity is for candidates residing in the Philippines
Compensation: $1,846.67 to $2,300.26 Monthly + Benefits


THE DIGITAL MARKETING RECRUITERS
Digital Marketing Recruiters has been in the digital marketing and recruitment space for over 25 years. We work with highly skilled marketing, digital marketing, and sales professionals and match them with our clients from diverse industries across the United States. Our selection process incorporates comprehensive resume screening, shortlisting, conducting video-recorded interviews and providing client information, administering written assessments (if required by the client), arranging client interviews, and facilitating job offers and placements.


THE CLIENT
The client’s Mission, Vision, and Values.


MISSION
Accelerate growth for innovative businesses through revenue-first marketing strategies.
*Accelerate Growth - Pushing businesses, individuals, and entrepreneurs that want to grow faster.
*Innovative Businesses - Businesses, individuals, and entrepreneurs that want to lead in their industry.
*Revenue-First Marketing Strategies - Measure success based on the client’s ability to drive revenue and increase profitability.


VISION
*Legacy and Impact - 1,000 Revenue Barriers Surpassed
*Culture and Team - 1,000 PPF Goals Achieved
*Financial Outcome - $35MM in Revenue at 20?ITDA


VALUES
*Belief
-Proactive - Create change rather than reacting to it. Anticipate future opportunities and act to address them in advance.
-Disciplined - Stay committed to the tasks and goals, not straying despite difficulties or temptations.

*Operational Effectiveness
-Candid - Communicate directly and transparently without being overly concerned with diplomacy or avoiding offense.
-Empathetic - Strive to understand and share the feelings of others, with their perspectives as the lens for interaction.

*Leadership
-Accountable - Hold responsible for the outcomes of decisions and accept the consequences of actions.
-Results-Oriented - Start with the end in mind. Prioritize efforts that lead to measurable outcomes, emphasizing productivity rather than busyness.


THE ROLE
The Digital Marketing Business Intelligence Analyst is responsible for transforming complex data into actionable insights to guide the agency’s clients' marketing strategies and improve overall campaign performance. In this role, you will work closely with various teams to analyze data from multiple sources, including Google Analytics, Google Ads, social media platforms, and CRM systems. You will develop intuitive dashboards, automate reporting processes, and create compelling visualizations that highlight key performance indicators (KPIs), helping stakeholders make data-driven decisions.


THE IDEAL CANDIDATE
The client is seeking a highly analytical and detail-oriented Associate Business Intelligence Analyst to join their dynamic digital marketing agency. This role is ideal for someone passionate about using data to drive decision-making in the fast-paced digital marketing world, offering the opportunity to collaborate on high-impact marketing initiatives for a wide range of clients.


PERFORMANCE OBJECTIVES
*Develop and maintain interactive dashboards, ensuring stakeholders have real-time insights.
*Collect, analyze, and interpret data from digital marketing platforms (e.g., Google Analytics, Google Ads, and Facebook Insights) to track campaign performance.
*Automate reporting processes to streamline data collection and distribution across multiple departments.
*Collaborate with marketing and client services teams to define KPIs and provide insights that optimize campaign strategies.
*Ensure data quality and integrity by validating and cleaning data before analysis.
*Conduct ad-hoc analysis to uncover trends, opportunities, and insights that drive marketing effectiveness.


CAPABILITIES AND KEY COMPETENCIES
*Knack for “figuring it out” when taking on new tasks or processes.
*Strong desire to grow and learn more, highly coachable.
*Technically savvy, able to understand how systems work and interact quickly.
*Proficiency in SQL, Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, Excel/Sheets, and BI tools.
*Strong understanding of digital marketing metrics and performance tracking.
*Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to communicate complex data insights.
*Reporting against defined performance KPI standards.
*Setting up conversion tracking for digital analytics and ad pixels.
*Experience with Paid Search platforms (Google Ads and Microsoft Ads).
*Experience with Paid Social platforms (Meta Ads, LinkedIn Ads, and TikTok Ads).
*Experience with Python or R is a plus.


EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE
*4-year college degree or equivalent experiential knowledge.
*Prior experience working in a professional services organization.
*2-3 years professional experience in digital marketing.


PHYSICAL REQUIREMENTS
*Prolonged periods sitting at a desk and working.


BENEFITS
*10 Paid Vacation Days, 5 Paid Sick Days
*10 Paid Company Holidays
*Maternity, Paternity, and Bereavement Leave
*Performance Bonus Plan

title: Web Development and Tracking Specialist
description:
Job Title: Web Development and Tracking Specialist

Job Type: Full-Time

Location: Philippines, Remote, M-F, Pacific Time

Restriction: This opportunity is for candidates residing in the Philippines

Compensation: $1,370 to $1,730 Monthly



THE DIGITAL MARKETING RECRUITERS
Digital Marketing Recruiters has been in the digital marketing and recruitment space for over 25 years. We work with highly skilled marketing, digital marketing, and sales professionals and match them with our clients from diverse industries across the United States. Our selection process incorporates comprehensive resume screening, shortlisting, conducting video-recorded interviews and providing client information, administering written assessments (if required by the client), arranging client interviews, and facilitating job offers and placements.


THE CLIENT
Intero Digital is a dynamic and results-driven digital marketing agency dedicated to helping businesses thrive in the online landscape. We specialize in crafting data-informed strategies that drive growth and deliver exceptional results for our clients.


THE ROLE
We are seeking a skilled Web Development and Tracking Specialist to join our team. This role is vital for implementing, maintaining, and troubleshooting digital tracking solutions across various platforms to ensure accurate data collection for our paid media efforts. If you have a strong foundation in web development, experience with multiple content management systems (CMS), and a passion for seamless tracking integration, we want to hear from you.


KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
*Tracking Implementation: Develop and manage tracking systems for paid media campaigns, ensuring accurate data collection and analysis across all channels.
*CMS Management: Work with a variety of content management systems, including WordPress, BigCommerce, WooCommerce, and Magento, to integrate tracking codes and maintain site integrity.
*Google Tag Manager (GTM): Create, implement, and manage tags in GTM, setting up events and triggers to monitor user interactions and conversions.
*Web Development: Utilize HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and other coding languages to customize website functionalities, optimize page performance, and troubleshoot any issues that impact tracking or user experience.
*Collaboration: Work closely with the paid media team, analysts, and account managers to align tracking solutions with client goals and campaign strategies.
*Performance Monitoring and Troubleshooting: Monitor and troubleshoot tracking issues, ensuring all data collected is accurate and actionable for campaign optimization.


QUALIFICATIONS
*Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Web Development, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
*Proven experience as a Web Developer or working with tracking.
*Proficiency in front-end technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, frameworks like React, Angular, or Vue.js).
*Experience with back-end technologies (Node.js, PHP, Ruby, etc.) and databases (MySQL, MongoDB, etc.).
*Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
*Strong communication and teamwork abilities.


PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS
*Experience with content management systems (CMS) such as WordPress or Drupal.
*Knowledge of paid media best practices.
*Understanding of web security practices.

*Results-Oriented - Start with the end in mind. Prioritize efforts that lead to measurable outcomes, emphasizing productivity rather than busyness.


THE ROLE
The client is seeking a skilled and detail-oriented Back-End Web Developer with specialized experience in WordPress to join their digital marketing agency. As a back-end developer, you will play a key role in building and maintaining the functional core of the websites. You will be responsible for developing custom plugins, enhancing the WordPress infrastructure, managing databases, and ensuring website performance and security.


THE IDEAL CANDIDATE
The ideal candidate will have deep knowledge of WordPress architecture, be experienced in PHP, SQL, and APIs, and have a strong understanding of database management and server environments. If you're passionate about writing clean, maintainable code and enjoy problem-solving, then this is for you!


PERFORMANCE OBJECTIVES
*Maintain and optimize databases (primarily MySQL) to ensure site performance and scalability.
*Collaborate with front-end developers to ensure seamless integration of user-facing elements with server-side logic.
*Enhance website performance, ensuring speed, security, and efficiency across multiple WordPress websites.
*Create and maintain API integrations for third-party services and custom applications.
*Manage server environments, including website deployment, backups, and hosting configurations.
*Monitor and troubleshoot site issues, including bugs, performance problems, and security vulnerabilities.
*Write efficient, well-documented PHP code following best practices.
*Optimize and troubleshoot WordPress queries for improved performance.
*Develop custom WordPress plugins and themes tailored to client requirements.
*Ensure that all web applications adhere to modern security and data protection standards.
*Stay up to date with emerging technologies, WordPress updates, and industry trends.


CAPABILITIES AND KEY COMPETENCIES
*3-5 years of experience as a Back-End Developer, with a strong focus on WordPress.
*Proficiency in PHP, specifically as it relates to WordPress development.
*Solid experience with MySQL and database management.
*Experience in custom plugin development and API integrations.
*Understanding of server-side technologies, including Linux, Apache, and NGINX.
*Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git) and continuous integration/deployment practices.
*Familiarity with RESTful APIs and third-party integrations.
*Strong knowledge of website performance optimization and troubleshooting.
*Ability to manage WordPress security, including vulnerability scanning and patching.
*Experience in server management and deployment processes.
*Preferred experience:
-Familiarity with Google Analytics, Tag Manager, and SEO tools.
-Familiarity with cloud hosting environments like AWS, Google Cloud, or DigitalOcean.
-Basic front-end development skills (HTML, CSS, and JavaScript) to support full-stack workflows.
-Experience with WordPress installations and staging workflows.
-Agency experience with client interaction.
-E-commerce (Shopify, Magento, and BigCommerce).
-Python.


EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE
*3+ years of web design and development experience (examples of work).
*Agency experience with client interaction.
*WordPress development.
*Google Tag Manager experience.
*E-commerce (Shopify, Magento, and BigCommerce).
*Python
*APIs
*Technical SEO


PHYSICAL REQUIREMENTS
*Prolonged periods sitting at a desk and working.


BENEFITS
*10 Paid Vacation Days, 5 Paid Sick Days
*10 Paid Company Holidays
*Maternity, Paternity, and Bereavement Leave
*Performance Bonus Plan

title: Full Stack Web Developer & More
description:
**This is a WFH Role BUT we ONLY hire Manila-based Contractors** 

AIMS Industrial Supplies is a dynamic and fast-growing e-commerce store specializing industrial and engineering supplies in Australia. We are looking for a Web Developer with solid e-commerce experience to help us provide a smooth shopping experience for our customers. 

We need someone who can modify an existing Neto store and manage the transition to a Shopfiy store.  Additionally, you will need to be able to build a non-ecommerce site from scratch. 

Key responsibilities: 
Execute front-end and theme-based enhancements to our current webstore hosted in Neto (Maropost) 
Implement and supervise the technical and UI aspects of our migration to Shopify 
Configure integrations to make Shopify work with our enterprise resource planning (ERP) system 
Set up product feeds from Shopify to Google Merchant Center Next 
Test, troubleshoot and optimize core functions and features at all online channels 

Qualifications: 
Can implement front-end and back-end development requirements specific to shopping cart software 
Can make our ERP and Shopify “work together” 
Can set up “sandbox” instances to beta-test new functions and features 
Can configure and manage API integrations and GA4 / GTM custom tags 
Has solid working knowledge of Shopify Liquid 

Nice to have: 
Experience in implementing Google tags to track various custom events in an e-commerce setting 
Sound understanding of CRO, technical SEO and UI principles 

As this is a still a relatively small business, you’ll also become the default IT expert in the business, so will be a resource for other projects, which could include things such as building apps, configuring Microsoft products, developers web scraping scripts, developing PunchOut Catalogs from our ERP to customer ERPs, etc. 

Being a small business, this role will give you the opportunity to have a great impact on how things are done and will often be able to implement changes immediately. 

For the right person, this will be an enjoyable role with multiple aspects and great influence, where you’ll use a variety of skills. 

If you feel this could be a good fit for the next stage in your career, please apply, highlighting your experience, specific technical experience/training and desired monthly salary.

title: OMG!! NEEDED NOW!! DevOps Engineer – Infrastructure & Scalability for Headless CMS – Fast Growing Marketing CANADIAN Com
description:
Hey there!
I'm looking for a HIGHLY TEACHABLE (Willing to Learn) junior to mid-level DevOps Engineer with excellent written English to help manage and scale infrastructure for our headless CMS projects and API-driven solutions.
In the beginning, this is an on-call/part-time job, but it can grow into a full-time role where you'll handle more significant clients if you prove to be a great fit.
Watch this video to learn more about how our agency works and to also see my personality and style:

title: Real Estate Photo Editor – Join Our Team!
description:
About Us:
At Panhandle Productions, we’re all about quality, speed, and friendly service. We specialize in real estate media, providing top-notch photography, videography, and more to help properties stand out. We’re looking for skilled Real Estate Photo Editors to join our team and contribute to our mission of delivering exceptional media with a quick turnaround.

What You’ll Do:
 • Daily Photo Editing: Edit, touch-up, and enhance real estate photos with high attention to detail
 • Virtual Staging: Add virtual furniture and decor to showcase the property’s potential.
 • Quality Assurance: Ensure all images meet our high standards before final delivery.
 • Deadline Management: Meet next-day turnaround times for all projects.
 • Team Collaboration: Work closely with other editors and team members to maintain consistency and quality.
 • Stay Updated: Keep up with new tools, techniques, and best practices to stay ahead in the industry.

Duties and Responsibilities:
 • Edit all assigned photos according to company standards and within deadlines.
 • Use appropriate tools to manipulate photos for optimal quality.
 • Organize, plan, and manage your editing workload efficiently.
 • Collaborate with team members to ensure cohesive output.
 • Stay informed on the latest photo editing technology and best practices.

Requirements and Qualifications:
 • Experience: 2+ years as an Photo Editor, with proficiency in real estate media.
 • Technical Skills: Advanced knowledge of Adobe Photoshop and Lightroom.
 • Organizational Skills: Excellent time management to handle multiple projects effectively.
 • Communication: Strong verbal and written communication skills.
 • Creativity and Detail-Oriented: A sharp eye for detail and a creative mindset.
 • Independence: Ability to work independently while meeting deadlines.
 • Flexibility: Willingness to work varied shifts, including day, midday, and night (CST).
 • Fast Internet: Capability to share and upload large files daily
 • Computer Setup: Must have your own up-to-date computer or laptop.

Essential Real Estate Editing Skills:
 • 5-Bracket HDR blending and Flambient blending
 • White balance, color correction, and color cast removal.
 • Lens correction and straightening (vertical and horizontal).
 • Cropping and resizing.
 • TV screen and fire graphic replacement.

Photo Enhancements:
 • Sky enhancement and replacement (both exterior and interior).
 • Window retouching/masking.
 • Lawn enhancement and replacement.

Advanced Techniques:
 • Manual blending and flambient blending.
 • Advanced object removal.
 • A range of techniques for handling revision requests and complex edits.

Why Join Panhandle Productions?
 • Competitive Pay: We offer compensation based on your experience and skills.
 • Remote Work: Enjoy the flexibility of working from home.
 • Supportive Team: Be part of a team that values collaboration, creativity, and growth.
 • Career Development: Opportunities to learn and grow within a fast-paced and innovative environment.

Ready to Apply?
To be considered for this position you MUST follow the following steps:

1. Please send your portfolio that contains the following:
        • Interior / Exterior Images (Full Photo Sets)
        • Drone Images
        • Virtual Twilights (Day To Dusk)
        • Object Removal Examples

2. First Line/Subject Line: 
Include "I'm Ready To Edit" on your Email Header or first line.

3. Experience Details:
State how many HDR real estate images you can edit within an 8 hour shift.


If you have a passion for real estate photo editing and are ready to take your skills to the next level, we’d love to hear from you!

title: Property Manager
description:
Cohab UK is looking for a highly organized and self-motivated Property Manager to lead the property management team. The candidate will ensure the efficient and effective operation of our property management activities and partner buildings. You will provide tenant inquiries, assist with supplier coordination, and handle reporting for the company. The candidate must be comfortable with data and customer service situations.

Key Responsibilities:
• Serve as the main point of contact for tenant inquiries, addressing their questions, concerns, and requests in a timely and professional manner.
• Coordinate property maintenance and repairs by communicating with vendors, scheduling appointments, and following up to ensure timely resolution.
• Assist with lease administration, including drafting lease agreements, collecting rent payments, and managing lease renewals.
• Conduct thorough tenant screenings, including background checks and verification of references, to ensure high-quality tenants.
• Maintain accurate and up-to-date tenant records, including lease agreements, rent payments, and maintenance requests, using property management software or other relevant tools.
• Monitor and enforce lease terms and property rules, addressing any violations or breaches in a timely manner.
• Assist remotely with move-in and move-out processes, conducting property inspections, documenting condition reports, and managing security deposit refunds.
• Prepare and distribute regular property management reports, including financial statements, occupancy reports, and maintenance summaries.
• Support marketing efforts by creating property listings, managing online rental platforms, and conducting property showings (virtual or in-person) as needed.
• Collaborate with the property management team to ensure a seamless and exceptional tenant experience.

Qualifications:
• Previous experience in property management, real estate, or a related field is preferred.
• Strong organizational skills with the ability to multitask and prioritize effectively
• Customer service oriented or hospitality experience
• Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
• Knowledge of relevant laws and regulations related to property management
• Detail-oriented with a focus on data and quality control
• Adaptable to using property management software, Microsoft Office, Google Workspace, and other relevant tools.

Job Type: Full-time

Benefits:
• Health insurance
• Pag-IBIG

Schedule:
• Evening shift UK Time (4pm-12am PH time)
• Monday to Friday
• Hybrid schedule (mostly remote)

Experience:
• At least 1-2 years in real estate or hospitality management (including short term rental markets)

title: Front-End Website Developer
description:
Job Title: Front-End Website Developer

Job Type: Full-Time

Location: Philippines, Remote, M-F, US Time

Restriction: This opportunity is for candidates residing in the Philippines

Compensation: $2,500 to $3,000 Monthly + Benefits


THE DIGITAL MARKETING RECRUITERS
Digital Marketing Recruiters has been in the digital marketing and recruitment space for over 25 years. We work with highly skilled marketing, digital marketing, and sales professionals and match them with our clients from diverse industries across the United States. Our selection process incorporates comprehensive resume screening, shortlisting, conducting video-recorded interviews and providing client information, administering written assessments (if required by the client), arranging client interviews, and facilitating job offers and placements.


THE CLIENT
The client’s Mission, Vision, and Values.


MISSION
Accelerate growth for innovative businesses through revenue-first marketing strategies.

*Accelerate Growth - Pushing businesses, individuals, and entrepreneurs that want to grow faster.
*Innovative Businesses - Businesses, individuals, and entrepreneurs that want to lead in their industry.
*Revenue-First Marketing Strategies - Measure success based on the client’s ability to drive revenue and increase profitability.


VISION
*Legacy and Impact - 1,000 Revenue Barriers Surpassed
*Culture and Team - 1,000 PPF Goals Achieved
*Financial Outcome - $35MM in Revenue at 20?ITDA


VALUES
*Belief
-Proactive - Create change rather than reacting to it. Anticipate future opportunities and act to address them in advance.
-Disciplined - Stay committed to the tasks and goals, not straying despite difficulties or temptations.

*Operational Effectiveness
-Candid - Communicate directly and transparently without being overly concerned with diplomacy or avoiding offense.
-Empathetic - Strive to understand and share the feelings of others, with their perspectives as the lens for interaction.

*Leadership
-Accountable - Hold responsible for the outcomes of decisions and accept the consequences of actions.
-Results-Oriented - Start with the end in mind. Prioritize efforts that lead to measurable outcomes, emphasizing productivity rather than busyness.


THE ROLE
The client is seeking a talented and motivated mid-level Front-End Website Developer with a strong focus on WordPress to join their growing digital marketing agency. The ideal candidate will have a passion for clean, efficient code and be experienced in building responsive, user-friendly websites. You will work closely with the design, back-end, and content teams to bring websites to life for a variety of clients across multiple industries.

As a key member of the development team, you'll be responsible for developing and maintaining WordPress websites, ensuring they are visually stunning, functionally robust, and optimized for performance. If you're a creative problem solver who thrives in a fast-paced, collaborative environment, we’d love to hear from you.


THE IDEAL CANDIDATE
The client is looking for a highly analytical and detail-oriented mid-level Front-End Website Developer to join their dynamic team. This role is ideal for someone passionate about building, optimizing, and troubleshooting websites.


PERFORMANCE OBJECTIVES
*Develop and maintain custom WordPress websites from scratch, utilizing themes, plugins, and custom code.
*Collaborate with designers and back-end developers to translate designs into pixel-perfect, responsive websites.
*Ensure cross-browser compatibility and optimize websites for speed, performance, and scalability.
*Implement and customize WordPress themes and plugins to meet client requirements.
*Write clean, maintainable HTML, CSS, and JavaScript code that aligns with best practices.
*Maintain and update existing WordPress websites, including troubleshooting and bug fixing.
*Stay current with emerging front-end technologies and trends, implementing improvements where relevant.
*Work closely with project managers to meet deadlines and deliver high-quality work within project scope.
*Optimize websites for SEO and accessibility standards.
*Perform quality assurance testing and make iterative improvements based on feedback.


CAPABILITIES AND KEY COMPETENCIES
*3-5 years of experience as a Front-End Developer, with a strong focus on WordPress.
*Proficiency in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and responsive design principles.
*Experience with PHP as it relates to WordPress development.
*Familiarity with WordPress theme development, customization, and plugin integration.
*Experience with front-end frameworks such as Bootstrap or Tailwind CSS.
*Knowledge of SEO best practices and website performance optimization.
*Experience with cross-browser testing and debugging tools.
*Basic understanding of version control systems like Git.
*Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced environment and handle multiple projects simultaneously.
*Strong attention to detail, problem-solving skills, and a passion for delivering top-notch user experiences.
*Preferred experience:
-Experience with JavaScript frameworks (e.g., React and Vue.js).
-Familiarity with WooCommerce and Shopify.
-Basic knowledge of back-end development and database management.
-Experience with Figma, Sketch, or Adobe XD for design handoff.
-Familiarity with Google Analytics, Tag Manager, and SEO tools.


EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE
*3+ years of web design and development experience (examples of work).
*Agency experience with client interaction.
*WordPress development.
*Google Tag Manager experience.
*E-commerce (Shopify, Magento, and BigCommerce).
*Python
*APIs
*Technical SEO


PHYSICAL REQUIREMENTS
*Prolonged periods sitting at a desk and working.


BENEFITS
*10 Paid Vacation Days, 5 Paid Sick Days
*10 Paid Company Holidays
*Maternity, Paternity, and Bereavement Leave
*Performance Bonus Plan

title: Experienced SEO Specialist
description:
ABOUT US: 
Affordable Web Solutions is a dynamic and growing digital marketing agency that specialises in providing cost-effective web solutions to small businesses. We are committed to helping our clients establish a strong online presence and drive meaningful results through comprehensive digital marketing strategies. 

REPORTS TO: Agency Owner
CONSULTS TO: Development Team, Agency Owner and Clients
HOURS: Day Shift

JOB OVERVIEW:
We seek an experienced (2-3 years) On-Page and Off-Page SEO Specialist to join our dynamic marketing team. In this role, you will be responsible for optimising our clients and our website to improve the content, enhance visibility, and improve ranking on search engines. You will closely and collaborate with the development team to ensure our site and our clients are optimised for search engine success. You enjoy teaching others including junior SEO analysts.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:
* Optimise website content, including meta tags, headers, and images, to improve search engine rankings.
* Conduct comprehensive keyword research to identify strategic opportunities for content optimization.
* Analyze website performance using analytics tools and provide actionable insights to improve SEO strategies.
* Create engaging, SEO-friendly content that aligns with business goals and ensure all site content aligns with SEO best practices.
* Stay updated with the latest SEO trends and algorithm changes to ensure compliance and effectiveness.
* Perform regular website audits to identify improvement areas and implement necessary changes.
* Create Monthly Reports - for client recommendations.
* Work with the development team to ensure SEO best practices are properly implemented on newly developed pages and blogs.
* Can prepare and facilitate teachback sessions, and mentoring Juniour SEO analysts.
* Acquiring high-quality backlinks from reputable websites to increase domain authority and improve search rankings.
* Collaborate with the Social Media Manager to promote content and engage with audiences on social media platforms to drive traffic and enhance brand visibility.
* Creating and distributing valuable content on external platforms to attract and engage target audiences via Mailchimp.
* Monitoring and encouraging brand mentions across the web to build authority and trust.
* Guest Blog writing and publishing articles on other websites to reach new audiences and earn backlinks.
* Engaging in relevant online forums and communities to build relationships and drive traffic.
* Optimising for local search results by managing online reviews and local business listings.
* In general improve a website's visibility and authority, contributing to better search engine rankings.

REQUIRED SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE:
* Strong analytical skills with experience using tools such as Google Analytics, Search Console and Google Tag Manager.
* Excellent communication skills to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams.
* Detail-oriented with a strong ability to identify errors and optimize site performance.
* Problem solving skills to troubleshoot and resolve SEO related issues.
* At least 2-3 years of experience in an SEO role, with a proven track record in on page optimisation.
* Stay up to date with the latest SEO trends and best practices. 
* Generate regular reports on SEO, have an ability to analyse data including insights and recommendations. 
* Understand off page SEO and Linkbuilding 
*  Experience with helping to implement a SEO strategy. 

TOOLS:
* Search Atlas 
* SEO Powersuite 
* Google Analytics  
* Google Search Console 
* Google Tag Manager 
* Looker Studio 
* My Web Audit 
* Teamwork 
* WhatsApp 

WORK ENVIRONMENT:
* Family oriented and collaborative work environment with opportunities for professional growth.
* An engaged and supportive team dedicated to achieving company goals.
* Access to the latest tools and resources to enhance your performance and skills.
* Growth Opportunities to advance to senior SEO roles and manage a team.


BENEFITS:
* Collaborative and supportive team environment the majority being in the Philippines. 
* Opportunity to make a meaningful impact on the online visibility of diverse businesses. 
* Continuous learning and professional development opportunities in the fast-paced digital marketing industry. 
* Competitive salary paid weekly. 

If you are passionate about SEO and know how to optimise web content to achieve top search rankings, we would love to hear from you. Join us and contribute to our success by enhancing our online presence and driving growth.

TO APPLY:
Please apply by sharing your CV and any portfolios. Links to any videos based on your experience will expedite you to the interview process.

title: Press Release & Editorial Writer

title: Senior WordPress Technical Support Engineers
description:
Overview

LevelUp is a specialist agency that provides WordPress technical support for vendors, agencies and website owners. We have been servicing a number of WordPress companies for over 5 years now, and have a rapidly growing team of skilled and passionate WordPress professionals. In line with the steady expansion of the company, we are in constant need to hire Senior Technical Support Engineers with great communication skills backed by solid technical knowledge. The ideal candidate has 3+ years of hands-on experience with WordPress and is passionate about providing top tier customer support.

Responsibilities

Help a variety of WordPress users across the world through ticket and live chat based help desk systems.
Guide customers on how to use specific products by answering their questions and providing correct information and clear instructions.
Diagnose problems that customers have on their sites and offer solutions.
Troubleshoot and investigate issues to identify the root cause of the problem.
Create detailed bug reports for developers so that they can quickly understand the issue and identify a fix. 
Share your knowledge and help other team members.
Keep up-to-date with important changes in the WordPress ecosystem with a focus on continuous learning and development.

Experience

-WordPress Experience
Over 3 years of hands-on experience with WordPress with in-depth knowledge of the WordPress ecosystem 
HTML and CSS
Proficient in creating well-structured HTML documents and implementing CSS from simple to more complex CSS techniques for styling. 
Can handle tasks like creating responsive layouts using media queries, styling elements, and implementing custom CSS solutions.

-JavaScript/jQuery
Possesses foundational knowledge of JavaScript and can understand basic scripts. 
Can implement simple jQuery scripts for basic interactivity on a website.
Is able to recognize JavaScript console errors and use them to help with troubleshooting issues.

-PHP
Familiar with basic PHP syntax and can understand how PHP code works within WordPress. 
Can make simple modifications to existing PHP code snippets.
Experience using custom hooks and filters to add or change functionality in WordPress.
Proficient in diagnosing and resolving WordPress issues using WP Debug, browser console errors, and other debugging tools.

-Experience with WordPress page builder plugins, theme builders, the block editor, common caching & performance optimisation plugins, and SEO plugins.
-Skilled in optimizing WordPress websites according to Google Core Web Vitals and PageSpeed Insights.
-Experienced in building and managing WooCommerce websites, including customizing WooCommerce templates.
-Capable of setting up WordPress local environments, staging sites, and site migration.
-Familiarity with WordPress security best practices, protocols, and permissions.
-Ability to create custom WordPress plugins and themes from scratch (nice to have)

Other Technical Experience

-Familiarity with common web hosting stacks, such as cPanel, NGINX, Apache, MySQL, etc.
-Proficient in cPanel or similar and FTP client tools like Filezilla for managing website files. 
-Proficient in using Cloudflare and possessing advanced DNS knowledge.
-Knowledge of CDNs and various types of caching.
-Proficient in command-line operations (SSH), including WP-CLI (nice to have).
-Previous exposure to live chat or help desk tools like Help Scout, Freshdesk, or Zendesk (nice to have).

Communication & Attitude

-Exceptional written and verbal English communication skills.
-Experience with technical/customer support or regularly interacting with clients on technical matters.
-A strong team player with a supportive and friendly attitude.
-Has a proactive and can-do approach to work. 
-Genuinely enjoys helping people solve their problems and cares about customer experience.
-Is passionate about continuous learning and self improvement.

Additional Information

-This is a fully remote position with a standard 40-hour fixed-schedule work week.
-The exact work schedule depends on the client that you are assigned to, but is often an afternoon or night schedule and so having flexibility when it comes to schedule is important.
-We have a company culture that focuses on the well-being of its team members, with a good work life balance and respectful work environment.

Need to hire two (2) Senior WordPress Technical Support Engineers

Apply on this link: https://bit.ly/leveroljsnrtse

title: Smartlead Email Marketing Expert

title: Operations Systems Specialist
description:
### **Job Description: Operations Systems Specialist**

**Position Overview:**
We are seeking a highly organized and tech-savvy **Operations Systems Specialist** to join our team. This role involves managing data entry, simplifying business systems, and optimizing the use of various digital tools, including Odoo, Box, Slack, and Manifestly. The ideal candidate should have a basic understanding of the construction industry and the ability to leverage tools like ChatGPT to streamline workflows and improve operational efficiency.

---

**Key Responsibilities:**
1. **Data Management:**
   - Perform accurate and timely data entry across various platforms, including Odoo and Box.
   - Maintain and update company records, ensuring data accuracy and consistency.
   - Generate reports and insights based on data to inform business decisions.

2. **System Optimization:**
   - Simplify and streamline existing business systems and processes to enhance operational efficiency.
   - Configure and customize Odoo modules to align with company needs.
   - Manage workflows and task assignments in Manifestly for operational consistency.

3. **Tool Utilization:**

title: Python Developer for Content Automation and AI Integration
description:
Position Title: Python Developer for Content Automation and AI Integration
Location: Remote (Philippines Preferred)
Employment Type: Freelance Contract

Position Overview
We are seeking a highly skilled Python Developer to automate the end-to-end content creation, formatting, and publishing workflows. The ideal candidate will integrate advanced tools like Canva API, AI-powered solutions for voiceovers, and video generation to optimize social media and marketing campaigns. This role requires expertise in extracting and processing large amounts of data, automating design workflows, and scaling content delivery.

Key Responsibilities
1. Content Extraction and Formatting
Automate the extraction of text data from a 300+ page dictionary-style PDF document.
Format the extracted data into Excel/CSV files with two columns: Term and Definition.
Handle complex formatting issues like multi-line definitions or inconsistencies.
2. Canva and Content Automation
Utilize Canva’s API to populate pre-designed templates dynamically with text and visuals.
Automate bulk content generation based on an editorial calendar, ensuring brand consistency.
Optimize templates to allow automated publishing of posts on social media platforms using predefined schedules.
3. Scheduling and Publishing Automation
Integrate with social media APIs (Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, YouTube) to schedule and publish posts automatically based on provided timelines.
Ensure that all content aligns with platform-specific requirements, captions, and formats.
4. Voiceover and Video Creation
Use tools like ElevenLabs, Descript, or Resemble AI to generate voiceovers from extracted text.
Automate video creation with tools like Pictory, Runway, or Canva Video API, combining voiceovers with AI-generated visuals.
Develop workflows to align visuals with specific text or audio narrations.
5. Illustration Generation via AI
Leverage AI tools such as Stable Diffusion, DALL-E, or MidJourney to batch-generate illustrations for terms and concepts.
Automate the integration of these visuals into videos, templates, or presentations.
6. Optimization and Scalability
Build efficient, scalable pipelines to handle high-frequency posting and content automation.
Integrate tools like Google Sheets API to manage dynamic data inputs for workflows.
Ensure workflows are future-proof, supporting additional platforms and campaigns.
Mandatory Skills & Tools
Programming & Automation
Python (proficient)
Libraries for PDF parsing: PyPDF2, pdfplumber, PyMuPDF.
Tools for data manipulation: pandas, openpyxl, regex for pattern extraction.
AI and Content Tools
Voice Cloning: ElevenLabs, Descript, or Resemble AI.
AI Illustration: Stable Diffusion, DALL-E, or MidJourney.
Video Creation: Canva API, Pictory, or Runway.
Text Automation: OpenAI GPT for caption/tag generation.
API Integration
Canva API for design automation.
Social media APIs (Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, YouTube).
Google Sheets API for data management.
Deliverables and Timelines
Phase 1 (Weeks 1–2):
Extract terms and definitions from PDF and export to Excel.
Create initial automation workflows for Canva template population.
Prototype voice cloning and AI-generated visuals.
Phase 2 (Weeks 3–4):
Automate video creation with voiceovers and AI visuals.
Integrate with social media APIs to automate post scheduling.
Deliver a batch of 10 sample videos for review.
Phase 3 (Ongoing):
Optimize and scale pipelines for efficiency.
Provide detailed documentation for scripts and workflows.
Compensation
Content Extraction and Formatting: $150 USD.
Voiceover and Video Automation: $250 USD.
Illustration and Integration: $200 USD.
Total Estimate: $600 USD 
How to Apply
Send your portfolio and a brief cover letter. Include examples of previous automation projects and specify your experience with tools and APIs listed above.

title: Salesforce Marketing Cloud Administrator
description:
Job Title: Salesforce (Marketing Cloud) Administrator

Job Summary: The Salesforce Marketing Cloud Administrator will support the company’s strategic marketing initiatives by managing and optimizing the Salesforce Marketing Cloud platform. This role focuses on data integrations, user management, segmentation, automation, and reporting within Marketing Cloud or Pardot. The Administrator will collaborate with marketing, sales, and IT teams to ensure that Marketing Cloud solutions align with business objectives and that integration with Salesforce CRM is seamless.

Key Responsibilities:
Data Management and Reporting:
Ensure data quality and integrity within Salesforce, Marketing Cloud, or Pardot.
Pull, analyze, and interpret data from Marketing Cloud or Pardot to generate insights for the marketing team.
Build and maintain reports and dashboards to track campaign performance, engagement, and CRM data.
Basic knowledge of data analysis tools and Excel functions (e.g., v-lookup) is helpful.
Collaborate across functional teams, including Sales, Marketing, Technology, and Events.

Process Automation and Improvement:
Leverage Marketing Cloud or Pardot features to automate and improve marketing processes.
Collaborate with stakeholders to understand business needs and translate them into Salesforce solutions.
Familiarity with programmatic solutions on the Salesforce platform (e.g., Flows) is beneficial.
Design, optimize, and build Salesforce solutions to streamline business processes.

User Management:
Manage user roles and permissions within Marketing Cloud to ensure proper access controls.
Secure Salesforce to ensure users have role-appropriate access to data.
Salesforce Marketing Cloud Customization & Development:
Customize Salesforce to fit organizational processes, including creating custom objects and fields.
Develop and maintain email templates, landing pages, and web forms in Marketing Cloud.
Monitor Salesforce updates to ensure optimal performance.

Data Management:
Import and export data as required, maintaining data integrity.
Work closely with marketing to ensure accurate data integration and reporting for marketing insights.

Training & Support:
Train team members on Salesforce functionalities and best practices.
Troubleshoot and resolve user issues within the platform.

Salesforce Integrations:
Build and manage integrations between Salesforce and other platforms (e.g., ClickData, Klaviyo, SalesRobot, Zapier).
Experience with Marketing Cloud or Pardot integrations with Salesforce is an advantage.


Requirements:
Preferred Qualifications:
Experience with Salesforce Marketing Cloud or Pardot is preferred but not required.
Salesforce Marketing Cloud Administrator or Marketing Cloud Email Specialist certification is a plus.
Familiarity with the Salesforce Lightning platform, Flows, and basic APIs is helpful.
Understanding of data management tools (e.g., Data Loader) is beneficial.
Knowledge of SQL, HTML, CSS, or JavaScript is an advantage.
Personal Attributes:
Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work collaboratively across departments.
Good communication skills for training and technical documentation.
Proactive in staying updated on new Marketing Cloud features and best practices.
Note: Experience with Salesforce Marketing Cloud or Pardot is beneficial, but we welcome candidates who are willing to learn and grow in the role. 

For candidates without direct Marketing Cloud experience:
Candidates without Salesforce Marketing Cloud certification or hands-on experience may still be considered, but they must be willing to complete a Marketing Cloud certification course within their first 90 days of employment.
Successfully passing this course will be a condition of continued employment to ensure readiness for the role.




Schedule: 
- 3pm-12mn PHT 
- Monday-Friday


Interested applicants may submit their CVs/resumes to kazzelyn.donaire@executivemosaic.com.

description:

Key Responsibilities

title: Web Developer: Wix and WordPress Specialist
description:
We are seeking a skilled and detail-oriented virtual web developer to manage website development and maintenance tasks, with expertise in Wix and WordPress platforms. This role offers flexible hours and the opportunity to work remotely. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in web development, proficiency in Wix and WordPress customization, and experience with database creation and management.

**Responsibilities:**

2. **Website Maintenance:**

3. **Database Creation and Management:**

4. **Content Management:**

5. **Client Communication:**

**Requirements:**

- Proven experience in website development and maintenance, with expertise in Wix and WordPress platforms.
- Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and other relevant web development languages and frameworks.
- Experience with database design and management, including SQL and relational database systems.
- Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to troubleshoot technical issues independently.
- Excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with clients and team members.
- Attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality work on time and within budget.
- Familiarity with SEO principles and best practices for website optimization.
- Self-motivated and proactive, with the ability to manage multiple projects and deadlines simultaneously.

title: CRM Specialist
description:
Location: Florida, 1542 Kingsley Avenue Suite 144 Orange Park, FL 32073

Type: Full Time

Experience: At least 3-5 years experience in a similar position. Experience with international company is preferred

Jobs' location is in Orange Park, FL. We accept applications for partial or full remote work.

PREFERS APPLICANTS IN THE PHILIPPINES

Record Retrieval Solution is a Florida-based company dealing with online medical records retrieval services.
As our company has been growing rapidly over the past years, we’re looking to develop our marketing organization and better manage sales opportunities and leads with optimized CRM Management capabilities.

The position will be the primary driver of leads and clients management and will have significant responsibility in running the company internal CRM system. This role ensures our CRM system's integrity, effectiveness, and continual optimization. 
The CRM Specialist will manage and support our CRM’s daily functions, streamline workflows, and ensure that data is accurate and readily available to enhance our team's and clients' experience.

This role involves quantifying and validating contacts from existing databases, reaching out to target companies and key individuals, and managing the data for targeted marketing campaigns via email and SMS. 
This role will be mentored and managed by the marketing manager and an external marketing strategist (fractional CMO, functional reporting).

CORE RESPONSIBILITIES (non-exhaustive list)
CRM Management & Optimization:
Maintain the CRM platform (Scale CRM) to support sales, marketing, and customer support teams.
Regularly evaluate CRM features and implement updates and customizations to meet evolving business needs.
Monitor data integrity and perform routine audits to ensure data accuracy.
Configure the CRM system according to business requirements. 
Customize features for lead management, customer tracking, and reporting.
Design a database structure that supports efficient data storage and retrieval.
Integrate existing data sources into the CRM system. 
Maintain data integrity through regular updates and quality checks.

Data Management, Analysis & Reporting:
Generate and analyze CRM reports to track customer interactions, sales performance, and campaign effectiveness.
Provide actionable insights to departments based on CRM data.
Data Validation and Updating
Quantify contacts from existing databases. 
Requalify and validate contact details to ensure current and accurate data.
Regularly update contact information as needed. 

User Support & Training:
Serve as the primary point of contact for CRM-related issues, providing troubleshooting and solutions as needed.
Conduct training sessions for new CRM users and ongoing sessions to update staff on new features and best practices.

Integration & Automation:
Work closely with the marketing team head and CMO to integrate the CRM with other tools and systems (e.g., Zapier, Gravity Forms, WordPress, etc.).
Create and manage automated workflows to enhance efficiency across departments.
Work closely with the team in charge of developing and maintaining the company client interface portal to ensure inter-connexion and bi-directional flow of data between both systems

Documentation & Compliance:
Maintain comprehensive documentation of CRM processes and customizations.
Ensure that CRM usage aligns with relevant data security, privacy regulations, and company policies.

New Data Acquisition and Outreach
Identify target companies, key individuals, and business development opportunities.
Potential contacts can be reached through email, phone, or social media to gather information. 
Populate the CRM with new, relevant contact data for future outreach.

Marketing Campaign Preparation
Segment contacts based on various criteria (industry, location, interest). 
Prepare and manage targeted marketing campaigns using email and SMS.
Track and report on the success of marketing campaigns. 

REQUIREMENTS / QUALIFICATIONS
Education & Experience:
Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business Administration, Information Technology, or a related field.
3+ years of experience in CRM management, customer data analysis, or a similar role.

Technical Skills:
Proficiency in CRM platforms, preferably Scale or similar (e.g., Salesforce, HubSpot).
Solid understanding of CRM customization, database structures, and data integration techniques.
Familiarity with integration, API use and automation tools such as Zapier, Gravity Forms, and WordPress. 
Knowledge of data management and reporting tools; experience in generating actionable insights.
Basic knowledge of HTML, SQL, or data manipulation is a plus.

Data Management & Analytical Skills:
Strong experience in maintaining data integrity, validating contacts, and managing large datasets.
Ability to analyze CRM data and generate insights to drive marketing and sales strategies.
Experience with segmenting contact lists and managing targeted marketing campaigns.

Communication & Training Skills:
Strong verbal and written communication skills for collaborating with cross-functional teams with the ability to explain technical details to non-technical team members.
Experience in providing CRM user support, conducting training, and documenting processes.

Project Management & Problem-Solving Skills:
Demonstrated organizational and time management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks effectively.
Proactive in troubleshooting, with a strong ability to identify issues and implement solutions.

Compliance & Documentation:
Understanding of data privacy regulations (e.g., HIPAA) and experience ensuring CRM compliance.
Ability to maintain accurate, detailed documentation of CRM configurations and processes.
Knowledge of medical records or healthcare industry practices is a plus.

Marketing Campaign Experience:
Hands-on experience in preparing and managing email and SMS marketing campaigns.
Familiarity with campaign performance metrics and ability to track and optimize outreach effectiveness.

Soft Skills:
Detail-oriented with a commitment to data accuracy and quality.
Team-oriented mindset and ability to work effectively with sales, marketing, and customer support departments.
Self-motivated and adaptable to evolving CRM requirements and system enhancements.

Benefits:
Paid time off
Paid holidays

Schedule:
8 hour shift

Work location:
Work Location: on site / partial remote / full remote accepted

ABOUT Record Retrieval Solutions:

Based in Florida and having developed strategic relationships with record management leaders and governing institutions across the United States, such as CIOX, MRO, and Scan-STAT, our record retrieval expertise spans the nation. 

As innovators of the medical record retrieval industry, with over 30 years of experience, we empower our employees to evolve with us and remain at the forefront of the record retrieval industry.

At RRS, we are constantly working to build positive relationships both internally and externally, as we believe quality relationships are the cornerstone of any successful business. Recruiting people who understand our values, are able to enhance our team dynamics, and work well with our clients is our top priority.

Our company culture is driven by principles such as initiative-taking, relationship-building, and continuous learning and growth. We are looking for self-starters who are constantly pushing themselves forward to succeed. If you are motivated to learn, have a can-do attitude, and identify with our values and company culture, then please reach out to us — our team may be the perfect fit for you.

title: Real Estate Administrator (Maintenance Coordinator)
description:

They coordinate with assigned maintenance technicians or vendors to complete service and follow-up with tenants or management the work was completed satisfactory. The maintenance coordinator drives the communication between the tenant, management, and vendors and must provide outstanding customer service in a manner that reflects the company’s policies and procedures.

Other Duties
• Ensure compliance with the company policy, as well as federal and local regulations.
• Encouraged to attend meetings and/or connect with other employees to share best practices.
• Assist with maintenance special projects as needed as directed by property manager or management.

• Excellent communication, organizational, and time management skills are required
• Proficiency in MS Office apps is required
• Experience working with Yardi is highly preferred

title: Shopify EXPERT
description:
**PLEASE READ THE ENTIRE JOB DESCRIPTION AND ANSWER ALL QUESTIONS FOR YOUR APPLICATION TO BE CONSIDERED.**

We are looking for an experienced E-Commerce SEO and Technical SEO Expert to help optimize our Shopify store and maximize organic traffic and conversions. The ideal candidate will have a strong grasp of SEO best practices and the ability to drive e-commerce success by researching buyer intent keywords, optimizing product and collection pages, and enhancing the site’s structure.


KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:

Ecommerce SEO:
Conduct keyword research to identify high-intent buyer keywords, and optimize product and collection pages to increase organic traffic and conversions.
Craft compelling, keyword-optimized descriptions that highlight the sustainability, comfort, and quality of products.
Create and optimize collection pages targeting specific search terms aligned with user intent to boost visibility and sales.
Implement on-page SEO strategies (meta titles, descriptions, alt tags) to ensure product pages rank effectively on Google.
Monitor ecommerce SEO performance using Shopify analytics and Google Search Console, adjusting strategies for continuous improvement.

Technical SEO:
Resolve 301, 302, and 404 redirect issues flagged in Google Search Console and check for redirect chains using tools like httpstatus.io.
Perform in-depth crawl error analysis using tools like SEMrush and make actionable recommendations to improve site health.
Optimize site structure, URL hierarchy, and internal linking to ensure smooth crawling and indexing of pages.
Identify and address duplicate content, broken links, and issues with page speed that affect SEO performance.
Utilize technical SEO tools to monitor and improve overall site health, ensuring compliance with search engine best practices.

Qualifications:
Proven experience in Ecommerce SEO for Shopify or similar platforms, with a focus on keyword research, product/collection page optimization, and conversion rate improvement.
Strong technical SEO skills, including proficiency with Google Search Console, Screaming Frog, and tools like httpstatus.io.
Expertise in handling 301, 302, and 404 redirects, redirect chains, and crawl errors.
Knowledge of on-page SEO tactics, such as meta tags, structured data, and optimizing for user intent.
Ability to identify and solve technical SEO issues (duplicate content, broken links, page speed optimization).
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with a focus on data-driven decisions to improve site performance.
Excellent communication and attention to detail.

Key responsibilities:
Drop shipping & Product Listing Management:
Manage and monitor orders.
Resolve order issues, update product listings and catalogues, and evaluate channel performance.
Analyse and improve performance on each channel.

Technical Expertise and Enhancement:
Making mass uploads and changes to products on Shopify (e.g., pricing, descriptions)
Optimize listings for product rankings, conversion rates, and sales growth.
Quality-checking images, titles, and descriptions for accuracy
Website coding experience (advantageous)

Before we proceed, here are a few things we'd like to confirm:
Payments will be made weekly for the first four weeks starting from the third week of employment, and then bi-monthly every other Tuesday.
Your work schedule will consist of 40 hours per week
Your working hours will be from 8AM to 4PM  (AEST) with a 1-hour break, five days a week.

You’ll need to send an End of Shift (EOS) report every day, covering the following:
What did you do today? (detailed description)
What issues did you run into?
Is there anything I can help you with

 QUESTIONS FOR YOU:
What is your hourly rate? 
Do you already have another job? If so, where are you working and how many hours are you working? 
Are you available to work Sydney Australia time Monday to Friday?
What are your hopes and aspirations? Would you like to learn new things or expand on a passion? Please elaborate. 
We require all employees to use the timeproof software? 
Have you worked for foreign employers before and doing what? 
How long have you been doing Shopify VA work? 
What tools do you use? If we were to give you more work, which type of skills could you offer? 
Please send me a link to your onlinejobs.ph profile? 
Please send me three references/reviews of prior clients /links and examples links of the shopify stores you have worked in? 
Please write a paragraph about why I should hire you. Don’t send a list of your experience; describe it to me. 
When would you be available to start work? Do you have your own computer and Internet access? If you have access, how fast is your connection? (Important for occasional face to face Video Skype calls). From 1 (low) - 10 (high) how would you rate your English speaking? From 1 (low) - 10 (high) how would you rate your English writing? 
Will you work from home or from an Internet café (focus & background noise)? Where do you live in the Philippines? Send me you're resume? 
We are seeking an individual who can commit to this being their only job Monday to Friday. 
We are seeking a work from home applicant who wants a long term position with a small team working on various ecommerce websites.


**Please carefully review the entire job description and also use this format as your subject line when replying to this post: “Your First Name + I Am Your Shopify Manager" (e.g. Kevin - I Am Your Product Manager). Please also include your resume.**
AI-generated responses will not be considered.

What We Offer:

-Opportunities for professional growth and advancement.

title: E-Commerce SEO and Technical SEO Expert
description:
We are looking for an experienced E-Commerce SEO and Technical SEO Expert to help optimize our Shopify store and maximize organic traffic and conversions. The ideal candidate will have a strong grasp of SEO best practices and the ability to drive e-commerce success by researching buyer intent keywords, optimizing product and collection pages, and enhancing the site’s structure.

Responsibilities:

Ecommerce SEO:

Conduct keyword research to identify high-intent buyer keywords, and optimize product and collection pages to increase organic traffic and conversions.

Craft compelling, keyword-optimized descriptions that highlight the sustainability, comfort, and quality of PuraKai’s products.

Create and optimize collection pages targeting specific search terms aligned with user intent to boost visibility and sales.

Implement on-page SEO strategies (meta titles, descriptions, alt tags) to ensure product pages rank effectively on Google.

Monitor ecommerce SEO performance using Shopify analytics and Google Search Console, adjusting strategies for continuous improvement.

Technical SEO:

Resolve 301, 302, and 404 redirect issues flagged in Google Search Console and check for redirect chains using tools like httpstatus.io.

Perform in-depth crawl error analysis using tools like Screaming Frog and make actionable recommendations to improve site health.

Optimize site structure, URL hierarchy, and internal linking to ensure smooth crawling and indexing of pages.

Identify and address duplicate content, broken links, and issues with page speed that affect SEO performance.

Utilize technical SEO tools to monitor and improve overall site health, ensuring compliance with search engine best practices.

Qualifications:

Proven experience in Ecommerce SEO for Shopify or similar platforms, with a focus on keyword research, product/collection page optimization, and conversion rate improvement.

Strong technical SEO skills, including proficiency with Google Search Console, Screaming Frog, and tools like httpstatus.io.

Expertise in handling 301, 302, and 404 redirects, redirect chains, and crawl errors.

Knowledge of on-page SEO tactics, such as meta tags, structured data, and optimizing for user intent.

Ability to identify and solve technical SEO issues (duplicate content, broken links, page speed optimization).

Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with a focus on data-driven decisions to improve site performance.

Excellent communication and attention to detail.

title: EDM Manager
description:
Job Summary
Urban Road is seeking a dynamic and hands-on EDM Manager to lead our email, SMS, and MMS marketing efforts. This role is crucial in driving our customer engagement, loyalty, and revenue growth through strategic and innovative digital messaging. With a strong focus on Klaviyo, the EDM Manager will be responsible for planning, executing, and optimising campaigns that resonate with our audience and contribute to the overall success of our brand.


Department: Marketing
Reports To: Head of Marketing
Location: Burleigh Heads, QLD Australia (REMOTE ROLE)


Key Responsibilities
1. Campaign Strategy and Planning
Develop and Execute Campaigns: Lead the development and hands-on execution of comprehensive EDM strategies across email, SMS, and MMS channels, with a focus on utilising Klaviyo for optimising email flows.
Lead Capture and Database Growth: Own and execute the strategy for lead generation and database growth, ensuring compliance with data protection regulations while expanding our reach.
Content Personalization: Leverage Klaviyo’s segmentation and personalization features to craft highly targeted content that enhances customer engagement and drives revenue.
2. Performance Tracking and Optimization
Analytics and Reporting: Actively monitor and report on campaign performance using Klaviyo’s tools, focusing on metrics like open rates, click-through rates, and conversion rates. Use insights to continuously improve campaign outcomes.
A/B Testing: Implement and manage A/B tests to refine content and optimise engagement, applying learnings to drive higher revenue.
3. Customer Relationship Management
Loyalty Campaigns: Develop, manage, and execute loyalty programs to reward repeat customers and build long-term relationships.
Repeat Purchases: Design and optimise email flows targeting repeat purchases, leveraging Klaviyo’s predictive analytics and insights.
Customer Engagement: Maintain strong customer relationships through relevant and timely communications, directly contributing to increased customer satisfaction and retention.
4. Compliance and Deliverability
Regulatory Compliance: Ensure all campaigns comply with GDPR, CAN-SPAM, and other relevant regulations, staying informed on the latest data privacy laws.
Deliverability Management: Oversee campaign delivery, ensuring optimal sender reputation and mobile responsiveness.
5. Collaboration and Coordination
Cross-Departmental Collaboration: Work closely with content creators, designers, and data analysts to ensure campaigns are aligned with company goals and delivered effectively.
Vendor and Tool Management: Manage relationships with Klaviyo and other vendors, ensuring the effective use of tools and platforms.
6. Innovation and Continuous Improvement
Trend Monitoring: Stay ahead of industry trends and innovations in EDM marketing, particularly within the eCommerce sector, to keep our strategies cutting-edge.
Creative Development: Lead the development of interactive and engaging content, incorporating storytelling and multimedia elements to boost customer engagement.

Qualifications
Experience: Minimum 3-5 years of experience in EDM or digital marketing, with at least 2 years of hands-on experience using Klaviyo in an eCommerce environment.
Skills: Advanced proficiency in Klaviyo, including segmentation, automation, and analytics. Strong analytical skills and a passion for hands-on execution and optimization of email flows.
Education: Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business, Communications, or a related field.

Key Competencies
Hands-On Execution: Passion for being directly involved in the planning, execution, and optimization of campaigns.
Strategic Thinking: Ability to develop and execute long-term strategies that align with business goals.
Customer-Centric Approach: Strong focus on enhancing customer experience and driving customer loyalty.
Analytical Skills: Capability to analyze data, derive insights, and make informed decisions to optimize campaigns.
Collaboration: Effective in working cross-functionally and managing relationships with internal and external stakeholders.

What We Offer:
Competitive Salary and Benefits: Enjoy a competitive salary package along with 20 days of paid annual leave in addition to public holidays.
Professional Growth: Urban Road provides opportunities for professional development, allowing you to grow within a dynamic and innovative team.
Creative Environment: Work with a forward-thinking company where your contributions are valued and creativity is encouraged.
Flexible Hours: Self managed roster with the ability to complete work with flexible start and finish times between 8am and 6pm AEST 

About Urban Road
Urban Road is a leading Australian home decoration brand known for our commitment to quality, creativity, and innovation. We are passionate about creating beautiful, functional, and inspiring products that transform spaces into homes. Our values of creativity, collaboration, and customer-centricity drive everything we do, and we believe in empowering our team members to contribute their best.

Our Values
Creativity: We embrace creativity in every aspect of our business, encouraging innovative thinking and solutions.
Collaboration: We believe in the power of teamwork and collaboration, working together to achieve common goals.
Customer-Centricity: Our customers are at the heart of everything we do, and we strive to exceed their expectations through every interaction.

Application Process
If you are a proactive and skilled EDM Manager with a passion for digital marketing and customer engagement, we would love to hear from you. Please send your resume and a cover letter detailing your relevant experience and why you are a good fit for this role.

title: Full Stack Lead Developer
description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Full Stack Lead Developer to join our dynamic team. As the Lead Developer, you will play a pivotal role in leading the development and implementation of cutting-edge web applications. You will be responsible for guiding and mentoring a team of developers, ensuring the successful delivery of projects, and driving innovation in our technology stack.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
• Technical Leadership: Provide expert technical leadership to our development team, guiding them in the design, development, and implementation of Laravel-based projects. Lead by example, demonstrating best practices and inspiring excellence within the team.
• Project Ownership: Take end-to-end ownership of multiple projects, from inception to deployment. Collaborate closely with product managers and stakeholders to understand project requirements, develop technical strategies, and ensure successful project execution.
• Code Quality and Review: Uphold the highest standards of code quality, ensuring that the team adheres to industry best practices, coding guidelines, and maintainable codebase principles. Conduct regular code reviews and provide constructive feedback to enhance the overall code quality.
• Innovation and Technology Adoption: Stay abreast of the latest trends and developments in Laravel and related technologies. Proactively propose and implement improvements to the existing technology stack, driving innovation within the team.
• Documentation and Communication: Exhibit strong attention to detail and maintain comprehensive technical documentation for projects. Communicate effectively with team members and cross-functional stakeholders, ensuring clear and transparent communication throughout the development process.
• Team Collaboration: Foster a collaborative and supportive team environment, promoting knowledge sharing, mentorship, and professional growth among team members. Lead by example in demonstrating teamwork, respect, and a positive attitude.
• Problem Solving: Proactively identify technical challenges and provide creative and effective solutions to address them. Troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues in a timely and efficient manner.
• Performance Optimisation: Continuously monitor and optimise the performance of Laravel applications, ensuring scalability, responsiveness, and reliability.
• Security and Data Protection: Ensure that security and data protection measures are integrated into the development process. Implement best practices for data security, encryption, and protection of sensitive information in compliance with industry standards and regulations.
• Scalability and Performance: Collaborate with the infrastructure and DevOps teams to design and implement scalable and high-performance solutions. Optimise application performance to handle increasing user loads and maintain responsiveness.
• Product Roadmap and Strategy: Contribute to the product roadmap and strategy discussions, providing technical insights to align development efforts with business objectives. Identify opportunities for new features, enhancements, and optimisations based on market trends and user feedback.

REQUIREMENTS
• Proven experience as a Lead Full Stack Developer, with at least 5 years of experience in leading and delivering complex web-based projects
• Strong proficiency in frontend technologies, including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+), and modern frontend frameworks like React, Vue.js, or Angular
• Extensive experience in backend development using PHP and Laravel framework, including building RESTful APIs and working with databases like MySQL
• Hands-on experience with server-side technologies and cloud platforms, such as AWS
• Solid understanding of software architecture, design patterns, and development methodologies, with a focus on scalability and performance optimisation
• Demonstrated leadership skills, with the ability to guide and motivate a development team effectively
• Excellent project management skills, with a track record of successfully delivering projects on time and within scope
• Strong problem-solving abilities and a pragmatic approach to handling complex technical challenges
• Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively communicate technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders
• A passion for continuous learning and staying updated with the latest technologies and industry trends
• Have a comprehensive understanding of web application security best practices, including compliance with ISO 27001 standards.

If you’re ready to be a part of a dedicated team and are eager to pursue a path of continuous learning and
career growth, we encourage you to apply and join us. Send your CV to contact@sevron.co.uk.
